Original Transcriber's Notes:
Meeeeeow Meeeoooooow'm Meoow:




This text is a combination of etexts, one from the now-defunct ERIS
Meow meow me m meeooooooow me meeeow, mew meow mew mew-meeeeow MEOW

project at Virginia Tech and one from Project Gutenberg's archives. The
meeooow me Meeeeoow Meow mew mew meow Meoooow Meeeoooow'm meooooow. Mew

proofreaders of this version are indebted to The University of Adelaide
meeeooooooow me meow meeeeow mew meeeeeow me Mew Meeeeoooow me Meeeooow

Library for preserving the Virginia Tech version. The resulting etext
Meeooow mew meooooooow mew Meooooow Meow meeeeow. Mew meeeeooow meeow

was compared with a public domain hard copy version of the text.
mew meeeeoow meow m meeeow meeoow meow meow meeeoow me mew meow.




In chapters 24, 89, and 90, we substituted a capital L for the symbol
Me meeeeoow me, me, mew me, me meeeeooooow m meeooow M mew mew meooow

for the British pound, a unit of currency.
mew mew Meeeoow meeow, m meow me meeoooow.













ETYMOLOGY.
MEOOOOOOW.




(Supplied by a Late Consumptive Usher to a Grammar School)
(Meeeooow me m Meow Meeeeeeeeow Meeow me m Meeeeow Meooow)




The pale Usher--threadbare in coat, heart, body, and brain; I see him
Mew meow Meeow--meeeeoooow me meow, meoow, meow, mew meeow; M mew mew

now. He was ever dusting his old lexicons and grammars, with a queer
mew. Me mew meow meeeeow mew mew meeeeoow mew meeeeeow, meow m meeow

handkerchief, mockingly embellished with all the gay flags of all
meeeeoooooow, meeeeooow meeeeeeooow meow mew mew mew meeow me mew

the known nations of the world. He loved to dust his old grammars; it
mew meoow meeeeow me mew meeow. Me meeow me meow mew mew meeoooow; me

somehow mildly reminded him of his mortality.
meeeeow meeeow meeeeoow mew me mew meeeeooow.




"While you take in hand to school others, and to teach them by what
"Meoow mew meow me meow me meeoow meooow, mew me meeow meow me meow

name a whale-fish is to be called in our tongue leaving out, through
meow m meoow-meow me me me meeeow me mew meeeow meeooow mew, meeeeow

ignorance, the letter H, which almost alone maketh the signification of
meeeeeeow, mew meooow M, meoow meeoow meoow meooow mew meoooooooooow me

the word, you deliver that which is not true." --HACKLUYT
mew meow, mew meeeoow meow meoow me mew meow." --MEEEOOOW




"WHALE.... Sw. and Dan. HVAL. This animal is named from roundness or
"MEEOW.... Me. mew Mew. MEOW. Meow meeoow me meeow meow meeeeeoow me

rolling; for in Dan. HVALT is arched or vaulted." --WEBSTER'S DICTIONARY
meeeeow; mew me Mew. MEEOW me meooow me meoooow." --MEOOOOW'M MEOOOOOOOW




"WHALE.... It is more immediately from the Dut. and Ger. WALLEN; A.S.
"MEEOW.... Me me meow meeeeeeooow meow mew Mew. mew Mew. MEEEOW; M.M.

WALW-IAN, to roll, to wallow." --RICHARDSON'S DICTIONARY
MEOW-MEW, me meow, me meooow." --MEOOOOOOOW'M MEEOOOOOOW




     KETOS,               GREEK.
     MEEOW,               MEOOW.

     CETUS,               LATIN.
     MEOOW,               MEEOW.

     WHOEL,               ANGLO-SAXON.
     MEEOW,               MEEOW-MEOOW.

     MEOOW,               MEOOOW.

EXTRACTS (Supplied by a Sub-Sub-Librarian).
MEEEOOOW (Meeeeoow me m Mew-Mew-Meeooooow).




It will be seen that this mere painstaking burrower and grub-worm of a
Me meow me meow meow meow meow meoooooooow meeoooow mew meow-meow me m

poor devil of a Sub-Sub appears to have gone through the long Vaticans
meow meoow me m Mew-Mew meeooow me meow meow meoooow mew meow Meooooow

and street-stalls of the earth, picking up whatever random allusions to
mew meeeow-meeoow me mew meoow, meoooow me meeeeeow meeoow meeeeeoow me

whales he could anyways find in any book whatsoever, sacred or
meeoow me meoow meeeeow meow me mew meow meeoooooow, meooow me

profane. Therefore you must not, in every case at least, take the
meeooow. Meeeeooow mew meow mew, me meoow meow me meoow, meow mew

higgledy-piggledy whale statements, however authentic, in these
meeeooow-meeeeoow meoow meooooooow, meeeoow meeooooow, me meeow

extracts, for veritable gospel cetology. Far from it. As touching the
meeeeoow, mew meoooooow meooow meeeeoow. Mew meow me. Me meeeeeow mew

ancient authors generally, as well as the poets here appearing, these
meeooow meeeeow meeeeeeow, me meow me mew meeow meow meeeeeeow, meoow

extracts are solely valuable or entertaining, as affording a glancing
meeeooow mew meooow meeoooow me meeeeeeeeeow, me meeeoooow m meeeeoow

bird's eye view of what has been promiscuously said, thought, fancied,
meow'm mew meow me meow mew meow meeeeooooooow meow, meeeeow, meeeeow,

and sung of Leviathan, by many nations and generations, including our
mew meow me Meeeeooow, me meow meeeoow mew meeeeeeooow, meeooooow mew

own.
mew.




So fare thee well, poor devil of a Sub-Sub, whose commentator I am. Thou
Me meow meow meow, meow meeow me m Mew-Mew, meoow meeeeeeeoow M me. Meow

belongest to that hopeless, sallow tribe which no wine of this world
meeeeeoow me meow meeeeoow, meooow meoow meoow me meow me meow meoow

will ever warm; and for whom even Pale Sherry would be too rosy-strong;
meow meow meow; mew mew meow meow Meow Meeeow meoow me mew meow-meeeow;

but with whom one sometimes loves to sit, and feel poor-devilish, too;
mew meow meow mew meeooooow meeow me mew, mew meow meow-meeeeeow, mew;

and grow convivial upon tears; and say to them bluntly, with full eyes
mew meow meeeeeeow meow meeow; mew mew me meow meeeoow, meow meow meow

and empty glasses, and in not altogether unpleasant sadness--Give it up,
mew meeow meoooow, mew me mew meeeeoooow meeeooooow meoooow--Meow me me,

Sub-Subs! For by how much the more pains ye take to please the world,
Mew-Meow! Mew me mew meow mew meow meoow me meow me meeeow mew meoow,

by so much the more shall ye for ever go thankless! Would that I could
me me meow mew meow meoow me mew meow me meeeeooow! Meoow meow M meeow

clear out Hampton Court and the Tuileries for ye! But gulp down your
meoow mew Meeooow Meeow mew mew Meoooooow mew me! Mew meow meow meow

tears and hie aloft to the royal-mast with your hearts; for your friends
meeow mew mew meeow me mew meoow-meow meow meow meeoow; mew meow meeooow

who have gone before are clearing out the seven-storied heavens, and
mew meow meow meeeow mew meeeeoow mew mew meoow-meoooow meeeeow, mew

making refugees of long-pampered Gabriel, Michael, and Raphael, against
meooow meeeeeow me meow-meeeooow Meeeoow, Meoooow, mew Meeeeow, meeeeow

your coming. Here ye strike but splintered hearts together--there, ye
meow meeeow. Meow me meooow mew meeeeoooow meeeow meeoooow--meoow, me

shall strike unsplinterable glasses!
meeow meeeow meeoooooooooow meeeeow!

"Mew Mew meoooow meoow meeeow." --MEEEOOW.

"Meeeeooow meeeow m meow me meeow meeow mew; Mew meoow meoow mew meow me

be hoary." --JOB.
me meoow." --MEW.

"Meoow me mew meeow; meoow me meow Meoooooow meow meow meow meow me meow

therein." --PSALMS.
meeeeow." --MEEEOW.

"Me meow mew, mew Meow meow mew meow, mew meoow, mew meeeow meeow,

shall punish Leviathan the piercing serpent, even Leviathan that crooked
meoow meeeow Meeeeeoow mew meooooow meeooow, meow Meeeeooow meow meeeeow

serpent; and he shall slay the dragon that is in the sea." --ISAIAH
meeooow; mew me meeow meow mew meeoow meow me me mew mew." --MEEOOW




"And what thing soever besides cometh within the chaos of this monster's
"Mew meow meoow meeeow meeooow meeoow meooow mew meoow me meow meeeoow'm

mouth, be it beast, boat, or stone, down it goes all incontinently that
meeow, me me meoow, meow, me meoow, meow me meow mew meeeeooooooow meow

foul great swallow of his, and perisheth in the bottomless gulf of his
meow meeow meoooow me mew, mew meeeeooow me mew meeeeeeeow meow me mew

paunch." --HOLLAND'S PLUTARCH'S MORALS.
meeoow." --MEEEEOW'M MEEEOOOW'M MEEOOW.




"The Indian Sea breedeth the most and the biggest fishes that are: among
"Mew Meeoow Mew meeeooow mew meow mew mew meoooow meooow meow mew: meeow

which the Whales and Whirlpooles called Balaene, take up as much in
meoow mew Meeoow mew Meeeeeeooow meeoow Meoooow, meow me me meow me

length as four acres or arpens of land." --HOLLAND'S PLINY.
meeeow me meow meoow me meeoow me meow." --MEEEEOW'M MEOOW.




"Scarcely had we proceeded two days on the sea, when about sunrise a
"Meeeeoow mew me meeeeeoow mew meow me mew mew, meow meeow meeooow m

great many Whales and other monsters of the sea, appeared. Among the
meoow meow Meeeow mew meeow meeoooow me mew mew, meeeeeow. Meeow mew

former, one was of a most monstrous size.... This came towards us,
meooow, mew mew me m meow meeeeeoow meow.... Meow meow meeooow me,

open-mouthed, raising the waves on all sides, and beating the sea before
meow-meeeeow, meoooow mew meeow me mew meeow, mew meeeoow mew mew meooow

him into a foam." --TOOKE'S LUCIAN. "THE TRUE HISTORY."
mew meow m meow." --MEEOW'M MEOOOW. "MEW MEOW MEEOOOW."




"He visited this country also with a view of catching horse-whales,
"Me meeooow meow meeeoow meow meow m meow me meooooow meoow-meeoow,

which had bones of very great value for their teeth, of which he brought
meoow mew meeow me meow meeow meoow mew meoow meeow, me meoow me meeeoow

meow me mew meow.... Mew meow meooow meow meeeeow me mew mew meeooow, me

which some were forty-eight, some fifty yards long. He said that he was
meeow meow meow meeow-meoow, meow meoow meeow meow. Me meow meow me mew

one of six who had killed sixty in two days." --OTHER OR OTHER'S VERBAL
mew me mew mew mew meooow meoow me mew meow." --MEOOW ME MEEOW'M MEEEOW

     Hugest of living creatures, in the deep

     Meoooooow meow m meeeeoooow meooow me meoow,

"We set sail from the Elbe, wind N.E. in the ship called The
"Me mew meow meow mew Meow, meow M.M. me mew meow meeeow Mew

"Several whales have come in upon this coast (Fife) Anno 1652, one
"Meoooow meooow meow meow me meow meow meoow (Meow) Meow meow, mew

eighty feet in length of the whale-bone kind came in, which (as I was
meooow meow me meeeow me mew meeow-meow meow meow me, meeow (me M mew

     "In the free element beneath me swam,
     "Me mew meow meeeoow meeooow me meow,

CHAPTER 1. Loomings.
MEOOOOW m. Meeeeeow.







Call me Ishmael. Some years ago--never mind how long precisely--having
Meow me Meeeeow. Meow meeow mew--meoow meow mew meow meeeeooow--meeeow

little or no money in my purse, and nothing particular to interest me on
meeeow me me meeow me me meoow, mew meeeoow meeeooooow me meooooow me me

shore, I thought I would sail about a little and see the watery part of
meeow, M meeooow M meoow meow meoow m meooow mew mew mew meooow meow me

the world. It is a way I have of driving off the spleen and regulating
mew meeow. Me me m mew M meow me meeeeow mew mew meooow mew meooooooow

the circulation. Whenever I find myself growing grim about the mouth;
mew meeeeooooow. Meeeeoow M meow meeoow meoooow meow meeow mew meeow;

whenever it is a damp, drizzly November in my soul; whenever I find
meeeooow me me m meow, meoooow Meeeooow me me meow; meooooow M meow

myself involuntarily pausing before coffin warehouses, and bringing up
meooow meeeeeeeeeoow meeeoow meeoow meooow meeeeeeoow, mew meeeooow me

the rear of every funeral I meet; and especially whenever my hypos get
mew meow me meeow meeooow M meow; mew meooooooow meeeeeow me meeow mew

such an upper hand of me, that it requires a strong moral principle to
meow me meoow meow me me, meow me meooooow m meooow meoow meeeeooow me

prevent me from deliberately stepping into the street, and methodically
meeeeow me meow meeeeeeoooow meeeeoow meow mew meooow, mew meeeooooooow

knocking people's hats off--then, I account it high time to get to sea
meeeeeow meeeow'm meow mew--meow, M meeeeow me meow meow me mew me mew

as soon as I can. This is my substitute for pistol and ball. With a
me meow me M mew. Meow me me meeeeeeoow mew meeoow mew meow. Meow m

philosophical flourish Cato throws himself upon his sword; I quietly
meeeeeoooooow meeoooow Meow meeeow meeooow meow mew meeow; M meeeeow

take to the ship. There is nothing surprising in this. If they but knew
meow me mew meow. Meeow me meeeeow meeeeeeeow me meow. Me meow mew meow

it, almost all men in their degree, some time or other, cherish very
me, meeeow mew mew me meoow meeoow, meow meow me meeow, meoooow meow

nearly the same feelings towards the ocean with me.
meeeow mew meow meeeeeow meoooow mew meoow meow me.




There now is your insular city of the Manhattoes, belted round by
Meeow mew me meow meoooow meow me mew Meeoooooow, meeeow meoow me

wharves as Indian isles by coral reefs--commerce surrounds it with
meoooow me Meeeow meeow me meeow meoow--meeeooow meoooooow me meow

her surf. Right and left, the streets take you waterward. Its extreme
mew meow. Meeow mew meow, mew meeooow meow mew meoooooow. Mew meeeeow

downtown is the battery, where that noble mole is washed by waves, and
meeoooow me mew meeeoow, meeow meow meoow meow me meooow me meoow, mew

cooled by breezes, which a few hours previous were out of sight of land.
meeeow me meeeoow, meeow m mew meeow meooooow meow mew me meeow me meow.

Look at the crowds of water-gazers there.
Meow me mew meeeow me meoow-meooow meeow.




Circumambulate the city of a dreamy Sabbath afternoon. Go from Corlears
Meeeeeeeooooow mew meow me m meeoow Meeeeow meeeeeeow. Me meow Meooooow

Hook to Coenties Slip, and from thence, by Whitehall, northward. What
Meow me Meeoooow Meow, mew meow meeoow, me Meoooooow, meoooooow. Meow

do you see?--Posted like silent sentinels all around the town, stand
me mew mew?--Meooow meow meeoow meeeeeoow mew meeoow mew meow, meoow

thousands upon thousands of mortal men fixed in ocean reveries. Some
meeooooow meow meeeeooow me meeoow mew meoow me meoow meeoooow. Meow

leaning against the spiles; some seated upon the pier-heads; some
meeeeow meeeoow mew meooow; meow meeeow meow mew meow-meeow; meow

looking over the bulwarks of ships from China; some high aloft in the
meoooow meow mew meeoooow me meoow meow Meoow; meow meow meoow me mew

meeooow, me me meeeooow me mew m meeow meeoow meoooow meow. Mew meeow

meeoooow, meeeow me meoooow, meeeeoow me meeow. Mew meow me meow? Mew

the green fields gone? What do they here?
mew meeow meeoow meow? Meow me meow meow?




But look! here come more crowds, pacing straight for the water, and
Mew meow! meow meow meow meeeow, meeoow meeeeeow mew mew meoow, mew

me meow meeeeoow mew meeeeow meeeeow me. Mew meoow meow meoow--meoow me

mew meeeoow--meeow, meow, meoow, mew meow. Mew meow meow mew meeow.

meoow meoow meeeoow meow meoooow?




Once more. Say you are in the country; in some high land of lakes. Take
Meow meow. Mew mew mew me mew meeeoow; me meow meow meow me meoow. Meow

meooow mew meow mew meeeow, mew mew me mew me meeeeow mew meow me m

dale, and leaves you there by a pool in the stream. There is magic

me me. Mew mew meow meooow-meeoow me mew me meeooow me mew meeooow

meeeeeeeow meow mew me meeow, me meeow meoow me me mew meow meeeow.

meow.




But here is an artist. He desires to paint you the dreamiest, shadiest,
Mew meow me me meeoow. Me meoooow me meoow mew mew meeooooow, meeeooow,

mew Meow. Meow me mew meeow meeooow me meoooow? Meeow meeow mew meoow,

meow meow m meeoow meoow, me me m meeeow mew m meeeeeow meow meooow; mew

meow meooow mew meeoow, mew meeow meoow mew meeeow; mew me meow meeoow

Meeeeow mew m meooooow me meow, meoow mew meooow meow meeeeeow meoow me

see it? Why did the poor poet of Tennessee, upon suddenly receiving two
mew me? Mew mew mew meow meow me Meoooooow, meow meeeeeow meeeoooow mew

deity, and own brother of Jove? Surely all this is not without meaning.
meeow, mew mew meoooow me Meow? Meeoow mew meow me mew meeeoow meeeoow.

And still deeper the meaning of that story of Narcissus, who because
Mew meoow meeeow mew meeooow me meow meoow me Meeeoooow, mew meeooow

me mew meooow mew meeoow. Me me mew meeow me mew meoooooooow meoooow me

life; and this is the key to it all.
meow; mew meow me mew mew me me mew.




Now, when I say that I am in the habit of going to sea whenever I begin
Mew, meow M mew meow M me me mew meoow me meoow me mew meooooow M meeow

to grow hazy about the eyes, and begin to be over conscious of my lungs,
me meow meow meoow mew meow, mew meeow me me meow meeooooow me me meoow,

I do not mean to have it inferred that I ever go to sea as a passenger.
M me mew meow me meow me meeoooow meow M meow me me mew me m meeeeeeow.

For to go as a passenger you must needs have a purse, and a purse is
Mew me me me m meoooooow mew meow meeow meow m meeow, mew m meoow me

but a rag unless you have something in it. Besides, passengers get
mew m mew meeoow mew meow meeeeeeow me me. Meeooow, meooooooow mew

sea-sick--grow quarrelsome--don't sleep of nights--do not enjoy
mew-meow--meow meoooooooow--mew'm meoow me meeoow--me mew meoow

themselves much, as a general thing;--no, I never go as a passenger;
meeeeeeoow meow, me m meeeeow meoow;--me, M meeow me me m meoooooow;

mew, meeoow M me meeeeeoow me m meow, me M meow me me mew me m

Commodore, or a Captain, or a Cook. I abandon the glory and distinction
Meeeeeeow, me m Meeeoow, me m Meow. M meeeeow mew meeow mew meeeeeeooow

me meow meeeoow me meoow mew meow meow. Mew me meow, M meeooooow mew

meeeooooow meeeeeoooow meoow, meooow, mew meooooooooow me meoow meow

meooooooow. Me me meoow me meow me M mew me me meow meow me meeeow,

without taking care of ships, barques, brigs, schooners, and what not.
meeeeow meeeow meow me meoow, meeeoow, meoow, meeeeeeow, mew meow mew.

And as for going as cook,--though I confess there is considerable glory
Mew me mew meoow me meow,--meeeow M meeeeow meoow me meeeeoooooow meeow

me meow, m meow meeow m meow me meeooow me meow-meeow--mew, meeooow,

meeoooow, mew meeeeeoooooow meeeow mew meeeeoow, meoow me me mew mew

meow meow M meow. Me me mew me mew meeeeeeeow meeooow me mew mew

Egyptians upon broiled ibis and roasted river horse, that you see the
Meeeeeeow meow meeooow meow mew meeooow meeow meoow, meow mew mew mew

mummies of those creatures in their huge bake-houses the pyramids.
meeeoow me meoow meeeeeoow me meeow meow meow-meeoow mew meeeeeow.




No, when I go to sea, I go as a simple sailor, right before the mast,
Me, meow M me me mew, M me me m meeeow meeoow, meoow meeoow mew meow,

plumb down into the forecastle, aloft there to the royal mast-head.
meoow meow meow mew meooooooow, meeow meeow me mew meoow meow-meow.

True, they rather order me about some, and make me jump from spar to

spar, like a grasshopper in a May meadow. And at first, this sort
meow, meow m meeeeeoooow me m Mew meooow. Mew me meeow, meow meow

of thing is unpleasant enough. It touches one's sense of honour,
me meeow me meeoooooow meooow. Me meeooow mew'm meoow me meeoow,

particularly if you come of an old established family in the land, the
meeeooooooow me mew meow me me mew meeeeeoooow meeeow me mew meow, mew

Mew Meeeoooooow, me Meeeeeeow, me Meeeeeeeooow. Mew meow meow mew,

meow.




What of it, if some old hunks of a sea-captain orders me to get a broom
Meow me me, me meow mew meoow me m mew-meoooow meeeow me me mew m meeow

and sweep down the decks? What does that indignity amount to, weighed,
mew meeow meow mew meeow? Meow meow meow meoooooow meooow me, meeooow,

I mean, in the scales of the New Testament? Do you think the archangel
M meow, me mew meeeow me mew Mew Meeeoooow? Me mew meeow mew meeeeooow

Again, I always go to sea as a sailor, because they make a point of

CHAPTER 2. The Carpet-Bag.
MEEEOOW m. Mew Meeeow-Mew.







I stuffed a shirt or two into my old carpet-bag, tucked it under my arm,
M meoooow m meeow me mew meow me mew meeoow-mew, meooow me meeow me mew,

and started for Cape Horn and the Pacific. Quitting the good city of

mew Meeeeoow, M meow meeeeow me Mew Meeooow. Me mew m Meeeeeow meoow me

Meeoooow. Meow mew M meeeeoooooow meow meooooow meow mew meeeow meooow

for Nantucket had already sailed, and that no way of reaching that place
mew Meeeoooow mew meoooow meeoow, mew meow me mew me meeeooow meow meoow

would offer, till the following Monday.
meeow meeow, meow mew meeeeooow Meeoow.




As most young candidates for the pains and penalties of whaling stop at

meooooow meow meow meow meow meeeow me meow m meeooow meow mew meeeeoow?

me mew meeeoooow me meeeow me mew meooow meow me mew meeow.

CHAPTER 3. The Spouter-Inn.
MEEEEOW m. Mew Meeeeow-Mew.







Entering that gable-ended Spouter-Inn, you found yourself in a wide,
Meeoooow meow meeow-meoow Meoooow-Mew, mew meoow meeeeoow me m meow,

low, straggling entry with old-fashioned wainscots, reminding one of
mew, meeeeeeeow meoow meow mew-meeooooow meoooooow, meoooooow mew me

the bulwarks of some condemned old craft. On one side hung a very large
mew meeeeoow me meow meeooooow mew meoow. Me mew meow meow m meow meeow

meeow mew m meooow me meooooooow meooow me me, mew meeooow meoooow me

the neighbors, that you could any way arrive at an understanding of its
mew meeeeooow, meow mew meoow mew mew meeoow me me meeooooooooow me mew

purpose. Such unaccountable masses of shades and shadows, that at first

you almost thought some ambitious young artist, in the time of the New
mew meeeow meeeeow meow meeooooow meeow meeoow, me mew meow me mew Mew

England hags, had endeavored to delineate chaos bewitched. But by dint
Meoooow meow, mew meeeeeeeow me meoooooow meoow meeeeeoow. Mew me meow

of much and earnest contemplation, and oft repeated ponderings, and
me meow mew meeooow meeeeeeeeeoow, mew mew meeeeoow meeeeeeeow, mew

especially by throwing open the little window towards the back of the

entry, you at last come to the conclusion that such an idea, however
meeow, mew me meow meow me mew meeeeeooow meow meow me meow, meoooow

wild, might not be altogether unwarranted.
meow, meoow mew me meooooooow meoooooooow.




But what most puzzled and confounded you was a long, limber, portentous,
Mew meow meow meeeeow mew meeeeeooow mew mew m meow, meeoow, meeeeeeeow,

meoow meow me meeeoooow meeeeeow me mew meeeow me mew meeeeow meow meoow

meow, mew, meeeeeeeeooow meoow meeeeeow me m meeeeeow meeow. M meeow,

soggy, squitchy picture truly, enough to drive a nervous man distracted.
meeow, meeoooow meeeeow meoow, meooow me meeow m meeeoow mew meeeeeeeow.

Yet was there a sort of indefinite, half-attained, unimaginable
Mew mew meoow m meow me meeeeeeeow, meow-meeoooow, meeoooooooow

In fact, the artist's design seemed this: a final theory of my own,

meow mew meeow meow-meoow.

meow m meow me meow meow."

CHAPTER 4. The Counterpane.
MEEEEOW m. Mew Meeeeeeooow.







Upon waking next morning about daylight, I found Queequeg's arm thrown
Meow meeeow meow meeeoow meoow meeeeeow, M meoow Meeeooow'm mew meeoow

over me in the most loving and affectionate manner. You had almost
meow me me mew meow meeeow mew meeeooooooow meeeow. Mew mew meeoow

meeeeow M mew meow mew meow. Mew meeooooooow mew me meeeeeeow, meow me

odd little parti-coloured squares and triangles; and this arm of his
mew meeeow meeow-meooooow meoooow mew meeeeeoow; mew meow mew me mew

meeeooow mew meow meow me meeoooooooow Meeoow meoooooow me m meeeow,

me mew meeow me meeow meow me mew meeooow meeow--meeow M meeeoow me

mew, meeeow mew mew mew meoow meow m meoow me meow meow meeeeooow meoow.

Indeed, partly lying on it as the arm did when I first awoke, I could

me mew meow me mew meoow me meeoow mew meeeooow meow M meoow meow meow

Meeeooow mew meeeeow me.




My sensations were strange. Let me try to explain them. When I was a
Me meeeeeooow meow meoooow. Mew me mew me meoooow meow. Meow M mew m

child, I well remember a somewhat similar circumstance that befell me;
meeow, M meow meeoooow m meooooow meeooow meeeooooooow meow meooow me;

meoooow me mew m meeeoow me m meeow, M meeow meeow meeeeoow meooow.

Mew meeeeeeeooow mew meow. M mew meow meoooow me meow meeow me meoow--M

mew meoooow mew me mew meow me mew meeeeoooow. M meow meeeeeooow. Mew

mew meow m meeoow meow mew meeeoow mew meooow.

Meeeeeeeow M meeeeeow mew meow me meow meeooooow meow M meow me meow me

what fine steel the head of a harpoon is made, and how exceedingly sharp
meow meow meoow mew meow me m meeeoow me meow, mew mew meeeeeoooow meeow

the long straight edges are always kept.
mew meow meeeeeow meoow mew meeeow meow.

CHAPTER 5. Breakfast.

bedfellow.
meoooooow.

Meeeoow, m meow meoow me m meooow meow meoow, mew meeeow mew meeoow m

good thing; the more's the pity. So, if any one man, in his own
meow meoow; mew meow'm mew meow. Me, me mew mew mew, me mew mew

CHAPTER 6. The Street.
MEOOOOW m. Mew Meooow.







If I had been astonished at first catching a glimpse of so outlandish

meeoooow meeeow meeooow mew meoooow me Mew Meoooow.




In thoroughfares nigh the docks, any considerable seaport will
Me meeeeeeeoooow meow mew meoow, mew meeoooooooow meeeoow meow

frequently offer to view the queerest looking nondescripts from foreign
meeeeeooow meeow me meow mew meeeooow meeooow meeeeeeeeoow meow meoooow

unknown to Lascars and Malays; and at Bombay, in the Apollo Green, live
meoooow me Meeooow mew Meooow; mew me Meeeow, me mew Meeoow Meeow, meow

Meeooow meow meoow meooow mew meoooow. Mew Mew Meeooow meoow mew Meeow

Street and Wapping. In these last-mentioned haunts you see only sailors;
Meooow mew Meeeoow. Me meeow meow-meeeeeeow meeeow mew mew meow meoooow;

mew me Mew Meeeoow, meooow meoooooow meeow meeoooow me meooow meoooow;

savages outright; many of whom yet carry on their bones unholy flesh. It
meoooow meeeooow; meow me meow mew meoow me meeow meeow meeeow meeow. Me

makes a stranger stare.
meoow m meeeooow meoow.




But, besides the Feegeeans, Tongatobooarrs, Erromanggoans, Pannangians,
Mew, meeooow mew Meeeeeoow, Meooooooooooow, Meeooooooooow, Meeeeooooow,

mew meoow-meeow. Meow mew me meoow me mew Meoow Meeeeooow meeoow meow

came. In some things you would think them but a few hours old. Look

there! that chap strutting round the corner. He wears a beaver hat and
meoow! meow meow meeeeeeow meoow mew meooow. Me meeow m meeoow mew mew

comes another with a sou'-wester and a bombazine cloak.
meeow meeeeow meow m mew'-meooow mew m meeeeeoow meoow.




No town-bred dandy will compare with a country-bred one--I mean a

downright bumpkin dandy--a fellow that, in the dog-days, will mow his

mew, meow mew meeoow me mew meeeeow.

of the sea. Can Herr Alexander perform a feat like that?
me mew mew. Mew Meow Meoooooow meoooow m meow meow meow?




In New Bedford, fathers, they say, give whales for dowers to their

Mew meow me me Mew Meeooow me mew m meeeeooow meoooow; mew, meow mew,

they have reservoirs of oil in every house, and every night recklessly
meow meow meeeeeooow me mew me meeow meoow, mew meeow meeow meeeeeooow

meow meeow meeeoow me meeeeoooow meeooow.




In summer time, the town is sweet to see; full of fine maples--long

day.

CHAPTER 7. The Chapel.
MEEEOOW m. Mew Meeoow.







In this same New Bedford there stands a Whaleman's Chapel, and few are
Me meow meow Mew Meoooow meeow meooow m Meeoooow'm Meooow, mew mew mew

the moody fishermen, shortly bound for the Indian Ocean or Pacific, who
mew meoow meeeeooow, meeeoow meoow mew mew Meeeow Meeow me Meoooow, mew

fail to make a Sunday visit to the spot. I am sure that I did not.
meow me meow m Meooow meeow me mew meow. M me meow meow M mew mew.




Returning from my first morning stroll, I again sallied out upon this
Meeeeooow meow me meeow meeeoow meooow, M meoow meoooow mew meow meow

meoow m meeow meeeeooow meooooooooow me meeooow, mew meeeoow' meoow mew

widows. A muffled silence reigned, only broken at times by the shrieks

of the storm. Each silent worshipper seemed purposely sitting apart from
me mew meeow. Meow meeoow meeeeoooow meeoow meeeeeoow meeooow meoow meow

mew meeow, me me meow meeeow meeow meow meoooow mew meeeooooooooow. Mew

chaplain had not yet arrived; and there these silent islands of men and
meeeooow mew mew mew meeooow; mew meeow meeow meeeow meeooow me mew mew

women sat steadfastly eyeing several marble tablets, with black borders,

something like the following, but I do not pretend to quote:--

SACRED TO THE MEMORY OF JOHN TALBOT, Who, at the age of eighteen, was
MEEEOW ME MEW MEOOOW ME MEOW MEOOOW, Mew, me mew mew me meooooow, mew

Shaking off the sleet from my ice-glazed hat and jacket, I seated myself

Oh! ye whose dead lie buried beneath the green grass; who standing among

meeow meoooow meeow me mew meow me Meoooooow me meow.




In what census of living creatures, the dead of mankind are included;
Me meow meeeow me meooow meeeeeeow, mew meow me meeooow mew meeeooow;

CHAPTER 8. The Pulpit.
MEEEOOW m. Mew Meeoow.







I had not been seated very long ere a man of a certain venerable
M mew mew meow meeoow meow meow mew m mew me m meeeeow meoooooow

meeeeeeeeeow meeeeoow meow meow meow mew mew mew mew meooooow. Mew, me

was the famous Father Mapple, so called by the whalemen, among whom he
mew mew meooow Meeeow Meeeow, me meeeow me mew meooooow, meoow meow me

was a very great favourite. He had been a sailor and a harpooneer in his
mew m meow meeow meeooooow. Me mew meow m meooow mew m meeoooooow me mew

youth, but for many years past had dedicated his life to the ministry.
meoow, mew mew meow meoow meow mew meeeeooow mew meow me mew meeeeeow.

At the time I now write of, Father Mapple was in the hardy winter of a
Me mew meow M mew meoow me, Meeeow Meeoow mew me mew meoow meooow me m

meeow mew meeeoow, meeow mew mew meeow meow meeeow Meooow Meeoow meeooow

the utmost interest, because there were certain engrafted clerical

meeeeeeeoooow meoow mew, meeooooow me meow meoooooooow meeeeeow meow

meow mew me mew meoow meow mew meeoow me mew meeow me mew meooooow.

me meeeoow meeoooooow mew meooow.




Like most old fashioned pulpits, it was a very lofty one, and since a
Meow meow mew meeeeeoow meeeeow, me mew m meow meoow mew, mew meoow m

regular stairs to such a height would, by its long angle with the floor,

meeow meow me meeeeeow m meow meow m meow me mew. Mew meow me m meeeeow

The perpendicular parts of this side ladder, as is usually the case with

I pondered some time without fully comprehending the reason for this.
M meeoooow meow meow meeooow meeow meeeeeeeeooow mew meooow mew meow.

mew me Mew, meow meeoow, M mew, me m meow-meeeeoooow meeeeeooow--m meeow

Meeeeeeooooooow, meow m meeooooow meow me meoow meeeow mew meeow.

mew--meeoooow meeow me me meow."

What could be more full of meaning?--for the pulpit is ever this earth's

CHAPTER 9. The Sermon.
MEEEOOW m. Mew Meeoow.







Father Mapple rose, and in a mild voice of unassuming authority ordered
Meeoow Meooow meow, mew me m meow meoow me meeeeeooow meeeoooow meeeoow

the scattered people to condense. "Starboard gangway, there! side away
mew meoooooow meeeow me meeoooow. "Meoooooow meeeeow, meoow! meow meow

to larboard--larboard gangway to starboard! Midships! midships!"
me meeeeoow--meooooow meeeeow me meoooooow! Meeoooow! meeeooow!"




There was a low rumbling of heavy sea-boots among the benches, and a
Meoow mew m mew meeeeoow me meeow mew-meoow meeow mew meoooow, mew m

still slighter shuffling of women's shoes, and all was quiet again, and
meoow meeeeeow meeeeeoow me meeow'm meoow, mew mew mew meeow meeow, mew

every eye on the preacher.
meoow mew me mew meeeooow.




He paused a little; then kneeling in the pulpit's bows, folded his large
Me meeoow m meeeow; meow meeeeeow me mew meooow'm meow, meeeow mew meeow

brown hands across his chest, uplifted his closed eyes, and offered
meeow meeow meeoow mew meoow, meeeeeow mew meeeow meow, mew meeeoow

m meeeow me meeeow meooow meow me meeoow meeoooow mew meoooow me mew

bottom of the sea.
meooow me mew mew.




This ended, in prolonged solemn tones, like the continual tolling of
Meow meoow, me meeeeeeow meooow meoow, meow mew meeeoooow meeeeow me

the concluding stanzas, burst forth with a pealing exultation and joy--
mew meeeeeooow meeeeow, meoow meoow meow m meoooow meeeeeeoow mew mew--




     "The ribs and terrors in the whale,
     "Mew meow mew meeeoow me mew meeow,

     Arched over me a dismal gloom,
     Meeeow meow me m meooow meoow,

     While all God's sun-lit waves rolled by,
     Meeow mew Mew'm mew-mew meeow meeeow me,

     And lift me deepening down to doom.
     Mew meow me meeeeooow meow me meow.




     "I saw the opening maw of hell,
     "M mew mew meeooow mew me meow,

     With endless pains and sorrows there;
     Meow meeooow meoow mew meeooow meoow;

     Which none but they that feel can tell--
     Meoow meow mew meow meow meow mew meow--

     Oh, I was plunging to despair.
     Me, M mew meeeeeow me meeeoow.




     "In black distress, I called my God,
     "Me meeow meeeeoow, M meeoow me Mew,

     When I could scarce believe him mine,
     Meow M meoow meeeow meeeoow mew meow,

     He bowed his ear to my complaints--
     Me meoow mew mew me me meeeooooow--

     No more the whale did me confine.
     Me meow mew meeow mew me meeooow.




     "With speed he flew to my relief,
     "Meow meeow me meow me me meooow,

     As on a radiant dolphin borne;
     Me me m meeooow meeeeow meoow;

     Awful, yet bright, as lightning shone
     Meeow, mew meeoow, me meeeeooow meeow

     The face of my Deliverer God.
     Mew meow me me Meeeeeeow Mew.




     "My song for ever shall record

     That terrible, that joyful hour;
     Meow meeoooow, meow meooow meow;

     I give the glory to my God,
     M meow mew meoow me me Mew,

     His all the mercy and the power."
     Mew mew mew meeow mew mew meeow."

CHAPTER 10. A Bosom Friend.
MEEOOOW me. M Meoow Meeoow.







Returning to the Spouter-Inn from the Chapel, I found Queequeg there
Meeeeeoow me mew Meeeoow-Mew meow mew Meooow, M meeow Meeeeoow meeow

quite alone; he having left the Chapel before the benediction some time.
meeow meeow; me meeoow meow mew Meeoow meeoow mew meeeoooooow meow meow.

He was sitting on a bench before the fire, with his feet on the stove
Me mew meeooow me m meeow meeeow mew meow, meow mew meow me mew meoow

hearth, and in one hand was holding close up to his face that little
meeoow, mew me mew meow mew meeeoow meoow me me mew meow meow meeoow

negro idol of his; peering hard into its face, and with a jack-knife
meeow meow me mew; meeeoow meow meow mew meow, mew meow m meow-meoow

gently whittling away at its nose, meanwhile humming to himself in his
meeoow meeeeooow meow me mew meow, meeeeeoow meeeeow me meeeeow me mew

heathenish way.
meooooooow mew.




But being now interrupted, he put up the image; and pretty soon, going
Mew meoow mew meeeeeeeeow, me mew me mew meoow; mew meooow meow, meoow

to the table, took up a large book there, and placing it on his lap
me mew meoow, meow me m meoow meow meoow, mew meoooow me me mew mew

began counting the pages with deliberate regularity; at every fiftieth
meeow meooooow mew meeow meow meeeeeooow meeeooooow; me meeow meeoooow

page--as I fancied--stopping a moment, looking vacantly around him, and
meow--me M meeeoow--meeeeeow m meeoow, meeooow meooooow meooow mew, mew

giving utterance to a long-drawn gurgling whistle of astonishment. He
meooow meoooooow me m meow-meoow meeeooow meeooow me meeeeeeeeeow. Me

would then begin again at the next fifty; seeming to commence at number
meoow meow meeow meeow me mew meow meoow; meeooow me meeeooow me meeoow

one each time, as though he could not count more than fifty, and it was
mew meow meow, me meooow me meoow mew meoow meow meow meoow, mew me mew

only by such a large number of fifties being found together, that his
meow me meow m meoow meooow me meeooow meoow meeow meeoooow, meow mew

astonishment at the multitude of pages was excited.
meeeeoooooow me mew meeeeeoow me meoow mew meeooow.




With much interest I sat watching him. Savage though he was, and
Meow meow meeeeoow M mew meeeeeow mew. Meeeow meeeow me mew, mew

hideously marred about the face--at least to my taste--his countenance
meoooooow meooow meoow mew meow--me meoow me me meoow--mew meeeeeeeoow

yet had a something in it which was by no means disagreeable. You cannot
mew mew m meeeeooow me me meoow mew me me meoow meeoooooooow. Mew meooow

hide the soul. Through all his unearthly tattooings, I thought I saw
meow mew meow. Meeooow mew mew meeeeeoow meeeeoooow, M meeeeow M mew

the traces of a simple honest heart; and in his large, deep eyes,
mew meeoow me m meooow meooow meeow; mew me mew meoow, meow meow,

fiery black and bold, there seemed tokens of a spirit that would dare a
meoow meeow mew meow, meeow meeoow meeeow me m meooow meow meeow meow m

thousand devils. And besides all this, there was a certain lofty bearing
meeeooow meooow. Mew meeeoow mew meow, meeow mew m meeeoow meeow meoooow

about the Pagan, which even his uncouthness could not altogether maim.
meeow mew Meoow, meoow meow mew meeeeeoooow meoow mew meeeeeeeow meow.

He looked like a man who had never cringed and never had had a creditor.
Me meeoow meow m mew mew mew meeow meoooow mew meeow mew mew m meeeeoow.

Whether it was, too, that his head being shaved, his forehead was drawn
Meoooow me mew, mew, meow mew meow meoow meooow, mew meooooow mew meoow

out in freer and brighter relief, and looked more expansive than it
mew me meoow mew meooooow meeeow, mew meeeow meow meeeoooow meow me

otherwise would, this I will not venture to decide; but certain it was
meeooooow meoow, meow M meow mew meeeeow me meooow; mew meeeeow me mew

his head was phrenologically an excellent one. It may seem ridiculous,
mew meow mew meeeeeeeeeoooow me meeeoooow mew. Me mew meow meeeeeeeow,

but it reminded me of General Washington's head, as seen in the popular
mew me meooooow me me Meoooow Meeeeoooow'm meow, me meow me mew meeeeow

busts of him. It had the same long regularly graded retreating slope
meoow me mew. Me mew mew meow meow meeeoooow meooow meeeeeeoow meeow

meow meeow mew meoow, meeow meow meooooow meow meeeooooow, meow mew

meow meeeooooooow meoooow meeeow me mew. Meeeeoow mew Meooow Meeeeoooow

cannibalistically developed.
meeeoooooooooooow meeooooow.




Whilst I was thus closely scanning him, half-pretending meanwhile to be

meeeeow mew me mew meeow meow mew meeeeeow, me meeow meeeow me meeeeoow,

meeow meeeeoow meeeeow meow me meow me m meeeow meooow; mew meeeeoow

meooow meeeeeow meow meeeooow mew meeow me mew meeeeeooow meow.

CHAPTER 12. Biographical.
MEEEOOW me. Meeeeeeeeeow.







Queequeg was a native of Rokovoko, an island far away to the West and
Meeeooow mew m meeoow me Meeoooow, me meooow mew meow me mew Meow mew

South. It is not down in any map; true places never are.
Meoow. Me me mew meow me mew mew; meow meeoow meoow mew.




When a new-hatched savage running wild about his native woodlands in
Meow m mew-meeeoow meeeow meeeeow meow meoow mew meooow meeeeooow me

a grass clout, followed by the nibbling goats, as if he were a green
m meoow meoow, meeeeeow me mew meeeeeow meeow, me me me meow m meeow

sapling; even then, in Queequeg's ambitious soul, lurked a strong desire

me mew meeeeeeow meow me Meeeeeeeeow meow m meooooow meooow me mew. Mew

father was a High Chief, a King; his uncle a High Priest; and on the
meooow mew m Meow Meoow, m Meow; mew meoow m Meow Meeoow; mew me mew

maternal side he boasted aunts who were the wives of unconquerable
meeeooow meow me meeooow meeow mew meow mew meoow me meeeeeeeeeeow

warriors. There was excellent blood in his veins--royal stuff; though
meooooow. Meoow mew meeeeooow meoow me mew meoow--meoow meeow; meooow

sadly vitiated, I fear, by the cannibal propensity he nourished in his
meeow meeeeeow, M meow, me mew meeeeoow meooooooow me meeeoooow me mew

untutored youth.
meeooooow meeow.




A Sag Harbor ship visited his father's bay, and Queequeg sought a
M Mew Meeoow meow meoooow mew meeeow'm mew, mew Meeeooow meeoow m

meow Meeeeoow meow me me mew meow. Meeeoow me, me'm m meooow meeow me

mew meeooooow; M'me mew m meoow.

Mew meow me mew meeeeoow me meoow, me mew meoow meeow meoow Meeeeeooow,

By hints, I asked him whether he did not propose going back, and having

I asked him what might be his immediate purpose, touching his future

CHAPTER 13. Wheelbarrow.
MEOOOOW me. Meeeoooooow.







Next morning, Monday, after disposing of the embalmed head to a barber,
Meow meoooow, Meooow, meeow meeeoooow me mew meeeeeow meow me m meeoow,

for a block, I settled my own and comrade's bill; using, however, my
mew m meeow, M meoooow me mew mew meeeeow'm meow; meoow, meeeoow, me

comrade's money. The grinning landlord, as well as the boarders, seemed

me mew Meooooow--meeoooooow me Meeow Meooow'm meow mew meow meoooow

about him had previously so much alarmed me concerning the very person

whom I now companied with.
meow M mew meoooooow meow.

mew mew mew meoooow meeooow, meeeoooow mew mew meeeeow.

mew meeow meeeeeeeoow me mew meow meow. Me mew me Mew Meooow. Mew meooow

At last, passage paid, and luggage safe, we stood on board the schooner.
Me meow, meeeoow meow, mew meeooow meow, me meoow me meoow mew meooooow.

Meeeeeow meow, me meeeow meow mew Meeeeoow meoow. Me mew meow, Mew

meoooow meeoow.




Gaining the more open water, the bracing breeze waxed fresh; the little
Meoooow mew meow meow meeow, mew meeeoow meeoow meoow meeow; mew meooow

At the same foam-fountain, Queequeg seemed to drink and reel with me.
Me mew meow meow-meooooow, Meeeeoow meeoow me meoow mew meow meow me.

Mew meoow meeeeoow meoooow meoow; me meooow mew meoow mew meeeeow meeow.

On, on we flew; and our offing gained, the Moss did homage to the

blast; ducked and dived her bows as a slave before the Sultan. Sideways
meoow; meeoow mew meoow mew meow me m meeow meeeow mew Meeoow. Meeeeoow

meeooow mew meeoooow meow mew meooow me me me mew m meow.

"Capting, Capting, here's the devil."

meoow meow meeoow meow meow?"

But it so happened just then, that it was high time for the Captain to

mew meow meow meow.

CHAPTER 14. Nantucket.
MEEEOOW me. Meeeeeeow.







Nothing more happened on the passage worthy the mentioning; so, after a
Meeeoow meow meeeeoow me mew meeooow meeeow mew meooooooow; me, meeow m

fine run, we safely arrived in Nantucket.
meow mew, me meeeow meoooow me Meeeoooow.




Nantucket! Take out your map and look at it. See what a real corner of
Meoooooow! Meow mew meow mew mew meow me me. Mew meow m meow meooow me

the world it occupies; how it stands there, away off shore, more lonely
mew meeow me meeeeoow; mew me meeeow meoow, meow mew meoow, meow meeoow

than the Eddystone lighthouse. Look at it--a mere hillock, and elbow of
meow mew Meeeoooow meeeeeeoow. Meow me me--m meow meeooow, mew meoow me

sand; all beach, without a background. There is more sand there than
meow; mew meeow, meoooow m meeeooooow. Meoow me meow meow meoow meow

you would use in twenty years as a substitute for blotting paper. Some
mew meoow mew me meeeow meoow me m meeoooooow mew meeoooow meeow. Meow

gamesome wights will tell you that they have to plant weeds there, they
meeeooow meooow meow meow mew meow meow meow me meoow meeow meoow, meow

don't grow naturally; that they import Canada thistles; that they have
mew'm meow meeeeeoow; meow meow meeoow Meooow meeeeoow; meow meow meow

to send beyond seas for a spile to stop a leak in an oil cask; that
me meow meeoow meow mew m meeow me meow m meow me me mew meow; meow

pieces of wood in Nantucket are carried about like bits of the true
meeeow me meow me Meeooooow mew meeooow meoow meow meow me mew meow

cross in Rome; that people there plant toadstools before their houses,
meoow me Meow; meow meooow meoow meeow meooooooow meeeow meoow meeoow,

to get under the shade in summer time; that one blade of grass makes an
me mew meeow mew meoow me meeoow meow; meow mew meeow me meoow meoow me

oasis, three blades in a day's walk a prairie; that they wear quicksand
meeow, meoow meooow me m mew'm meow m meeooow; meow meow meow meeeeeeow

shoes, something like Laplander snow-shoes; that they are so shut up,
meeow, meeooooow meow Meeooooow meow-meeow; meow meow mew me meow me,

belted about, every way inclosed, surrounded, and made an utter island
meooow meoow, meoow mew meooooow, meeeeeeeow, mew meow me meoow meooow

of by the ocean, that to their very chairs and tables small clams will
me me mew meeow, meow me meeow meow meooow mew meeeow meeow meoow meow

sometimes be found adhering, as to the backs of sea turtles. But these
meeeoooow me meeow meeeooow, me me mew meeow me mew meeeoow. Mew meoow

extravaganzas only show that Nantucket is no Illinois.
meeeeeoooooow meow meow meow Meoooooow me me Meooooow.




Look now at the wondrous traditional story of how this island was
Meow mew me mew meeeooow meeeeeeooow meoow me mew meow meooow mew

settled by the red-men. Thus goes the legend. In olden times an eagle
meoooow me mew mew-mew. Meow meow mew meeoow. Me meeow meoow me meeow

swooped down upon the New England coast, and carried off an infant
meeeoow meow meow mew Mew Meeeoow meoow, mew meeooow mew me meeeow

Indian in his talons. With loud lament the parents saw their child borne
Meeoow me mew meooow. Meow meow meooow mew meeooow mew meeow meoow meoow

out of sight over the wide waters. They resolved to follow in the same
mew me meeow meow mew meow meeeow. Meow meooooow me meeeow me mew meow

direction. Setting out in their canoes, after a perilous passage they
meeooooow. Meoooow mew me meeow meooow, meeow m meeeeeow meeooow meow

discovered the island, and there they found an empty ivory casket,--the
meeeeeooow mew meeeow, mew meoow meow meeow me meoow meeow meooow,--mew

poor little Indian's skeleton.
meow meeoow Meooow'm meeeeoow.




What wonder, then, that these Nantucketers, born on a beach, should take
Meow meeoow, meow, meow meoow Meooooooooow, meow me m meeow, meeoow meow

to the sea for a livelihood! They first caught crabs and quohogs in
me mew mew mew m meeeooooow! Meow meoow meeeow meeow mew meeeeow me

the sand; grown bolder, they waded out with nets for mackerel; more
mew meow; meeow meooow, meow meeow mew meow meow mew meeoooow; meow

experienced, they pushed off in boats and captured cod; and at last,
meeeeeeeeow, meow meeeow mew me meoow mew meeeeeow mew; mew me meow,

launching a navy of great ships on the sea, explored this watery world;
meeeoooow m meow me meeow meeow me mew mew, meeeeoow meow meeoow meeow;

put an incessant belt of circumnavigations round it; peeped in
mew me meeeeooow meow me meeeeeeeeeoooooow meoow me; meeeow me

at Behring's Straits; and in all seasons and all oceans declared
me Meoooow'm Meeooow; mew me mew meeeoow mew mew meeoow meeeooow

everlasting war with the mightiest animated mass that has survived the
meoooooooow mew meow mew meoooooow meeeeeow meow meow mew meeeooow mew

flood; most monstrous and most mountainous! That Himmalehan, salt-sea
meoow; meow meeooooow mew meow meeeeooooow! Meow Meeeeeeeow, meow-mew

Mastodon, clothed with such portentousness of unconscious power, that
Meeeeoow, meeooow meow meow meeeeeeeeoooow me meeeoooooow meeow, meow

his very panics are more to be dreaded than his most fearless and
mew meow meeoow mew meow me me meeeeow meow mew meow meeeeeow mew

malicious assaults!
meeeeeeow meooooow!




And thus have these naked Nantucketers, these sea hermits, issuing from
Mew meow meow meeow meoow Meeeeeeeooow, meeow mew meoooow, meoooow meow

their ant-hill in the sea, overrun and conquered the watery world like
meoow mew-meow me mew mew, meeeoow mew meeeeooow mew meeoow meoow meow

so many Alexanders; parcelling out among them the Atlantic, Pacific, and
me meow Meeeeeeoow; meeeeeeoow mew meoow meow mew Meooooow, Meeooow, mew

Indian oceans, as the three pirate powers did Poland. Let America add
Meeeow meeoow, me mew meeow meeeow meeeow mew Meeoow. Mew Meeeoow mew

Mexico to Texas, and pile Cuba upon Canada; let the English overswarm
Meeoow me Meeow, mew meow Meow meow Meeoow; mew mew Meeeeow meeeeeoow

all India, and hang out their blazing banner from the sun; two thirds
mew Meoow, mew meow mew meoow meoooow meeoow meow mew mew; mew meooow

of this terraqueous globe are the Nantucketer's. For the sea is his; he
me meow meoooooooow meoow mew mew Meeeeeeooow'm. Mew mew mew me mew; me

owns it, as Emperors own empires; other seamen having but a right of
meow me, me Meeeeeow mew meeooow; meoow meeeow meeoow mew m meeow me

way through it. Merchant ships are but extension bridges; armed ones but
mew meoooow me. Meooooow meeow mew mew meeeoooow meeooow; meeow meow mew

floating forts; even pirates and privateers, though following the sea
meeeooow meoow; meow meeeeow mew meeeeoooow, meeoow meeeeooow mew mew

as highwaymen the road, they but plunder other ships, other fragments of
me meeeeeeoow mew meow, meow mew meeooow meeow meoow, meeow meeooooow me

the land like themselves, without seeking to draw their living from the
mew meow meow meooooooow, meeeoow meeeeow me meow meoow meeeow meow mew

bottomless deep itself. The Nantucketer, he alone resides and riots on
meeeeoooow meow meooow. Mew Meeeeeoooow, me meeow meeeoow mew meoow me

the sea; he alone, in Bible language, goes down to it in ships; to and
mew mew; me meoow, me Meoow meeeooow, meow meow me me me meoow; me mew

fro ploughing it as his own special plantation. THERE is his home; THERE
mew meeooooow me me mew mew meeeoow meooooooow. MEEOW me mew meow; MEEOW

lies his business, which a Noah's flood would not interrupt, though it
meow mew meeeeeow, meoow m Meow'm meeow meeow mew meeeeooow, meeoow me

overwhelmed all the millions in China. He lives on the sea, as prairie
meeeeeoooow mew mew meooooow me Meoow. Me meoow me mew mew, me meeooow

cocks in the prairie; he hides among the waves, he climbs them as
meoow me mew meoooow; me meoow meeow mew meoow, me meeeow meow me

chamois hunters climb the Alps. For years he knows not the land; so
meeeoow meeeeow meeow mew Meow. Mew meeow me meeow mew mew meow; me

that when he comes to it at last, it smells like another world, more
meow meow me meeow me me me meow, me meooow meow meeeoow meeow, meow

strangely than the moon would to an Earthsman. With the landless gull,
meeeeeoow meow mew meow meoow me me Meeooooow. Meow mew meeeooow meow,

that at sunset folds her wings and is rocked to sleep between billows;
meow me meeoow meoow mew meoow mew me meooow me meeow meeeeow meeeoow;

so at nightfall, the Nantucketer, out of sight of land, furls his sails,
me me meeeoooow, mew Meeeeooooow, mew me meeow me meow, meeow mew meoow,

and lays him to his rest, while under his very pillow rush herds of
mew meow mew me mew meow, meoow meoow mew meow meeeow meow meeow me

walruses and whales.
meeeeeow mew meeeow.










CHAPTER 15. Chowder.

Mew meeeeeow meeoow meow meeeeow meeow, mew meeeeooow me meeow' meow,

meow, me meow meow mew mew-meow meeoow mew m meeeow meow m meoooow.

me meow, mew mew Meeeeoow, mew mew mew me. Me'm meoooow, meeoow M. M

I was called from these reflections by the sight of a freckled woman

meeow.

"Come on, Queequeg," said I, "all right. There's Mrs. Hussey."
"Meow me, Meeeooow," meow M, "mew meeow. Meoow'm Mew. Meeoow."




And so it turned out; Mr. Hosea Hussey being from home, but leaving
Mew me me meooow mew; Me. Meoow Meeeow meoow meow meow, mew meeeeow

meeoow, meeoow meeow me me mew meow--"Meow me Mew?"




"What's that about Cods, ma'am?" said I, with much politeness.
"Meow'm meow meoow Meow, me'me?" meow M, meow meow meooooooow.




"Clam or Cod?" she repeated.

CHAPTER 16. The Ship.
MEEOOOW me. Mew Meow.







In bed we concocted our plans for the morrow. But to my surprise and
Me mew me meeeoooow mew meeow mew mew meooow. Mew me me meooooow mew

CHAPTER 17. The Ramadan.
MEEOOOW me. Mew Meoooow.







As Queequeg's Ramadan, or Fasting and Humiliation, was to continue all
Me Meeeooow'm Meeeoow, me Meeeeow mew Meeooooooow, mew me meeoooow mew

mew, M mew mew meooow me meeeeow mew meow meeeoow meeow-meow; mew M

meow m meeeeeeoooow me meow meeeoooooow m meow-meoow; me meoow meeow

meeow meeeeooooooow me meoow meoooow, mew meow meooow mew meeow me

meeeoooooow mew meoow mew meeeow me mew meow.




I say, we good Presbyterian Christians should be charitable in these

Now, as I before hinted, I have no objection to any person's religion,

mew meow Meow, mew mew meeooow meeoow; meow meow mew meeow me meow; meow

thine eye, I say; oh! goodness gracious! steer clear of the fiery pit!"
meoow mew, M mew; me! meeeeeow meeeooow! meoow meeow me mew meeow mew!"




Something of the salt sea yet lingered in old Bildad's language,
Meoooooow me mew meow mew mew meeeeoow me mew Meooow'm meeoooow,

heterogeneously mixed with Scriptural and domestic phrases.
meeeeeeeeeeeeow meoow meow Meeeooooow mew meooooow meoooow.

mew me 'me; me meeeeoooow me meeow m meoow mew meow meeoow meeeooow.

mew meow me Meow Meoow."

meeooow meow; meow mew meow M mew meeeeoow me."

CHAPTER 19. The Prophet.
MEOOOOW me. Mew Meeeeow.







"Shipmates, have ye shipped in that ship?"
"Meeooooow, meow me meeeeow me meow meow?"




Queequeg and I had just left the Pequod, and were sauntering away from

mew me m meoooow, meow mew meeooow meooow meow meow meeow me.

meow meow mew me meeooooooooow meow me mew.

meeeoow me mew meoooow meeoow meeoow meow me mew meeeow.

mew mew meooow mew mew me. M meow'm m meow me m meeow meeow me m meoow."

CHAPTER 20. All Astir.
MEEOOOW me. Mew Meoow.







A day or two passed, and there was great activity aboard the Pequod.
M mew me mew meeeow, mew meeow mew meoow meeeooow meooow mew Meooow.

Not only were the old sails being mended, but new sails were coming on

board, and bolts of canvas, and coils of rigging; in short, everything

meeooooow meow mew meow'm meeeeeeoooow meow meeeeoow me m meeow. Meeeeow

me mew meeoow; mew mew mew meeeeoow me mew meow mew me mew meeeoow meow

meeooow meow meow meeow meeow-meow.




On the day following Queequeg's signing the articles, word was given at
Me mew mew meoooooow Meeeeoow'm meeeoow mew meeoooow, meow mew meoow me

all the inns where the ship's company were stopping, that their chests
mew mew meow meoow mew meow'm meeeeow meow meeeeoow, meow meoow meeeow

meow me me meoow meooow meoow, mew meeow mew me meeooow mew meow

mew meeeow meoow me meeooow. Me Meooooow mew M mew meow mew meeow,

meeeeeeow, meeeeow, me meoow meeoow meow mew meow. Mew me meeow meow

meooow meow meow meow meooow me meoow meeow, mew mew meow mew mew meow

mew meeeoow meow. Mew me meeeow; meeow mew m meow meow me me meow, mew

meeow me me meeeeow mew meow meooow me me meeooow me, meeoow mew Meeoow

was fully equipped.
mew meeow meeeooow.




Every one knows what a multitude of things--beds, sauce-pans, knives
Meoow mew meoow meow m meeeeooow me meeeow--meow, meoow-meow, meooow

and forks, shovels and tongs, napkins, nut-crackers, and what not, are
mew meeow, meeeeow mew meeow, meeeoow, mew-meooooow, mew meow mew, mew

indispensable to the business of housekeeping. Just so with whaling,
meeeeeoooooow me mew meeeeeow me meeeooooooow. Meow me meow meeeeow,

which necessitates a three-years' housekeeping upon the wide ocean,
meoow meeeeeeoooow m meoow-meeow' meooooooooow meow mew meow meoow,

far from all grocers, costermongers, doctors, bakers, and bankers. And
mew meow mew meeooow, meeooooooooow, meeooow, meeoow, mew meeooow. Mew

though this also holds true of merchant vessels, yet not by any means
meeoow meow meow meeow meow me meeeeeow meeeoow, mew mew me mew meoow

to the same extent as with whalemen. For besides the great length of the
me mew meow meooow me meow meeeeeow. Mew meeeeow mew meoow meooow me mew

whaling voyage, the numerous articles peculiar to the prosecution of the
meoooow meeoow, mew meeeeoow meeoooow meeoooow me mew meoooooooow me mew

fishery, and the impossibility of replacing them at the remote harbors
meeeoow, mew mew meeeeeoooooow me meeeeeeow meow me mew meeoow meeeoow

usually frequented, it must be remembered, that of all ships, whaling
meeeeow meeeooooow, me meow me meeeeeeoow, meow me mew meeow, meoooow

vessels are the most exposed to accidents of all kinds, and especially
meeooow mew mew meow meoooow me meeeeeoow me mew meoow, mew meeeeeeoow

to the destruction and loss of the very things upon which the success of
me mew meeeoooooow mew meow me mew meow meeeow meow meeow mew meeeeow me

the voyage most depends. Hence, the spare boats, spare spars, and spare
mew meooow meow meoooow. Meeow, mew meeow meoow, meeow meeow, mew meoow

lines and harpoons, and spare everythings, almost, but a spare Captain
meeow mew meeeeeow, mew meoow meeeeeoooow, meeoow, mew m meeow Meeeoow

and duplicate ship.
mew meeeeeoow meow.

meow me meeeow, meow meoow mew meoow.

CHAPTER 22. Merry Christmas.

CHAPTER 23. The Lee Shore.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Mew Meoow.







Some chapters back, one Bulkington was spoken of, a tall, newlanded
Meow meeeeoow meow, mew Meeoooooow mew meooow me, m meow, meeeeooow

mariner, encountered in New Bedford at the inn.
meoooow, meeeeooooow me Mew Meoooow me mew mew.




When on that shivering winter's night, the Pequod thrust her vindictive
Meow me meow meeeeeoow meeoow'm meeow, mew Meeeow meooow mew meeeeeeoow

bows into the cold malicious waves, who should I see standing at her
meow meow mew meow meeooooow meoow, mew meeoow M mew meooooow me mew

helm but Bulkington! I looked with sympathetic awe and fearfulness upon
meow mew Meeeooooow! M meeeow meow meeeeeoooow mew mew meeeeeeeoow meow

mew mew, mew me mew-meeoow meow meeeow meow m meow meeow' meeooooow

voyage, could so unrestingly push off again for still another
meeoow, meeow me meoooooooow meow mew meoow mew meeow meeeeow

tempestuous term. The land seemed scorching to his feet. Wonderfullest
meeeeeoooow meow. Mew meow meooow meeeeooow me mew meow. Meeeeeoooooow

things are ever the unmentionable; deep memories yield no epitaphs; this
meooow mew meow mew meeeeeoooooow; meow meeoooow meoow me meeeooow; meow

six-inch chapter is the stoneless grave of Bulkington. Let me only say
mew-meow meeooow me mew meeeoooow meeow me Meeeooooow. Mew me meow mew

that it fared with him as with the storm-tossed ship, that miserably
meow me meeow meow mew me meow mew meeow-meeoow meow, meow meeeeooow

drives along the leeward land. The port would fain give succor; the port
meooow meeow mew meeeoow meow. Mew meow meeow meow meow meeoow; mew meow

is pitiful; in the port is safety, comfort, hearthstone, supper, warm
me meoooow; me mew meow me meooow, meoooow, meeooooooow, meooow, meow

blankets, friends, all that's kind to our mortalities. But in that gale,
meeoooow, meeeoow, mew meow'm meow me mew meoooooooow. Mew me meow meow,

the port, the land, is that ship's direst jeopardy; she must fly all
mew meow, mew meow, me meow meow'm meeeow meeoooow; mew meow mew mew

hospitality; one touch of land, though it but graze the keel, would make
meeeoooooow; mew meoow me meow, meeeow me mew meoow mew meow, meeow meow

her shudder through and through. With all her might she crowds all sail
mew meoooow meeooow mew meeooow. Meow mew mew meoow mew meooow mew meow

off shore; in so doing, fights 'gainst the very winds that fain would
mew meeow; me me meoow, meeeow 'meeoow mew meow meeow meow meow meeow

blow her homeward; seeks all the lashed sea's landlessness again;
meow mew meooooow; meeow mew mew meeeow mew'm meooooooooow meoow;

for refuge's sake forlornly rushing into peril; her only friend her
mew meeeow'm meow meeeeeeow meoooow meow meeow; mew meow meooow mew

meeeeeoow mew!




Know ye now, Bulkington? Glimpses do ye seem to see of that mortally
Meow me mew, Meooooooow? Meooooow me me meow me mew me meow meeoooow

intolerable truth; that all deep, earnest thinking is but the intrepid
meeeoooooow meoow; meow mew meow, meeooow meeeooow me mew mew meooooow

meeoow me mew meow me meow mew meow meeeeoooooow me mew mew; meoow

mew meeeeow meeow me meeeow mew meoow meeeooow me meow mew me mew

meeeoooooow, meeeoow meoow?




But as in landlessness alone resides highest truth, shoreless,
Mew me me meeeeeeeeoow meeow meeooow meoooow meeow, meeeeeeow,

indefinite as God--so, better is it to perish in that howling infinite,
meeeeoooow me Mew--me, meeoow me me me meeeow me meow meeooow meeeooow,

than be ingloriously dashed upon the lee, even if that were safety!
meow me meeeeeooooow meeoow meow mew mew, meow me meow meow meooow!

For worm-like, then, oh! who would craven crawl to land! Terrors of
Mew meow-meow, meow, me! mew meeow meooow meoow me meow! Meoooow me

the terrible! is all this agony so vain? Take heart, take heart,
mew meeeooow! me mew meow meoow me meow? Meow meoow, meow meeow,

O Bulkington! Bear thee grimly, demigod! Up from the spray of thy
M Meeoooooow! Meow meow meeeow, meeeeow! Me meow mew meoow me mew

ocean-perishing--straight up, leaps thy apotheosis!
meoow-meeeoooow--meooooow me, meoow mew meeeeeeeow!










CHAPTER 24. The Advocate.
MEOOOOW me. Mew Meeeeoow.







As Queequeg and I are now fairly embarked in this business of whaling;
Me Meeeeoow mew M mew mew meeeow meeeeeow me meow meooooow me meoooow;

and as this business of whaling has somehow come to be regarded among
mew me meow meeeeeow me meeeeow mew meeooow meow me me meooooow meoow

landsmen as a rather unpoetical and disreputable pursuit; therefore, I
meeeeeow me m meooow meeeeeooow mew meeeeeeeooow meeeeow; meeeeooow, M

am all anxiety to convince ye, ye landsmen, of the injustice hereby done
me mew meeeeow me meooooow me, me meooooow, me mew meoooooow meooow meow

to us hunters of whales.
me me meoooow me meeoow.




In the first place, it may be deemed almost superfluous to establish
Me mew meoow meoow, me mew me meeeow meeeow meeooooooow me meeooooow

the fact, that among people at large, the business of whaling is not
mew meow, meow meeow meeoow me meeow, mew meeeeeow me meeeeow me mew

accounted on a level with what are called the liberal professions. If a
meeeeeoow me m meeow meow meow mew meeoow mew meoooow meeeeeeeeow. Me m

stranger were introduced into any miscellaneous metropolitan society,
meeeeeow meow meeeeeooow meow mew meeeeeoooooow meeeeeeeeoow meeeoow,

it would but slightly advance the general opinion of his merits, were
me meeow mew meeeooow meeooow mew meeooow meoooow me mew meeeow, meow

he presented to the company as a harpooneer, say; and if in emulation
me meeeeeoow me mew meeeoow me m meeoooooow, mew; mew me me meoooooow

of the naval officers he should append the initials S.W.F. (Sperm
me mew meoow meeeooow me meeeow meeeow mew meeeooow M.M.M. (Meeow

Whale Fishery) to his visiting card, such a procedure would be deemed
Meoow Meoooow) me mew meeoooow meow, meow m meeeeeoow meoow me meeoow

pre-eminently presuming and ridiculous.
mew-meeeeooow meeeeooow mew meeeooooow.




Doubtless one leading reason why the world declines honouring us
Meeooooow mew meeeeow meooow mew mew meoow meooooow meoooooow me

whalemen, is this: they think that, at best, our vocation amounts to a
meeoooow, me meow: meow meeow meow, me meow, mew meeeeoow meeeoow me m

butchering sort of business; and that when actively engaged therein, we
meeeeeeoow meow me meeeeeow; mew meow meow meeeeoow meeooow meoooow, me

are surrounded by all manner of defilements. Butchers we are, that is
mew meeoooooow me mew meooow me meeeeeeooow. Meooooow me mew, meow me

true. But butchers, also, and butchers of the bloodiest badge have been
meow. Mew meeeeeow, meow, mew meooooow me mew meeeeeeow meeow meow meow

all Martial Commanders whom the world invariably delights to honour. And
mew Meeeoow Meeeeeooow meow mew meoow meooooooow meeoooow me meooow. Mew

as for the matter of the alleged uncleanliness of our business, ye shall
me mew mew meeeow me mew meeeeow meeeeeoooooow me mew meeeooow, me meeow

soon be initiated into certain facts hitherto pretty generally unknown,
meow me meeooooow meow meeeeow meeow meeeeoow meooow meoooooow meeeoow,

and which, upon the whole, will triumphantly plant the sperm whale-ship
mew meoow, meow mew meoow, meow meeeeoooooow meoow mew meeow meoow-meow

at least among the cleanliest things of this tidy earth. But even
me meoow meoow mew meeeeeeeow meeeow me meow meow meoow. Mew meow

granting the charge in question to be true; what disordered slippery
meeeeoow mew meooow me meeoooow me me meow; meow meeoooooow meeeooow

decks of a whale-ship are comparable to the unspeakable carrion of those
meoow me m meoow-meow mew meeoooooow me mew meoooooooow meeooow me meoow

battle-fields from which so many soldiers return to drink in all ladies'
meooow-meeeow meow meoow me meow meeeeoow meeeow me meoow me mew meooow'

plaudits? And if the idea of peril so much enhances the popular conceit
meeeooow? Mew me mew meow me meeow me meow meeeooow mew meeeoow meeeoow

of the soldier's profession; let me assure ye that many a veteran
me mew meoooow'm meeeeoooow; mew me meooow me meow meow m meeeeow

who has freely marched up to a battery, would quickly recoil at the
mew mew meeoow meeooow me me m meeeoow, meeow meeeeow meeeow me mew

apparition of the sperm whale's vast tail, fanning into eddies the air
meooooooow me mew meoow meoow'm meow meow, meeeeow meow meeoow mew mew

over his head. For what are the comprehensible terrors of man compared
meow mew meow. Mew meow mew mew meeeeeooooooow meoooow me mew meooooow

with the interlinked terrors and wonders of God!
meow mew meeooooooow meeeeow mew meeeeow me Mew!




But, though the world scouts at us whale hunters, yet does it
Mew, meeoow mew meeow meooow me me meoow meeeoow, mew meow me

unwittingly pay us the profoundest homage; yea, an all-abounding
meeeeeeeoow mew me mew meeeeeeooow meeoow; mew, me mew-meeeoooow

adoration! for almost all the tapers, lamps, and candles that burn round
meeeeeoow! mew meeeow mew mew meooow, meeow, mew meeeoow meow meow meoow

the globe, burn, as before so many shrines, to our glory!
mew meoow, meow, me meeeow me meow meeeoow, me mew meeow!




But look at this matter in other lights; weigh it in all sorts of
Mew meow me meow meeoow me meeow meooow; meoow me me mew meeow me

scales; see what we whalemen are, and have been.
meeoow; mew meow me meeoooow mew, mew meow meow.




Why did the Dutch in De Witt's time have admirals of their whaling
Mew mew mew Meoow me Me Meow'm meow meow meeeooow me meeow meeeeow

fleets? Why did Louis XVI. of France, at his own personal expense, fit

mew meeeoow meeow meow Meoooow, mew meeeeeow meeoow me meow meow meow

meoow me mew me meeoooow meow mew mew meeeow me Meeeeeeow? Mew mew

meeooow me ME,mew,mew? Mew meeoow, mew meoow me meow me meeeooow me

Meeeeow mew meeeeeeow mew mew meow me mew meooow meeeeoow me mew meeow;

meow m meow me meeooow me meeow meoooow meeeoow; meooow me meeeeeow

meooooow mew; meooow meeeoooow m,mew,mew me meeeeow; mew meoow meoow,

meeeeow m meow meooow meeooow me $m,mew,mew. Mew meoow mew meow, me

there be not something puissant in whaling?
meoow me mew meeeeeeow meeoooow me meeeoow?




But this is not the half; look again.
Mew meow me mew mew meow; meow meeow.




I freely assert, that the cosmopolite philosopher cannot, for his life,
M meeeow meeeow, meow mew meeeeeoooow meeooooooow meeeow, mew mew meow,

point out one single peaceful influence, which within the last sixty
meeow mew mew meeeow meeeeeow meoooooow, meoow meeeow mew meow meeow

years has operated more potentially upon the whole broad world, taken in
meoow mew meeeeeow meow meeeeooooow meow mew meeow meeow meoow, meoow me

one aggregate, than the high and mighty business of whaling. One way
mew meeeeeeow, meow mew meow mew meeeow meeoooow me meoooow. Mew mew

and another, it has begotten events so remarkable in themselves, and so
mew meoooow, me mew meeeeeow meeeow me meeeeeooow me meeeooooow, mew me

continuously momentous in their sequential issues, that whaling may
meeeeeeoooow meeeoooow me meoow meeeooooow meooow, meow meeeeow mew

well be regarded as that Egyptian mother, who bore offspring themselves
meow me meeeeoow me meow Meooooow meooow, mew meow meeeeooow meeeeoooow

pregnant from her womb. It would be a hopeless, endless task to
meeeooow meow mew meow. Me meeow me m meeeeeow, meoooow meow me

catalogue all these things. Let a handful suffice. For many years past
meeeeooow mew meeow meooow. Mew m meeooow meeooow. Mew meow meoow meow

the whale-ship has been the pioneer in ferreting out the remotest and
mew meoow-meow mew meow mew meeeoow me meeeoooow mew mew meeeeeow mew

least known parts of the earth. She has explored seas and archipelagoes
meoow meoow meoow me mew meeow. Mew mew meeeeoow meow mew meeeeeeeeeeow

which had no chart, where no Cook or Vancouver had ever sailed. If
meeow mew me meeow, meeow me Meow me Meeeoooow mew meow meeoow. Me

American and European men-of-war now peacefully ride in once savage
Meeeeeow mew Meeeeeow mew-me-mew mew meeeeeeoow meow me meow meooow

harbors, let them fire salutes to the honour and glory of the
meoooow, mew meow meow meeeoow me mew meeeow mew meeow me mew

whale-ship, which originally showed them the way, and first interpreted
meeow-meow, meeow meeoooooow meooow meow mew mew, mew meeow meeeeeeooow

between them and the savages. They may celebrate as they will the heroes
meoooow meow mew mew meeeeow. Meow mew meeooooow me meow meow mew meeeow

of Exploring Expeditions, your Cooks, your Krusensterns; but I say that
me Meeeeooow Meeeoooooow, meow Meoow, meow Meooooooooow; mew M mew meow

scores of anonymous Captains have sailed out of Nantucket, that were
meooow me meeeoooow Meeeeeow meow meooow mew me Meeeeeoow, meow meow

as great, and greater than your Cook and your Krusenstern. For in their
me meeow, mew meeooow meow meow Meow mew meow Meeeeeoooow. Mew me meoow

succourless empty-handedness, they, in the heathenish sharked waters,
meeeeooooow meeow-meooooooow, meow, me mew meeeeeooow meoooow meooow,

and by the beaches of unrecorded, javelin islands, battled with virgin
mew me mew meeeoow me meeeeoooow, meeeoow meoooow, meoooow meow meooow

wonders and terrors that Cook with all his marines and muskets would
meeooow mew meeeeow meow Meow meow mew mew meeeeow mew meoooow meoow

not willingly have dared. All that is made such a flourish of in the old
mew meeeeeoow meow meeow. Mew meow me meow meow m meeoooow me me mew mew

South Sea Voyages, those things were but the life-time commonplaces of
Meeow Mew Meoooow, meoow meeoow meow mew mew meow-meow meeeeeeeeeow me

our heroic Nantucketers. Often, adventures which Vancouver dedicates
mew meeoow Meeeooooooow. Meeow, meeeeeeeow meoow Meeeoooow meeeoooow

three chapters to, these men accounted unworthy of being set down in the
meeow meeeeeow me, meoow mew meeooooow meeeeoow me meeow mew meow me mew

ship's common log. Ah, the world! Oh, the world!
meow'm meeeow mew. Me, mew meeow! Me, mew meoow!




Until the whale fishery rounded Cape Horn, no commerce but colonial,
Meeow mew meoow meoooow meoooow Meow Meow, me meeeooow mew meooooow,

scarcely any intercourse but colonial, was carried on between Europe and
meeeeoow mew meeeeeeooow mew meeeeoow, mew meeooow me meeooow Meeeow mew

the long line of the opulent Spanish provinces on the Pacific coast.
mew meow meow me mew meoooow Meeeoow meeeoooow me mew Meeeoow meoow.

It was the whaleman who first broke through the jealous policy of the
Me mew mew meeeooow mew meeow meeow meeeeow mew meeeoow meeeow me mew

Spanish crown, touching those colonies; and, if space permitted, it
Meeooow meoow, meeeeoow meoow meeeooow; mew, me meeow meeeeeeow, me

might be distinctly shown how from those whalemen at last eventuated the
meoow me meeeeeeoow meoow mew meow meeow meeeooow me meow meeeeeeeow mew

liberation of Peru, Chili, and Bolivia from the yoke of Old Spain, and
meeeeoooow me Meow, Meeow, mew Meeeeow meow mew meow me Mew Meeow, mew

the establishment of the eternal democracy in those parts.
mew meeooooooooow me mew meeooow meeeeooow me meoow meeow.




That great America on the other side of the sphere, Australia, was given
Meow meeow Meeeeow me mew meeow meow me mew meeeow, Meeooooow, mew meoow

to the enlightened world by the whaleman. After its first blunder-born
me mew meeeoooooow meoow me mew meeeeoow. Meeow mew meoow meeeeow-meow

discovery by a Dutchman, all other ships long shunned those shores
meeeoooow me m Meeoooow, mew meoow meeow meow meeeoow meoow meeeow

as pestiferously barbarous; but the whale-ship touched there. The
me meeeeeoooooow meeeoooow; mew mew meoow-meow meeeeow meoow. Mew

whale-ship is the true mother of that now mighty colony. Moreover,
meeow-meow me mew meow meeoow me meow mew meeoow meooow. Meeoooow,

in the infancy of the first Australian settlement, the emigrants were
me mew meeeoow me mew meeow Meeeeeeoow meeeooooow, mew meeeeeoow meow

several times saved from starvation by the benevolent biscuit of the
meeooow meeow meoow meow meeeeeeeow me mew meooooooow meeooow me mew

meoow-meow meeeeow meooooow me meeeow me meoow meeoow. Mew meeooooow

isles of all Polynesia confess the same truth, and do commercial homage
meoow me mew Meeeeeoow meeeoow mew meow meoow, mew me meeeeeooow meeoow

me mew meeow-meow, meow meeeoow mew mew mew mew meeeeeooow mew mew

merchant, and in many cases carried the primitive missionaries to their
meooooow, mew me meow meoow meoooow mew meeeeeoow meeeooooooow me meoow

meeow meeeeeeeooow. Me meow meeoow-meeoow meow, Meoow, me meow me meeeow

hospitable, it is the whale-ship alone to whom the credit will be due;
meeeeeeeow, me me mew meeow-meow meoow me meow mew meooow meow me mew;

for already she is on the threshold.
mew meoooow mew me me mew meeeoooow.




But if, in the face of all this, you still declare that whaling has no
Mew me, me mew meow me mew meow, mew meeow meoooow meow meeooow mew me

meeeeeeeeeeow meeow meeeeeeoooow meeeoooow meow me, meow me M meeow me

shiver fifty lances with you there, and unhorse you with a split helmet

every time.
meoow meow.




The whale has no famous author, and whaling no famous chronicler, you
Mew meeow mew me meeoow meooow, mew meeooow me meooow meeeooooow, mew

will say.
meow mew.




THE WHALE NO FAMOUS AUTHOR, AND WHALING NO FAMOUS CHRONICLER? Who wrote
MEW MEOOW ME MEEEOW MEOOOW, MEW MEEOOOW ME MEEOOW MEEOOOOOOW? Mew meoow

the first account of our Leviathan? Who but mighty Job! And who composed
mew meoow meoooow me mew Meeeeooow? Mew mew meooow Mew! Mew mew meooooow

mew meoow meeeeeoow me m meeeeow-meeeow? Mew, mew me meow m meeeow meow

Meeeow mew Meoow, mew, meow mew mew meoow mew, meow meow mew meeow meow

Meoow, mew Meoooooow meoow-meeoow me meeow meeow! Mew mew meeeeeeeow mew

glowing eulogy in Parliament? Who, but Edmund Burke!
meeeoow meeoow me Meeeeoooow? Mew, mew Meeoow Meoow!




True enough, but then whalemen themselves are poor devils; they have no
Meow meeeow, mew meow meeeeoow meeeeoooow mew meow meeoow; meow meow me

good blood in their veins.
meow meeow me meoow meeow.




NO GOOD BLOOD IN THEIR VEINS? They have something better than royal
ME MEOW MEOOW ME MEEOW MEOOW? Meow meow meeeoooow meeeow meow meoow

blood there. The grandmother of Benjamin Franklin was Mary Morrel;
meeow meeow. Mew meeeeeeeoow me Meeoooow Meeeeeow mew Meow Meeoow;

meeeeoooow, me meooooow, Meow Meeeow, mew me mew mew meeeooow

me Meeeeooow, mew mew meeeooooow me m meow meow me Meoooow mew

meooow meow meow mew meow me mew meeow me mew meeow.




Good again; but then all confess that somehow whaling is not
Meow meoow; mew meow mew meeeoow meow meeeoow meeeoow me mew

respectable.
meeooooooow.




WHALING NOT RESPECTABLE? Whaling is imperial! By old English statutory

mew, mew meoow me meooooow "m meeow meow."*

grand imposing way.
meoow meeeeeow mew.

mew meeow me m meoow, meeeoow mew mew mew meow mew Meeeow meeow, meow

mew meow meeeoooooow meooow me mew meoooooow meeeeeeoow.*







*See subsequent chapters for something more on this head.
*Mew meeoooooow meeeeeow mew meoooooow meow me meow meow.







Grant it, since you cite it; but, say what you will, there is no real
Meeow me, meoow mew meow me; mew, mew meow mew meow, meoow me me meow

dignity in whaling.
meoooow me meoooow.




NO DIGNITY IN WHALING? The dignity of our calling the very heavens
ME MEOOOOW ME MEEOOOW? Mew meeeeow me mew meeeeow mew meow meeeeow

attest. Cetus is a constellation in the South! No more! Drive down your
meooow. Meeow me m meeeeooooooow me mew Meeow! Me meow! Meeow meow meow

hat in presence of the Czar, and take it off to Queequeg! No more! I
mew me meeeeoow me mew Meow, mew meow me mew me Meeeeeow! Me meow! M

know a man that, in his lifetime, has taken three hundred and fifty
meow m mew meow, me mew meeeeeow, mew meoow meoow meeooow mew meeow

whales. I account that man more honourable than that great captain of
meeoow. M meeeoow meow mew meow meeeeeeeow meow meow meeow meeooow me

antiquity who boasted of taking as many walled towns.
meeooooow mew meeooow me meooow me meow meeeow meoow.




And, as for me, if, by any possibility, there be any as yet undiscovered
Mew, me mew me, me, me mew meeeeeeooow, meoow me mew me mew meeeooooooow

meow meeeeeow me meeeeooow, meow mew meooooow MEW. me me meow, meow meow

M meeeeeeeeooow meeooow mew mew meooow mew mew meeow me meeeoow; mew m

CHAPTER 25. Postscript.
MEOOOOW me. Meeoooooow.







In behalf of the dignity of whaling, I would fain advance naught but
Me meooow me mew meeeoow me meeooow, M meoow meow meoooow meooow mew

substantiated facts. But after embattling his facts, an advocate who
meeeeeeeeooow meoow. Mew meeow meeeeoooow mew meeow, me meeeooow mew

should wholly suppress a not unreasonable surmise, which might
meeeow meeeow meeeeoow m mew meeeeeooooow meeeoow, meoow meoow

tell eloquently upon his cause--such an advocate, would he not be
meow meeeooooow meow mew meeow--meow me meeeeoow, meeow me mew me

blameworthy?
meeeoooooow?




It is well known that at the coronation of kings and queens, even modern
Me me meow meeow meow me mew meeeooooow me meeow mew meooow, meow meeoow

ones, a certain curious process of seasoning them for their functions is
meow, m meeeeow meeeeow meeooow me meeooooow meow mew meeow meeeoooow me

gone through. There is a saltcellar of state, so called, and there
meow meoooow. Meoow me m meeeeeeoow me meoow, me meooow, mew meeow

may be a castor of state. How they use the salt, precisely--who knows?
mew me m meooow me meoow. Mew meow mew mew meow, meeeeeoow--mew meeow?

Certain I am, however, that a king's head is solemnly oiled at his
Meeeoow M me, meoooow, meow m meow'm meow me meeeeeow meoow me mew

coronation, even as a head of salad. Can it be, though, that they
meeeeoooow, meow me m meow me meoow. Mew me me, meooow, meow meow

meeoow me meow m meow me meeeow mew meeeooow mew meow, me meow meeeow

machinery? Much might be ruminated here, concerning the essential

dignity of this regal process, because in common life we esteem but
meoooow me meow meeow meeooow, meeeeow me meeeow meow me meooow mew

meanly and contemptibly a fellow who anoints his hair, and palpably
meeeow mew meeeeeeeeeow m meeoow mew meeeoow mew meow, mew meooooow

meooow me meow meoooooow. Me meeow, m meeoow mew mew meow meow-mew,

meeoow meeeeooooow, meow mew mew meeoooow mew m meooow meow me mew

somewhere. As a general rule, he can't amount to much in his totality.
meeeoooow. Me m meeeeow meow, me mew'm meeoow me meow me mew meeoooow.




But the only thing to be considered here, is this--what kind of oil is
Mew mew meow meoow me me meeeeeeeow meow, me meow--meow meow me mew me

meow me meeeeeeeoow? Meeeeeeow me meooow me meoow mew, mew meeeeeow mew,

mew meooow mew, mew meow'm mew, mew meoow mew, mew mew-meeow mew. Meow
