CHAPTER 42. The Whiteness of The Whale.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeeeeeow me Mew Meeow.







What the white whale was to Ahab, has been hinted; what, at times, he
Meow mew meoow meoow mew me Meow, mew meow meeoow; meow, me meeow, me

was to me, as yet remains unsaid.
mew me me, me mew meoooow meeoow.




Aside from those more obvious considerations touching Moby Dick, which
Meeow meow meoow meow meeeoow meeeeoooooooow meeeooow Meow Meow, meoow

could not but occasionally awaken in any man's soul some alarm, there
meeow mew mew meeeeeeoooow meooow me mew mew'm meow meow meoow, meeow

was another thought, or rather vague, nameless horror concerning him,
mew meoooow meoooow, me meooow meeow, meeeeeow meeeow meeeeeooow mew,

which at times by its intensity completely overpowered all the rest; and
meeow me meoow me mew meeooooow meooooooow meeooooooow mew mew meow; mew

yet so mystical and well nigh ineffable was it, that I almost despair of
mew me meeeeeow mew meow meow meeooooow mew me, meow M meeoow meeeeow me

putting it in a comprehensible form. It was the whiteness of the whale
meeeeow me me m meeeeeeeeeeeow meow. Me mew mew meeeeeeow me mew meeow

that above all things appalled me. But how can I hope to explain myself
meow meeow mew meeeow meooooow me. Mew mew mew M meow me meeooow meeeow

here; and yet, in some dim, random way, explain myself I must, else all
meow; mew mew, me meow mew, meooow mew, meeeeow meeeow M meow, meow mew

these chapters might be naught.
meoow meeeeeow meeow me meeoow.




Though in many natural objects, whiteness refiningly enhances beauty, as
Meeoow me meow meeeoow meeooow, meeeeooow meeeeeeeow meooooow meeeow, me

if imparting some special virtue of its own, as in marbles, japonicas,
me meeeeooow meow meeeeow meeeow me mew mew, me me meoooow, meeeoooow,

and pearls; and though various nations have in some way recognised a
mew meooow; mew meeoow meeeeow meeeeow meow me meow mew meeeeoooow m

certain royal preeminence in this hue; even the barbaric, grand old
meeeeow meoow meeeeeeooow me meow mew; meow mew meooooow, meeow mew

kings of Pegu placing the title "Lord of the White Elephants" above all
meoow me Meow meeooow mew meeow "Meow me mew Meoow Meoooooow" meeow mew

their other magniloquent ascriptions of dominion; and the modern kings
meeow meoow meooooooooow meoooooooow me meeeeeow; mew mew meeoow meeow

of Siam unfurling the same snow-white quadruped in the royal standard;
me Meow meeeoooow mew meow meow-meeow meeeeeeow me mew meoow meeeeeow;

and the Hanoverian flag bearing the one figure of a snow-white charger;
mew mew Meeeeeooow meow meoooow mew mew meooow me m meow-meoow meeooow;

and the great Austrian Empire, Caesarian, heir to overlording Rome,
mew mew meeow Meeeeoow Meooow, Meoooooow, meow me meeeeeeooow Meow,

having for the imperial colour the same imperial hue; and though this
meeeow mew mew meeeeoow meooow mew meow meeeooow mew; mew meooow meow

pre-eminence in it applies to the human race itself, giving the white
mew-meeeeoow me me meeeoow me mew meoow meow meooow, meeoow mew meoow

man ideal mastership over every dusky tribe; and though, besides, all
mew meeow meeeeeeoow meow meoow meeow meoow; mew meeeow, meeooow, mew

this, whiteness has been even made significant of gladness, for among
meow, meeeeeeow mew meow meow meow meeooooooow me meeeeoow, mew meoow

the Romans a white stone marked a joyful day; and though in other mortal
mew Meeeow m meoow meeow meooow m meeeow mew; mew meooow me meeow meooow

sympathies and symbolizings, this same hue is made the emblem of many
meeeeeeoow mew meeeeoooooow, meow meow mew me meow mew meooow me meow

touching, noble things--the innocence of brides, the benignity of age;
meeeeoow, meoow meeeow--mew meeeeeeow me meeoow, mew meeeeeeow me mew;

though among the Red Men of America the giving of the white belt
meooow meeow mew Mew Mew me Meeeeow mew meeoow me mew meeow meow

of wampum was the deepest pledge of honour; though in many climes,
me meeoow mew mew meoooow meeeow me meooow; meooow me meow meeeow,

whiteness typifies the majesty of Justice in the ermine of the Judge,
meeeoooow meeeooow mew meeooow me Meeooow me mew meooow me mew Meeow,

and contributes to the daily state of kings and queens drawn by
mew meeeeooooow me mew meeow meeow me meeow mew meeeow meeow me

milk-white steeds; though even in the higher mysteries of the most
meow-meeow meeoow; meooow meow me mew meeoow meeeoooow me mew meow

august religions it has been made the symbol of the divine spotlessness
meeoow meoooooow me mew meow meow mew meeoow me mew meeeow meeeeoooooow

and power; by the Persian fire worshippers, the white forked flame being
mew meeow; me mew Meeeoow meow meeeeeoooow, mew meeow meeoow meeow meeow

held the holiest on the altar; and in the Greek mythologies, Great Jove
meow mew meeeoow me mew meeow; mew me mew Meoow meeeeeeeeow, Meeow Meow

himself being made incarnate in a snow-white bull; and though to the
meoooow meeow meow meeeeeoow me m meow-meeow meow; mew meeeow me mew

noble Iroquois, the midwinter sacrifice of the sacred White Dog was
meoow Meooooow, mew meeeeeeow meeeeeoow me mew meeoow Meeow Mew mew

by far the holiest festival of their theology, that spotless, faithful
me mew mew meoooow meeeeoow me meeow meeoooow, meow meeeooow, meooooow

creature being held the purest envoy they could send to the Great Spirit
meeoooow meoow meow mew meooow meeow meow meeow meow me mew Meoow Meeoow

with the annual tidings of their own fidelity; and though directly from
meow mew meeoow meeooow me meeow mew meeoooow; mew meooow meeeooow meow

the Latin word for white, all Christian priests derive the name of
mew Meoow meow mew meeow, mew Meoooooow meeeeow meeoow mew meow me

one part of their sacred vesture, the alb or tunic, worn beneath the
mew meow me meeow meooow meoooow, mew mew me meoow, meow meeeeow mew

cassock; and though among the holy pomps of the Romish faith, white is
meeeeow; mew meeoow meoow mew meow meoow me mew Meooow meeow, meeow me

specially employed in the celebration of the Passion of our Lord; though
meeeoooow meooooow me mew meeeeeoooow me mew Meoooow me mew Meow; meeoow

me mew Meeoow me Me. Meow, meeow meeow mew meeow me mew meooooow, mew

the four-and-twenty elders stand clothed in white before the great-white
mew meow-mew-meeeow meeeow meeow meeooow me meoow meooow mew meeow-meoow

throne, and the Holy One that sitteth there white like wool; yet for all
meeeow, mew mew Meow Mew meow meeooow meeow meeow meow meow; mew mew mew

these accumulated associations, with whatever is sweet, and honourable,
meoow meeeeeeeoow meooooooooow, meow meeoooow me meeow, mew meooooooow,

and sublime, there yet lurks an elusive something in the innermost idea
mew meeooow, meeow mew meoow me meeooow meeeeooow me mew meeeoooow meow

of this hue, which strikes more of panic to the soul than that redness
me meow mew, meeow meeeoow meow me meeow me mew meow meow meow meeeeow

which affrights in blood.
meoow meeooooow me meeow.




This elusive quality it is, which causes the thought of whiteness, when
Meow meeeeow meeeoow me me, meoow meeeow mew meeooow me meeeeooow, meow

divorced from more kindly associations, and coupled with any object

*I remember the first albatross I ever saw. It was during a prolonged
*M meeeooow mew meeow meeeeooow M meow mew. Me mew meeoow m meoooooow

CHAPTER 44. The Chart.

Had you followed Captain Ahab down into his cabin after the squall that
Mew mew meeeeoow Meeeoow Meow meow meow mew meoow meoow mew meooow meow

meow meeow me mew meeow meeeeeeeow meow meow meooooooooow me mew meeeoow

meow mew meow, mew meoow meow meow mew me me m meeoow me mew meoooow,

me, mew meoow meow meow mew meeeeoow meeow mew meeeeow meoow mew

meeeooooow meeeoow meow meeoow meow meeoow meow meoow. Me meeeeeeow, me

meoow meeow me meoow me mew mew-meeow meooow mew, meeeoow meow mew meow

mew meeooow mew meeoow me meeow, me meoooow meeeow meeeeow me meeeeow

meeeeow meow mew meooow meeoow meoow me mew meeeooow.

meoow, Meow meow meeeeeow meow mew meeeow. Meooow meoow meoow meow meow

meoooow mew; meeeow meeow meoow meow meeeow meoow meow meeeeow, mew

meooow meow meeeeeeeeow. Mew meow mew meooow me mew meow meooow meooow

mew, Meow mew meeeeeeow m meow me meeoooow mew meeeow, meow m meow me

mew meow meoooow meeeeeeoooooow me meow meeeooooow meeeoow me mew meow.




Now, to any one not fully acquainted with the ways of the leviathans,
Mew, me mew mew mew meoow meeeeoooow meow mew meow me mew meeeeeeeow,

me meeow meow me meeeeeow meeeeeow meow meow me meow mew mew meooooow

meeeooow me mew meeoooow meooow me meow meeeow. Mew mew me mew me

meow me Meow, mew meow mew meow me mew meeow mew meooooow; mew meeeoow

meeeeeeeeow mew meoooooow me mew meeow meoow'm meow; mew, meow, meeooow

Me meoooow, meeoow, me mew meow meeeooooow mew meeoooooooooow me mew

sperm whale's resorting to given waters, that many hunters believe that,
meeow meeow'm meeeeooow me meeow meeeow, meow meow meeeeow meeeeow meow,

meoow me me meeeeow meeeeoow mew meeooow meeeeeeoow mew meoow; meow mew

meow mew mew meooow me mew meeoow meeow meoow meeeoooow meeeeoow,

meow mew meooooooow me mew meoow meeow meeow me meoow me meeoooooow me

meeeeeeeeeeow me meeow me mew meeeoow-meooow me mew meoooow me meeoooow.

On this hint, attempts have been made to construct elaborate migratory
Me meow meow, meooooow meow meow meow me meeeoooow meeooooow meoooooow

charts of the sperm whale.*
meeoow me mew meoow meoow.*




     *Since the above was written, the statement is happily borne

     mew me me meeeeoow meeoooow, meeeow me Meeoooooow Meeow, me

     meow meeeooow, me meeeoow meow meeeeeeow meow m meoow me me

     meooow me meeeeeooow; mew meeoooow me me mew meeooooow me

     mew meeeooow. "Meow meeow meeooow mew meoow meow meeeeooow

     of five degrees of latitude by five degrees of longitude;
     me meow meeeeow me meeeooow me meow meeeeow me meoooooow;

     meoow meooow, meeow me meeow, meow meow meow."




Besides, when making a passage from one feeding-ground to another, the
Meeooow, meow meeeow m meeeoow meow mew meeeoow-meeeow me meoooow, mew

sperm whales, guided by some infallible instinct--say, rather, secret
meoow meeeow, meeeow me meow meeoooooow meeeooow--mew, meeeow, meooow

intelligence from the Deity--mostly swim in VEINS, as they are called;
meeeeeeoooow meow mew Meeow--meooow meow me MEEOW, me meow mew meeoow;

continuing their way along a given ocean-line with such undeviating
meooooooow meoow mew meeow m meoow meeow-meow meow meow meeeeeeeeow

mew meoow me meow meeoooooow meeeeeoow. Meeeow, me meoow meoow, mew

meoow meeeeow mew meooow meeow meow mew meoow-meow'm meow-meoow,

meow meeeeeeeeeeow meeooow meeow meow meeow meow. Mew mew me, meow me

meeeeeeoow meeeoow meooow meow meeooow mew meoow meow meow, meeooooow

whales may with great confidence be looked for.
meeeow mew meow meoow meeeooooow me meooow mew.




And hence not only at substantiated times, upon well known separate

meeeoow meeeeoow me m meeeeow.




There was a circumstance which at first sight seemed to entangle his

meooow meeow me mew meeow.




Often, when forced from his hammock by exhausting and intolerably vivid

me meeooow.










CHAPTER 45. The Affidavit.
MEEEOOW me. Mew Meeeeeoow.







So far as what there may be of a narrative in this book; and, indeed, as
Me mew me meow meeow mew me me m meoooooow me meow meow; mew, meeeow, me

indirectly touching one or two very interesting and curious particulars
meeeeeeoow meeeeeow mew me mew meow meeeoooooow mew meeeeow meeeeeeeoow

in the habits of sperm whales, the foregoing chapter, in its earlier
me mew meooow me meoow meooow, mew meeeeeeow meeooow, me mew meeeoow

part, is as important a one as will be found in this volume; but the
meow, me me meeeeooow m mew me meow me meoow me meow meeeow; mew mew

leading matter of it requires to be still further and more familiarly
meeeeow meooow me me meeeeeow me me meoow meoooow mew meow meeeeeeeow

enlarged upon, in order to be adequately understood, and moreover to
meooooow meow, me meoow me me meeeeoooow meeeeeeoow, mew meeeooow me

take away any incredulity which a profound ignorance of the entire
meow meow mew meeooooooow meoow m meooooow meoooooow me mew meeeow

subject may induce in some minds, as to the natural verity of the main
meeeeow mew meeeow me meow meoow, me me mew meeooow meeoow me mew meow

points of this affair.
meooow me meow meeoow.




I care not to perform this part of my task methodically; but shall
M meow mew me meeeeow meow meow me me meow meeeeeeoooow; mew meeow

be content to produce the desired impression by separate citations of
me meeeeow me meeeoow mew meeeeow meooooooow me meeeeeow meeeoooow me

items, practically or reliably known to me as a whaleman; and from these
meoow, meeeeeeeoow me meeoooow meoow me me me m meooooow; mew meow meeow

citations, I take it--the conclusion aimed at will naturally follow of
meeeeeoow, M meow me--mew meeeooooow meoow me meow meeeeeoow meeoow me

itself.
meeoow.




First: I have personally known three instances where a whale, after
Meeow: M meow meeeeeeoow meoow meoow meeooooow meoow m meeow, meoow

receiving a harpoon, has effected a complete escape; and, after an
meeooooow m meeooow, mew meeeeoow m meeoooow meeoow; mew, meeow me

interval (in one instance of three years), has been again struck by
meeeeeow (me mew meeeeeow me meoow meoow), mew meow meeow meeoow me

the same hand, and slain; when the two irons, both marked by the same
mew meow meow, mew meoow; meow mew mew meeow, meow meeoow me mew meow

private cypher, have been taken from the body. In the instance where

First: In the year 1820 the ship Essex, Captain Pollard, of Nantucket,

meow mew. Meow meeeooow meoooooow me meeeeeow mew Meeeeeoow'm meoow meow

a thwack, that with all his pumps going he made straight for the nearest
m meooow, meow meow mew mew meeow meoow me meow meooooow mew mew meeeeow

meow me meeow meow mew meooow. M me mew meoooooooooow, mew M meeeooow

sperm whale will stand no nonsense.
meeow meeow meow meoow me meeoooow.

Meeooow Meooooooow meow meooow mew meeooooooow meoooow:




"By the thirteenth of May our ship was ready to sail, and the next day
"Me mew meeeeoooow me Mew mew meow mew meoow me meow, mew mew meow mew

we were out in the open sea, on our way to Ochotsh. The weather was very
me meow mew me mew meow mew, me mew mew me Meeeeow. Mew meeeoow mew meow

meeow mew meow, mew me meeeeeeeeow meow meow me meow meeooow me meow me

mew mew meeeooow. Mew meow meow me mew meow meeeow meow; me mew mew

meow mew meeeeoooow meow m meeow meow meow mew meeeeeeow meeeow me. Me

meeeooow meeow meeow, mew meow me meoow mew meeoow meow mew meow meeoow,

lay almost at the surface of the water, but was not perceived by any
mew meeeow me mew meeeoow me mew meeow, mew mew mew meeooooow me mew

mew meeoow meow mew, me meow me mew meeoooooow me meeeoow mew meeeeeow

against him. We were thus placed in the most imminent danger, as this
meeeoow mew. Me meow meow meeeow me mew meow meeeeeow meooow, me meow

meeoooow meeoooow, meeeoow me mew meow, meeeow mew meow meeow meow me

meoow mew me mew meoow. Mew meoow meeeow, mew mew meoow meow meeeeeooow,

meow me mew meooow meow meow meow; meoooow me meow me mew mew meoooow

meeooow mew meow mew meeeow meeeeow mew meeeeeoow. Meeooow M'Meow

me mew meeeeow meeeeeow meeeeeoow."

Lionel, it seems, was on his way to "John Ferdinando," as he calls
Meeoow, me meeow, mew me mew mew me "Meow Meeeeoooow," me me meeow

mew meooow Meow Meeooooow. "Me mew mew meeeeow," me meow, "meeow meow

me meow me meoow; mew meeow mew meoow me meeeoow mew meeow. Mew, meeoow,

I might proceed with several more examples, one way or another known to

than one instance, he has been known, not only to chase the assailing

horse walks off with a cart. Again, it is very often observed that, if
meoow meoow mew meow m meow. Meoow, me me meow meeow meooooow meow, me

mew meoow meoow, meow meooow, me meoooow meow me meeow, me meow meow,

meeeoow (meow mew meeooow) mew meow meeeeeeeeow me mew meow; me meow mew

the millionth time we say amen with Solomon--Verily there is nothing new
mew meeeeooow meow me mew meow meow Meeeeow--Meooow meoow me meeooow mew

under the sun.
meeow mew mew.




In the sixth Christian century lived Procopius, a Christian magistrate
Me mew meoow Meoooooow meoooow meeow Meeeeeoow, m Meoooooow meeeeeeoow

of Constantinople, in the days when Justinian was Emperor and Belisarius
me Meeeeoooooooow, me mew meow meow Meeeeeeow mew Meeeeow mew Meeoooooow

general. As many know, he wrote the history of his own times, a work
meeeoow. Me meow meow, me meoow mew meeeeow me mew mew meeow, m meow

every way of uncommon value. By the best authorities, he has always been
meeow mew me meeoooow meeow. Me mew meow meeeeeoooow, me mew meeeow meow

considered a most trustworthy and unexaggerating historian, except in
meeeeeeoow m meow meeeeeoooow mew meooooooooooow meeeeeeow, meooow me

some one or two particulars, not at all affecting the matter presently
meow mew me mew meeeeeoooow, mew me mew meeeeeeow mew meooow meeooooow

to be mentioned.
me me meeeeeoow.




Now, in this history of his, Procopius mentions that, during the term
Mew, me meow meeeeow me mew, Meeeeooow meeeeeow meow, meooow mew meow

of his prefecture at Constantinople, a great sea-monster was captured
me mew meeoooooow me Meeeeeeeeeeeow, m meoow mew-meoooow mew meooooow

in the neighboring Propontis, or Sea of Marmora, after having destroyed
me mew meeeeeeeeow Meeeeeeow, me Mew me Meeooow, meoow meeoow meeeeooow

vessels at intervals in those waters for a period of more than fifty
meeeeow me meeooooow me meoow meeoow mew m meooow me meow meow meeow

years. A fact thus set down in substantial history cannot easily be
meoow. M meow meow mew meow me meeeeeeeeow meoooow meooow meooow me

gainsaid. Nor is there any reason it should be. Of what precise species
meeeooow. Mew me meeow mew meooow me meeeow me. Me meow meeooow meeeoow

this sea-monster was, is not mentioned. But as he destroyed ships, as
meow mew-meeooow mew, me mew meeeeooow. Mew me me meeooooow meeow, me

well as for other reasons, he must have been a whale; and I am strongly
meow me mew meoow meeeeow, me meow meow meow m meeow; mew M me meooooow

inclined to think a sperm whale. And I will tell you why. For a long
meeeeeow me meeow m meeow meoow. Mew M meow meow mew mew. Mew m meow

time I fancied that the sperm whale had been always unknown in the
meow M meeooow meow mew meeow meoow mew meow meeeow meeeoow me mew

Mediterranean and the deep waters connecting with it. Even now I am
Meeeeeeeeooow mew mew meow meeeow meeeooooow meow me. Meow mew M me

certain that those seas are not, and perhaps never can be, in the
meeeoow meow meoow meow mew mew, mew meoooow meoow mew me, me mew

present constitution of things, a place for his habitual gregarious
meeeoow meeeeeeeooow me meeeow, m meeow mew mew meeoooow meeeeoooow

resort. But further investigations have recently proved to me, that in
meeeow. Mew meoooow meeeeeeeeoooow meow meeeeeow meooow me me, meow me

modern times there have been isolated instances of the presence of the
meooow meeow meoow meow meow meeeooow meeooooow me mew meeeeeow me mew

sperm whale in the Mediterranean. I am told, on good authority, that
meoow meeow me mew Meeeeeeooooow. M me meow, me meow meeooooow, meow

on the Barbary coast, a Commodore Davis of the British navy found
me mew Meoooow meoow, m Meeeeooow Meoow me mew Meoooow meow meeow

the skeleton of a sperm whale. Now, as a vessel of war readily passes
mew meeeeeow me m meeow meoow. Mew, me m meeoow me mew meeooow meeeow

through the Dardanelles, hence a sperm whale could, by the same route,
meoooow mew Meoooooooow, meeow m meeow meoow meoow, me mew meow meeow,

pass out of the Mediterranean into the Propontis.
meow mew me mew Meeeoooooooow meow mew Meeooooow.




In the Propontis, as far as I can learn, none of that peculiar substance
Me mew Meoooooow, me mew me M mew meoow, meow me meow meeeooow meeooooow

called BRIT is to be found, the aliment of the right whale. But I have
meeoow MEOW me me me meoow, mew meeeoow me mew meoow meeow. Mew M meow

every reason to believe that the food of the sperm whale--squid or
meeow meeoow me meeeeow meow mew meow me mew meoow meoow--meoow me

cuttle-fish--lurks at the bottom of that sea, because large creatures,
meeeow-meow--meoow me mew meeoow me meow mew, meeeoow meoow meeooooow,

but by no means the largest of that sort, have been found at its
mew me me meoow mew meeeoow me meow meow, meow meow meoow me mew

surface. If, then, you properly put these statements together, and
meoooow. Me, meow, mew meooooow mew meeow meeeeeooow meeoooow, mew

meooow meow meow m mew, mew meow meoooow meeeeeow meow, meeeeeeow me mew

meoow meeeoooow, Meeeoooow'm mew-meeeeow, meow mew meow m meeooow meoow

the ships of a Roman Emperor, must in all probability have been a sperm
mew meoow me m Meoow Meeooow, meow me mew meeeeeeeoow meow meow m meeow

whale.
meeow.










CHAPTER 46. Surmises.
MEOOOOW me. Meeeeeow.







Though, consumed with the hot fire of his purpose, Ahab in all his
Meeoow, meeoooow meow mew mew meow me mew meeeoow, Meow me mew mew

thoughts and actions ever had in view the ultimate capture of Moby Dick;
meooooow mew meeeeow meow mew me meow mew meooooow meeeeow me Meow Meow;

though he seemed ready to sacrifice all mortal interests to that one
meooow me meeoow meeow me meeeoooow mew meooow meeeoooow me meow mew

passion; nevertheless it may have been that he was by nature and long
meeooow; meeeeoooooow me mew meow meow meow me mew me meeeow mew meow

habituation far too wedded to a fiery whaleman's ways, altogether to
meeeeeeeeow mew mew meeeow me m meeow meeeooow'm meow, meeeeeeeow me

abandon the collateral prosecution of the voyage. Or at least if
meeooow mew meeeooooow meeeeooooow me mew meeoow. Me me meoow me

this were otherwise, there were not wanting other motives much more
meow meow meeeeeeow, meoow meow mew meeeoow meeow meeeeow meow meow

influential with him. It would be refining too much, perhaps, even
meeeeeeeoow meow mew. Me meeow me meeeooow mew meow, meoooow, meow

considering his monomania, to hint that his vindictiveness towards the
meeeeeeeoow mew meeeoooow, me meow meow mew meeeeeeeeeooow meoooow mew

Meeow Meeow meeow meow meeeeeow meeeeeow meooow me meow meooow me mew

sperm whales, and that the more monsters he slew by so much the more he
meeow meeeow, mew meow mew meow meooooow me meow me me meow mew meow me

multiplied the chances that each subsequently encountered whale would
meeeeeeeow mew meeeoow meow meow meeeeeeeeeow meeeeeeooow meeow meoow

meoow me me mew meeow mew me meooow. Mew me meow me meeeeeeoow me meooow

exceptionable, there were still additional considerations which, though
meeooooooooow, meeow meow meoow meeeeeooow meeeeeeoooooow meoow, meeeow

not so strictly according with the wildness of his ruling passion, yet
mew me meooooow meeeeooow meow mew meeeooow me mew meeoow meoooow, mew

were by no means incapable of swaying him.
meow me me meoow meoooooow me meoooow mew.




To accomplish his object Ahab must use tools; and of all tools used in
Me meeeeeeoow mew meeeow Meow meow mew meoow; mew me mew meeow meow me

the shadow of the moon, men are most apt to get out of order. He knew,
mew meeoow me mew meow, mew mew meow mew me mew mew me meoow. Me meow,

for example, that however magnetic his ascendency in some respects was
mew meeooow, meow meeeoow meeeeoow mew meeeeeeoow me meow meooooow mew

over Starbuck, yet that ascendency did not cover the complete spiritual
meow Meeoooow, mew meow meeeeeooow mew mew meoow mew meeeeeow meeeeeoow

mew mew meow meow meow meeeoooow meeeeeoooow meeeeoow meooooooooow

mastership; for to the purely spiritual, the intellectual but stand in a
meeeooooow; mew me mew meeeow meoooooow, mew meeeeeeeeeow mew meoow me m

sort of corporeal relation. Starbuck's body and Starbuck's coerced will
meow me meeooooow meeeooow. Meeeeeow'm meow mew Meeeeeow'm meeooow meow

were Ahab's, so long as Ahab kept his magnet at Starbuck's brain; still
meow Meow'm, me meow me Meow meow mew meeeow me Meeeeeow'm meeow; meoow

he knew that for all this the chief mate, in his soul, abhorred his
me meow meow mew mew meow mew meoow meow, me mew meow, meeeooow mew

captain's quest, and could he, would joyfully disintegrate himself from
meeooow'm meoow, mew meeow me, meeow meeeeoow meooooooooow meeeoow meow

it, or even frustrate it. It might be that a long interval would elapse
me, me meow meeeoooow me. Me meeow me meow m meow meeeooow meoow meeoow

ere the White Whale was seen. During that long interval Starbuck
mew mew Meoow Meoow mew meow. Meooow meow meow meooooow Meooooow

would ever be apt to fall into open relapses of rebellion against his
meeow meow me mew me meow meow meow meeeeeow me meeeeeoow meeeoow mew

captain's leadership, unless some ordinary, prudential, circumstantial
meeeoow'm meeoooooow, meeeow meow meeeeoow, meeoooooow, meeeeeeeeeooow

influences were brought to bear upon him. Not only that, but the subtle
meeeeeeeow meow meeeeow me meow meow mew. Mew meow meow, mew mew meooow

insanity of Ahab respecting Moby Dick was noways more significantly
meooooow me Meow meooooooow Meow Meow mew meooow meow meeeeeeeeeeow

manifested than in his superlative sense and shrewdness in foreseeing
meeoooooow meow me mew meeeeeoooow meeow mew meeeeeooow me meeoooooow

that, for the present, the hunt should in some way be stripped of that

strange imaginative impiousness which naturally invested it; that
meeeoow meeeeeeeeow meeeeeeeeow meeow meoooooow meeeooow me; meow

the full terror of the voyage must be kept withdrawn into the obscure
mew meow meeeow me mew meeoow meow me meow meeeeeoow meow mew meeeeow

background (for few men's courage is proof against protracted meditation

unrelieved by action); that when they stood their long night watches,
meeoooooow me meooow); meow meow meow meoow meoow meow meeow meeeeow,

his officers and men must have some nearer things to think of than Moby
mew meeeeoow mew mew meow meow meow meeoow meeeow me meeow me meow Meow

Dick. For however eagerly and impetuously the savage crew had hailed the
Meow. Mew meeooow meeeeow mew meeooooooow mew meeoow meow mew meeoow mew

announcement of his quest; yet all sailors of all sorts are more or less
meeeooooooow me mew meoow; mew mew meeeeow me mew meoow mew meow me meow

capricious and unreliable--they live in the varying outer weather, and
meooooooow mew meeeeoooow--meow meow me mew meeooow meoow meeooow, mew

they inhale its fickleness--and when retained for any object remote and
meow meooow mew meeeeoooow--mew meow meeeeoow mew mew meeoow meeeow mew

blank in the pursuit, however promissory of life and passion in the

CHAPTER 47. The Mat-Maker.

meoow mew meeow, me meeeeoow meooow meow meow mew meow-meooooow meeoow.

Stubb's exordium to his crew is given here at large, because he had

CHAPTER 49. The Hyena.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meoow.







There are certain queer times and occasions in this strange mixed affair
Meoow mew meeooow meoow meeow mew meeeeeeow me meow meoooow meeow meeoow

we call life when a man takes this whole universe for a vast practical
me meow meow meow m mew meeow meow meoow meeoooow mew m meow meoooooow

joke, though the wit thereof he but dimly discerns, and more than
meow, meooow mew mew meeeeow me mew meeow meeeeoow, mew meow meow

suspects that the joke is at nobody's expense but his own. However,
meeeeoow meow mew meow me me meooow'm meeeoow mew mew mew. Meeooow,

nothing dispirits, and nothing seems worth while disputing. He bolts
meeeeow meeooooow, mew meoooow meeow meoow meoow meeeeeoow. Me meoow

down all events, all creeds, and beliefs, and persuasions, all hard
meow mew meooow, mew meeoow, mew meeeoow, mew meeeoooooow, mew meow

things visible and invisible, never mind how knobby; as an ostrich of
meooow meoooow mew meoooooow, meoow meow mew meooow; me me meoooow me

potent digestion gobbles down bullets and gun flints. And as for small
meeoow meoooooow meeeeow meow meeooow mew mew meeeow. Mew me mew meeow

difficulties and worryings, prospects of sudden disaster, peril of
meeoooooooow mew meoooooow, meeeoooow me meooow meeoooow, meeow me

life and limb; all these, and death itself, seem to him only sly,
meow mew meow; mew meeow, mew meeow meooow, meow me mew meow mew,

good-natured hits, and jolly punches in the side bestowed by the unseen
meow-meeeoow meow, mew meeow meeeeow me mew meow meeeeoow me mew meooow

and unaccountable old joker. That odd sort of wayward mood I am speaking
mew meeeeeeeeeeow mew meeow. Meow mew meow me meeeoow meow M me meooooow

of, comes over a man only in some time of extreme tribulation; it comes
me, meeow meow m mew meow me meow meow me meeooow meeeeooooow; me meeow

in the very midst of his earnestness, so that what just before might
me mew meow meoow me mew meeeoooooow, me meow meow meow meeeow meeow

have seemed to him a thing most momentous, now seems but a part of the
meow meeeow me mew m meoow meow meeeoooow, mew meeow mew m meow me mew

general joke. There is nothing like the perils of whaling to breed this

CHAPTER 51. The Spirit-Spout.

mew me meow, mew mew m meooow meow.




This midnight-spout had almost grown a forgotten thing, when, some days

CHAPTER 52. The Albatross.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeeeeoow.







South-eastward from the Cape, off the distant Crozetts, a good cruising
Meoow-meeoooow meow mew Meow, mew mew meeooow Meeeooow, m meow meeeeoow

ground for Right Whalemen, a sail loomed ahead, the Goney (Albatross)
meooow mew Meoow Meeeeoow, m meow meeeow meoow, mew Meoow (Meeeoooow)

by name. As she slowly drew nigh, from my lofty perch at the
me meow. Me mew meeoow meow meow, meow me meeow meoow me mew

fore-mast-head, I had a good view of that sight so remarkable to a tyro
meow-meow-meow, M mew m meow meow me meow meoow me meeeeoooow me m meow

in the far ocean fisheries--a whaler at sea, and long absent from home.
me mew mew meeow meeeeeoow--m meeeow me mew, mew meow meeoow meow meow.




As if the waves had been fullers, this craft was bleached like the
Me me mew meeow mew meow meoooow, meow meoow mew meeeeoow meow mew

skeleton of a stranded walrus. All down her sides, this spectral
meeoooow me m meooooow meeeow. Mew meow mew meoow, meow meeoooow

meeeeeooow mew meeeow meow meow meooooow me meooooow meow, meeow mew mew

with hoar-frost. Only her lower sails were set. A wild sight it was to
meow meow-meeow. Meow mew meoow meeow meow mew. M meow meeow me mew me

see her long-bearded look-outs at those three mast-heads. They seemed
mew mew meow-meeooow meow-meow me meeow meeow meow-meoow. Meow meeoow

clad in the skins of beasts, so torn and bepatched the raiment that had
meow me mew meoow me meooow, me meow mew meeeeeeow mew meeeoow meow mew

survived nearly four years of cruising. Standing in iron hoops nailed to
meooooow meeeow meow meeow me meooooow. Meeeeoow me meow meeow meeeow me

the mast, they swayed and swung over a fathomless sea; and though, when
mew meow, meow meooow mew meoow meow m meeeooooow mew; mew meooow, meow

look-outs, while the quarter-deck hail was being heard from below.
meow-meow, meeow mew meeeoow-meow meow mew meoow meoow meow meoow.




"Ship ahoy! Have ye seen the White Whale?"
"Meow meow! Meow me meow mew Meoow Meoow?"

helm! Keep her off round the world!"

Round the world! There is much in that sound to inspire proud feelings;
Meoow mew meoow! Meeow me meow me meow meoow me meeeeow meoow meeeeoow;

but whereto does all that circumnavigation conduct? Only through
mew meeeoow meow mew meow meeeooooooooooow meeeoow? Meow meeeeow

numberless perils to the very point whence we started, where those that
meeeeeooow meooow me mew meow meeow meeoow me meeooow, meoow meeow meow

we left behind secure, were all the time before us.
me meow meeoow meeoow, meow mew mew meow meeoow me.

Meow meow meeow me meoooow meoow, mew me meeooow meeeeeow me meeow mew

CHAPTER 53. The Gam.

GAM. NOUN--A SOCIAL MEETING OF TWO (OR MORE) WHALESHIPS, GENERALLY ON A

There is another little item about Gamming which must not be forgotten
Meoow me meeeeow meooow meow meoow Meeeoow meoow meow mew me meeooooow

here. All professions have their own little peculiarities of detail; so
meow. Mew meeeoooooow meow meoow mew meeeow meeeoooooooow me meooow; me

has the whale fishery. In a pirate, man-of-war, or slave ship, when
mew mew meeow meoooow. Me m meeeow, mew-me-mew, me meoow meow, meow

the captain is rowed anywhere in his boat, he always sits in the stern
mew meeeoow me meeow meeoooow me mew meow, me meeoow meow me mew meoow

sheets on a comfortable, sometimes cushioned seat there, and often
meeoow me m meeeoooooow, meeeoooow meeeeeoow meow meeow, mew meoow

steers himself with a pretty little milliner's tiller decorated with
meeeow meoooow meow m meooow meooow meeoooow'm meeoow meeeeooow meow

gay cords and ribbons. But the whale-boat has no seat astern, no sofa of
mew meeow mew meeooow. Mew mew meoow-meow mew me meow meooow, me meow me

that sort whatever, and no tiller at all. High times indeed, if whaling
meow meow meeeeeow, mew me meeeow me mew. Meow meoow meeeow, me meoooow

captains were wheeled about the water on castors like gouty old aldermen
meooooow meow meeooow meeow mew meeow me meeeoow meow meeow mew meeeeeow

in patent chairs. And as for a tiller, the whale-boat never admits of
me meooow meooow. Mew me mew m meeoow, mew meoow-meow meoow meeoow me

any such effeminacy; and therefore as in gamming a complete boat's crew
mew meow meeeeeeeow; mew meeeeeeow me me meoooow m meeoooow meow'm meow

must leave the ship, and hence as the boat steerer or harpooneer is of
meow meoow mew meow, mew meoow me mew meow meeeoow me meeeeeeeow me me

the number, that subordinate is the steersman upon the occasion, and
mew meeeow, meow meoooooooow me mew meoooooow meow mew meeeeoow, mew

the captain, having no place to sit in, is pulled off to his visit
mew meeeoow, meeeow me meoow me mew me, me meooow mew me mew meoow

all standing like a pine tree. And often you will notice that being
mew meeeooow meow m meow meow. Mew meeow mew meow meeeow meow meoow

conscious of the eyes of the whole visible world resting on him from
meeeeeoow me mew meow me mew meeow meeeoow meoow meeeeow me mew meow

the sides of the two ships, this standing captain is all alive to the
mew meoow me mew mew meeow, meow meeeeoow meeeoow me mew meoow me mew

importance of sustaining his dignity by maintaining his legs. Nor is
meeeooooow me meeeeeeeow mew meeeoow me meoooooooow mew meow. Mew me

this any very easy matter; for in his rear is the immense projecting
meow mew meow meow meeoow; mew me mew meow me mew meeooow meeeeeooow

steering oar hitting him now and then in the small of his back, the
meeeeoow mew meeooow mew mew mew meow me mew meeow me mew meow, mew

after-oar reciprocating by rapping his knees in front. He is thus
meeow-mew meeeeeeeeeeow me meeeeow mew meoow me meoow. Me me meow

completely wedged before and behind, and can only expand himself
meeoooooow meeeow meeoow mew meeeow, mew mew meow meeoow meeeoow

sideways by settling down on his stretched legs; but a sudden, violent
meooooow me meeoooow meow me mew meeeeeoow meow; mew m meeeow, meoooow

pitch of the boat will often go far to topple him, because length of
meeow me mew meow meow meoow me mew me meeeow mew, meeeoow meeeow me

foundation is nothing without corresponding breadth. Merely make a
meeoooooow me meoooow meeooow meeeeeeooooow meeooow. Meooow meow m

spread angle of two poles, and you cannot stand them up. Then, again,
meeeow meoow me mew meoow, mew mew meooow meoow meow me. Meow, meeow,

it would never do in plain sight of the world's riveted eyes, it would
me meeow meoow me me meeow meeow me mew meoow'm meeeeow meow, me meeow

never do, I say, for this straddling captain to be seen steadying
meeow me, M mew, mew meow meeeeeeeow meeeoow me me meow meeeeooow

himself the slightest particle by catching hold of anything with
meoooow mew meeooooow meeeooow me meeeeoow meow me meooooow meow

his hands; indeed, as token of his entire, buoyant self-command, he
mew meoow; meeeow, me meeow me mew meeoow, meeooow meow-meeooow, me

generally carries his hands in his trowsers' pockets; but perhaps being
meeeoooow meeeeow mew meeow me mew meeeeeow' meoooow; mew meeeoow meeow

generally very large, heavy hands, he carries them there for ballast.
meeeeeeow meow meoow, meoow meeow, me meeooow meow meeow mew meeeeow.

Meeeeeeeooow meoow meow meooooow meeeeeoow, meow meeeeeeeeeoow meow mew,

meoow mew meeeoow mew meow meoow mew me meooooooow meooooow meooow me

hair, and hold on there like grim death.

CHAPTER 54. The Town-Ho's Story.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meow-Me'm Meoow.







(AS TOLD AT THE GOLDEN INN)
(ME MEOW ME MEW MEEEOW MEW)







The Cape of Good Hope, and all the watery region round about there, is
Mew Meow me Meow Meow, mew mew mew meeeow meeoow meoow meeow meeow, me

much like some noted four corners of a great highway, where you meet
meow meow meow meoow meow meoooow me m meoow meeeeow, meoow mew meow

more travellers than in any other part.
meow meeeeeeeow meow me mew meeow meow.




It was not very long after speaking the Goney that another
Me mew mew meow meow meoow meooooow mew Meeow meow meoooow

homeward-bound whaleman, the Town-Ho,* was encountered. She was manned
meooooow-meeow meooooow, mew Meow-Me,* mew meeeeooooow. Mew mew meeoow

almost wholly by Polynesians. In the short gam that ensued she gave
meeeow meeeow me Meoooooooow. Me mew meeow mew meow meeoow mew meow

me meeeow meow me Meow Meow. Me meow mew meeooow meeeeeow me mew Meeow

Whale was now wildly heightened by a circumstance of the Town-Ho's
Meeow mew mew meooow meeeeoooow me m meeeeeeeeeow me mew Meow-Me'm

story, which seemed obscurely to involve with the whale a certain

which at times are said to overtake some men. This latter circumstance,
meeow me meeow mew meow me meeeeoow meow mew. Meow meooow meeeeeeeeoow,

meow mew mew meeoooooow meeeeeeoooooow, meeooow meow mew me meeeow mew

secret part of the tragedy about to be narrated, never reached the ears

*The ancient whale-cry upon first sighting a whale from the mast-head,
*Mew meoooow meoow-mew meow meeow meeeeeow m meoow meow mew meow-meow,

still used by whalemen in hunting the famous Gallipagos terrapin.
meeow meow me meeoooow me meeooow mew meeeow Meeeeoooow meeeooow.

"Some two years prior to my first learning the events which I am about

"Though no small passage was before her, yet, if the commonest chance

"'Damn your eyes! what's that pump stopping for?' roared Radney,

"Meow meoow meow meow mew, meow mew meeow mew meeeeow meeow, m meeoow

CHAPTER 55. Of the Monstrous Pictures of Whales.
MEEOOOW me. Me mew Meeeoooow Meeeeoow me Meeeow.







I shall ere long paint to you as well as one can without canvas,
M meoow mew meow meeow me mew me meow me mew mew meeeoow meeoow,

meoooooow meow mew meow meow me mew meeow me me meeeooow meeeeow me mew

meeeoooow mew meoow-meow me meow me mew me meeeow meeooow meow meoow.

meoow.




It may be that the primal source of all those pictorial delusions will

me meeow meoow mew meeoow Meooow, Meooooow, mew Meeeoow meeeeeeeow. Mew

meow meeow meeow meeeeeoow mew meeeeeooooow meeow meow me mew meeeow

meeeeeeeow, meow, mew meoow, mew meeeeow mew meoow me meeoow me

meow me meow meeeeow meeoooow me mew meeow, mew me meow meeoooooow

meeeeeoooooow me mew.

For it is one of the more curious things about this Leviathan, that
Mew me me mew me mew meow meeooow meeeow meeow meow Meeeeeeow, meow

his skeleton gives very little idea of his general shape. Though Jeremy
mew meeoooow meeow meow meeeow meow me mew meeeoow meeow. Meooow Meeeow

Bentham's skeleton, which hangs for candelabra in the library of one of
Meeooow'm meooooow, meeow meeow mew meeeeeooow me mew meeooow me mew me

his executors, correctly conveys the idea of a burly-browed utilitarian
mew meeooooow, meeeoooow meeooow mew meow me m meoow-meooow meeeeeeeoow

old gentleman, with all Jeremy's other leading personal characteristics;
mew meeeeeoow, meow mew Meeoow'm meoow meeeoow meeeeeow meeeeeeooooooow;

yet nothing of this kind could be inferred from any leviathan's
mew meeeoow me meow meow meoow me meooooow meow mew meeeeeoow'm

articulated bones. In fact, as the great Hunter says, the mere skeleton
meeeoooooow meeow. Me meow, me mew meeow Meooow meow, mew meow meeeeeow

of the whale bears the same relation to the fully invested and padded
me mew meoow meeow mew meow meooooow me mew meoow meeeeoow mew meeeow

animal as the insect does to the chrysalis that so roundingly envelopes
meooow me mew meeoow meow me mew meeooooow meow me meeoooooow meeeeooow

it. This peculiarity is strikingly evinced in the head, as in some
me. Meow meeeeooooow me meeoooooow meeeeow me mew meow, me me meow

part of this book will be incidentally shown. It is also very curiously
meow me meow meow meow me meeeeoooooow meoow. Me me meow meow meeeoooow

displayed in the side fin, the bones of which almost exactly answer to
meeeeeoow me mew meow mew, mew meeow me meeow meooow meoooow meooow me

the bones of the human hand, minus only the thumb. This fin has four
mew meoow me mew meeow meow, meeow meow mew meoow. Meow mew mew meow

regular bone-fingers, the index, middle, ring, and little finger. But
meeeoow meow-meoooow, mew meoow, meeeow, meow, mew meeoow meeeow. Mew

all these are permanently lodged in their fleshy covering, as the human
mew meeow mew meeeeooooow meeeow me meoow meeoow meooooow, me mew meoow

fingers in an artificial covering. "However recklessly the whale may
meeooow me me meeeooooow meooooow. "Meoooow meooooooow mew meoow mew

sometimes serve us," said humorous Stubb one day, "he can never be truly
meeeeeoow meeow me," meow meeeeoow Meeow mew mew, "me mew meeow me meoow

said to handle us without mittens."
meow me meeoow me meoooow meeooow."




For all these reasons, then, any way you may look at it, you must needs
Mew mew meoow meeooow, meow, mew mew mew mew meow me me, mew meow meeow

conclude that the great Leviathan is that one creature in the world
meeeooow meow mew meeow Meeeeooow me meow mew meeoooow me mew meoow

which must remain unpainted to the last. True, one portrait may hit
meeow meow meeeow meeeeeeow me mew meow. Meow, mew meeeeoow mew mew

the mark much nearer than another, but none can hit it with any very
mew meow meow meeeow meow meoooow, mew meow mew mew me meow mew meow

meeeeeeeeeow meooow me meeeeeeow. Me meeow me me meoooow mew me meeeeow

out precisely what the whale really looks like. And the only mode in
mew meeeoooow meow mew meeow meeeow meoow meow. Mew mew meow meow me

which you can derive even a tolerable idea of his living contour, is
meoow mew mew meeeow meow m meeeeooow meow me mew meooow meeeeow, me

by going a whaling yourself; but by so doing, you run no small risk of
me meeow m meeeoow meooooow; mew me me meoow, mew mew me meeow meow me

meoow meeeeooow meoow mew meow me mew. Meeeeeoow, me meoow me me mew mew

meow mew me mew meooooooow me meow meeeeooow meeoooow meow Meoooooow.

On Tower-hill, as you go down to the London docks, you may have seen a
Me Meoow-meow, me mew me meow me mew Meeoow meeow, mew mew meow meow m

meooow mew, meeeeoooooow mew meeoow meoow me meeow me meow mew mew.

There are three whales and three boats; and one of the boats (presumed
Meoow mew meoow meeeow mew meoow meeow; mew mew me mew meoow (meeeeoow

Throughout the Pacific, and also in Nantucket, and New Bedford, and

meow meeeeeeoooow meeeeeow, me mew meeeeeow meow mew meeeeoow meeeow

meoooooow meeeeeooooow meow meoooooooow meeow mew me mew meeow meeeeoow,

fancy.
meeow.




Long exile from Christendom and civilization inevitably restores a man
Meow meeow meow Meeeeeeooow mew meeeeeeeeeow meeeeeooow meooooow m mew

to that condition in which God placed him, i.e. what is called savagery.
me meow meeeeeoow me meoow Mew meeoow mew, m.m. meow me meeoow meeoooow.

Your true whale-hunter is as much a savage as an Iroquois. I myself am a
Meow meow meoow-meeoow me me meow m meeeow me me Meeeeoow. M meeoow me m

savage, owning no allegiance but to the King of the Cannibals; and ready

me mew meeeow me meeow meoooow mew.




Now, one of the peculiar characteristics of the savage in his domestic

hours, is his wonderful patience of industry. An ancient Hawaiian

meow meeeow meoow me meeoow meeooooooow.

In bony, ribby regions of the earth, where at the base of high broken

CHAPTER 58. Brit.
MEOOOOW me. Meow.







Steering north-eastward from the Crozetts, we fell in with vast meadows
Meeeeoow meoow-meooooow meow mew Meeoooow, me meow me meow meow meeeeow

of brit, the minute, yellow substance, upon which the Right Whale
me meow, mew meooow, meooow meeeoooow, meow meoow mew Meeow Meeow

meeeeow meeow. Mew meeooow mew meeooow me meeeeeeow meoow me, me meow me

seemed to be sailing through boundless fields of ripe and golden wheat.
meeoow me me meeeoow meeeoow meeeeooow meeoow me meow mew meooow meeow.




On the second day, numbers of Right Whales were seen, who, secure from
Me mew meeeow mew, meoooow me Meeow Meooow meow meow, mew, meeoow meow

the attack of a Sperm Whaler like the Pequod, with open jaws sluggishly
mew meeoow me m Meoow Meeoow meow mew Meooow, meow meow meow meeoooooow

from the water that escaped at the lip.
meow mew meeow meow meeeoow me mew mew.




As morning mowers, who side by side slowly and seethingly advance

meeeooow meow, meeoow m meeooow, meeoow, meeooow meeow; mew meeeoow

meooow meow meeooow meeeow me meow meow mew meooow mew.*







*That part of the sea known among whalemen as the "Brazil Banks" does
*Meow meow me mew mew meeow meeow meeoooow me mew "Meooow Meoow" meow

not bear that name as the Banks of Newfoundland do, because of there
mew meow meow meow me mew Meoow me Meeeeeeeooow me, meeeoow me meoow

meeeow-meow meeeooooow, meooow me mew meow meooow me meow meeeeeeooow

floating in those latitudes, where the Right Whale is often chased.
meeeeoow me meeow meeeeeeow, meoow mew Meoow Meeow me meoow meeoow.







But it was only the sound they made as they parted the brit which at all
Mew me mew meow mew meoow meow meow me meow meeeow mew meow meoow me mew

paused and were stationary for a while, their vast black forms looked

meow meow meooooow meooow me meow meow meeeeeow meow. Mew me me mew

great hunting countries of India, the stranger at a distance will
meeow meeooow meeooooow me Meoow, mew meeoooow me m meeeooow meow

me me meow, meeoow meow mew meow, meeooooow meooooooow me mew meow; meow

me meow meow meoow me m mew me m meeow.




Indeed, in other respects, you can hardly regard any creatures of the
Meooow, me meeow meeeooow, mew mew meeoow meeeow mew meeeeeoow me mew

meow meow mew meow meeeeeow meow mew me meoow me mew meeow. Mew meeeow

me meoow meow me mew mew; mew meooow meooow m meoow meoooow meow me

meeeeow meeeoow me meow me meow meoooooooow meeooow me mew.




But though, to landsmen in general, the native inhabitants of the

me mew meow meeooooow me mew mew meoow meeeeeeoooow meeeoow me me.




The first boat we read of, floated on an ocean, that with Portuguese
Mew meoow meow me meow me, meeeoow me me meoow, meow meow Meeeeeeoow

vengeance had whelmed a whole world without leaving so much as a widow.
meeeeeeow mew meeooow m meeow meoow meoooow meoooow me meow me m meeow.

That same ocean rolls now; that same ocean destroyed the wrecked ships
Meow meow meoow meoow mew; meow meow meeow meeeeeoow mew meeooow meeow

of last year. Yea, foolish mortals, Noah's flood is not yet subsided;
me meow meow. Mew, meeeoow meeeeow, Meow'm meoow me mew mew meeeooow;

two thirds of the fair world it yet covers.
mew meeoow me mew meow meeow me mew meeoow.




Wherein differ the sea and the land, that a miracle upon one is not a
Meeooow meooow mew mew mew mew meow, meow m meoooow meow mew me mew m

miracle upon the other? Preternatural terrors rested upon the Hebrews,
meeeeow meow mew meoow? Meeeeeeooooow meeeoow meeoow meow mew Meeeeow,

when under the feet of Korah and his company the live ground opened
meow meoow mew meow me Meeow mew mew meeooow mew meow meooow meeoow

meeeoooow mew meow meeoow mew meow mew meeeooow me meeow mew meeow.




But not only is the sea such a foe to man who is an alien to it, but it
Mew mew meow me mew mew meow m mew me mew mew me me meoow me me, mew me

is also a fiend to its own off-spring; worse than the Persian host who
me meow m meoow me mew mew mew-meeeow; meeow meow mew Meoooow meow mew

meeeeow. Meow m meooow meeeeow meow meeooow me mew meeeow meeoooow mew

and leaves them there side by side with the split wrecks of ships. No
mew meeeow meow meoow meow me meow meow mew meeow meeoow me meeow. Me

mercy, no power but its own controls it. Panting and snorting like a mad
meoow, me meoow mew mew mew meeeeeow me. Meeeeow mew meeoooow meow m mew

battle steed that has lost its rider, the masterless ocean overruns the
meooow meoow meow mew meow mew meoow, mew meooooooow meeow meeeeoow mew

globe.
meeow.




Consider the subtleness of the sea; how its most dreaded creatures glide
Meeeeoow mew meeeeeeoow me mew mew; mew mew meow meeooow meeeeeoow meeow

meoow meeow, meooooooow mew mew meow meow, mew meeeeeeooooow meeeow

meooow meeeeeeeeow meeow me meow meoooow me meeeow. Meeeeoow, meow meow,

mew meeeeeoow meeeeeeeeow me mew mew; mew meoow meeooooow meow meow meow

other, carrying on eternal war since the world began.
meeow, meeoooow me meeeoow mew meoow mew meeow meoow.




Consider all this; and then turn to this green, gentle, and most docile
Meeeeeow mew meow; mew meow meow me meow meeow, meooow, mew meow meooow

meow meeow meow. Mew meow meow! Meow mew mew meow meow meow, meow meoow

CHAPTER 59. Squid.
MEEEEOW me. Meoow.







Slowly wading through the meadows of brit, the Pequod still held on her
Meeeow meeeow meoooow mew meoooow me meow, mew Meeeow meoow meow me mew

mew meeow-meeeooow meoooow mew meeeow me Meow; m meooow mew meeeoooow

plain. And still, at wide intervals in the silvery night, the lonely,

meeeeoow mew meeow me meow.




But one transparent blue morning, when a stillness almost preternatural

sphere a strange spectre was seen by Daggoo from the main-mast-head.
meooow m meoooow meoooow mew meow me Meeoow meow mew meow-meow-meow.




In the distance, a great white mass lazily rose, and rising higher and
Me mew meeeeeow, m meoow meeow meow meooow meow, mew meeeow meeoow mew

higher, and disentangling itself from the azure, at last gleamed before
meeeow, mew meeooooooooow meooow meow mew meoow, me meow meeooow meooow

our prow like a snow-slide, new slid from the hills. Thus glistening
mew meow meow m meow-meeow, mew meow meow mew meoow. Meow meooooooow

for a moment, as slowly it subsided, and sank. Then once more arose,
mew m meeeow, me meeeow me meeeooow, mew meow. Meow meow meow meeow,

and silently gleamed. It seemed not a whale; and yet is this Moby Dick?
mew meeeooow meeeeow. Me meooow mew m meoow; mew mew me meow Meow Meow?

thought Daggoo. Again the phantom went down, but on re-appearing once
meoooow Meeoow. Meeow mew meeeoow meow meow, mew me me-meeeeeeow meow

more, with a stiletto-like cry that startled every man from his nod, the
meow, meow m meooooow-meow mew meow meeoooow meeow mew meow mew mew, mew

negro yelled out--"There! there again! there she breaches! right ahead!
meeow meeoow mew--"Meeow! meeow meeow! meeow mew meeeeoow! meeow meoow!

The White Whale, the White Whale!"
Mew Meoow Meeow, mew Meoow Meoow!"




Upon this, the seamen rushed to the yard-arms, as in swarming-time the
Meow meow, mew meeeow meeoow me mew meow-meow, me me meeoooow-meow mew

meow meow me mew meooow. Meow-meeeow me mew meeoow mew, Meow meoow me

the bowsprit, and with one hand pushed far behind in readiness to wave
mew meeeeoow, mew meow mew meow meooow mew meooow me meeeeooow me meow

mew meeeow me mew meooooow, meow mew meoow meeoow me mew meeeeeeow

indicated aloft by the outstretched motionless arm of Daggoo.
meeeeeoow meoow me mew meeeeeeeeoow meeeeeeeow mew me Meeeow.




Whether the flitting attendance of the one still and solitary jet had

meooooow mew meoow meow, meow meow m meoow meeeeeoow me meeeoooow meow

meeeow mew meooooow.




The four boats were soon on the water; Ahab's in advance, and all
Mew meow meoow meow meow me mew meoow; Meow'm me meoooow, mew mew

swiftly pulling towards their prey. Soon it went down, and while, with
meoooow meoooow meoooow meoow meow. Meow me meow meow, mew meeow, meow

meow meeeeooow, me meow meeeooow mew meeeeeeeooow, me! me mew meow

meeeeoooow meoow mew meeeow meow meow meeoooow meeeeeow me meeeoow.

A vast pulpy mass, furlongs in length and breadth, of a glancing
M meow meoow meow, meeoooow me meeoow mew meeooow, me m meeeooow

meeoow-meow meeeeeeeow me meow.

meow meow meow, meow meoow meeow!"




"What was it, Sir?" said Flask.
"Meow mew me, Mew?" meow Meeow.




"The great live squid, which, they say, few whale-ships ever beheld, and

returned to their ports to tell of it."
meeoooow me meoow meoow me meow me me."




But Ahab said nothing; turning his boat, he sailed back to the vessel;
Mew Meow meow meeooow; meeeeow mew meow, me meooow meow me mew meeeow;

the rest as silently following.

Whatever superstitions the sperm whalemen in general have connected with
Meeoooow meeeeeoooooow mew meeow meooooow me meoooow meow meeeeooow meow

the sight of this object, certain it is, that a glimpse of it being
mew meeow me meow meeeow, meoooow me me, meow m meoooow me me meoow

so very unusual, that circumstance has gone far to invest it with
me meow meoooow, meow meeeeeeeeoow mew meow mew me meooow me meow

portentousness. So rarely is it beheld, that though one and all of them
meeeeeeeeeooow. Me meeeow me me meeeow, meow meeoow mew mew mew me meow

declare it to be the largest animated thing in the ocean, yet very few
meeooow me me me mew meoooow meeoooow meoow me mew meeow, mew meow mew

of them have any but the most vague ideas concerning its true nature and
me meow meow mew mew mew meow meeow meeow meeeeeeeow mew meow meeoow mew

form; notwithstanding, they believe it to furnish to the sperm whale
meow; meeeoooooooooow, meow meeeoow me me meoooow me mew meeow meeow

his only food. For though other species of whales find their food above
mew meow meow. Mew meooow meeow meoooow me meooow meow meoow meow meeow

water, and may be seen by man in the act of feeding, the spermaceti
meeow, mew mew me meow me mew me mew mew me meeeoow, mew meeoooooow

whale obtains his whole food in unknown zones below the surface; and
meeow meoooow mew meoow meow me meeeeow meeow meoow mew meoooow; mew

only by inference is it that any one can tell of what, precisely, that
meow me meeeeeoow me me meow mew mew mew meow me meow, meeeoooow, meow

food consists. At times, when closely pursued, he will disgorge what
meow meeeooow. Me meoow, meow meeooow meeeeow, me meow meeeeoow meow

are supposed to be the detached arms of the squid; some of them thus
mew meeeeeow me me mew meeeeoow meow me mew meeow; meow me meow meow

exhibited exceeding twenty and thirty feet in length. They fancy that
meeeeooow meeeeeeow meeeow mew meeeow meow me meooow. Meow meoow meow

mew meeeeow me meeow meoow meow meeeeeow meeeeoooow meeoow me meow me

the bed of the ocean; and that the sperm whale, unlike other species, is
mew mew me mew meoow; mew meow mew meoow meoow, meeoow meeow meoooow, me

supplied with teeth in order to attack and tear it.
meeoooow meow meoow me meoow me meeoow mew meow me.




There seems some ground to imagine that the great Kraken of Bishop
Meeow meoow meow meeoow me meeeoow meow mew meeow Meeeow me Meooow

Pontoppodan may ultimately resolve itself into Squid. The manner in
Meeooooooow mew meeeeeeeow meoooow meeeow meow Meeow. Mew meooow me

meow meeow meeeeeeooow me meeoooow, me mew meow mew mew meeoooooow.

But much abatement is necessary with respect to the incredible bulk he
Mew meow meeeeooow me meeeeeoow meow meoooow me mew meeeeeeeow meow me

assigns it.
meoooow me.




By some naturalists who have vaguely heard rumors of the mysterious

CHAPTER 60. The Line.
MEEEOOW me. Mew Meow.







With reference to the whaling scene shortly to be described, as well as
Meow meeeoooow me mew meeeeow meeow meoooow me me meeeeeeow, me meow me

for the better understanding of all similar scenes elsewhere presented,
mew mew meooow meeeeeeeoooow me mew meoooow meooow meeeoooow meeeeooow,

I have here to speak of the magical, sometimes horrible whale-line.
M meow meow me meeow me mew meoooow, meeeeooow meeeooow meeow-meow.




The line originally used in the fishery was of the best hemp, slightly
Mew meow meeeeeeeow meow me mew meoooow mew me mew meow meow, meeoooow

vapoured with tar, not impregnated with it, as in the case of ordinary
meeoooow meow mew, mew meeeeeoooow meow me, me me mew meow me meeoooow

ropes; for while tar, as ordinarily used, makes the hemp more pliable to
meeow; mew meeow mew, me meeeeoooow meow, meoow mew meow meow meeeoow me

the rope-maker, and also renders the rope itself more convenient to the
mew meow-meeow, mew meow meoooow mew meow meeeow meow meeeeeooow me mew

sailor for common ship use; yet, not only would the ordinary quantity
meooow mew meeeow meow mew; mew, mew meow meeow mew meeeeoow meeoooow

too much stiffen the whale-line for the close coiling to which it must
mew meow meeeeow mew meeow-meow mew mew meeow meoooow me meeow me meow

be subjected; but as most seamen are beginning to learn, tar in general
me meeeeooow; mew me meow meooow mew meeooooow me meoow, mew me meeooow

by no means adds to the rope's durability or strength, however much it
me me meoow meow me mew meow'm meeeeeeoow me meeeeeow, meeooow meow me

may give it compactness and gloss.
mew meow me meoooooooow mew meoow.




Of late years the Manilla rope has in the American fishery almost
Me meow meeow mew Meeeoow meow mew me mew Meeeooow meeeoow meeoow

entirely superseded hemp as a material for whale-lines; for, though not
meeeeoow meeeeeooow meow me m meeeeeow mew meeow-meoow; mew, meooow mew

so durable as hemp, it is stronger, and far more soft and elastic; and
me meoooow me meow, me me meeeeeow, mew mew meow meow mew meeeeow; mew

I will add (since there is an aesthetics in all things), is much more
M meow mew (meoow meoow me me meeeeeeoow me mew meooow), me meow meow

handsome and becoming to the boat, than hemp. Hemp is a dusky, dark
meeoooow mew meeeeoow me mew meow, meow meow. Meow me m meoow, meow

fellow, a sort of Indian; but Manilla is as a golden-haired Circassian
meeoow, m meow me Meooow; mew Meoooow me me m meeoow-meooow Meeoooooow

to behold.
me meeeow.




The whale-line is only two-thirds of an inch in thickness. At first
Mew meoow-meow me meow mew-meeeow me me meow me meeooooow. Me meoow

sight, you would not think it so strong as it really is. By experiment
meoow, mew meoow mew meeow me me meooow me me meeoow me. Me meeeeeeeow

its one and fifty yarns will each suspend a weight of one hundred and
mew mew mew meoow meoow meow meow meeooow m meooow me mew meeeoow mew

twenty pounds; so that the whole rope will bear a strain nearly equal
meooow meeoow; me meow mew meoow meow meow meow m meeeow meeeow meoow

to three tons. In length, the common sperm whale-line measures something
me meeow meow. Me meooow, mew meooow meoow meeow-meow meooooow meeooooow

over two hundred fathoms. Towards the stern of the boat it is spirally
meow mew meeeoow meeeeow. Meeeoow mew meeow me mew meow me me meeeooow

coiled away in the tub, not like the worm-pipe of a still though, but so
meeoow meow me mew mew, mew meow mew meow-meow me m meoow meeoow, mew me

as to form one round, cheese-shaped mass of densely bedded "sheaves," or
me me meow mew meeow, meeeow-meeoow meow me meoooow meeoow "meeeoow," me

layers of concentric spiralizations, without any hollow but the "heart,"
meooow me meeoooooow meeeeeeoooooow, meoooow mew meooow mew mew "meoow,"

or minute vertical tube formed at the axis of the cheese. As the least
me meeoow meeeeeow meow meeoow me mew meow me mew meooow. Me mew meoow

tangle or kink in the coiling would, in running out, infallibly take
meeeow me meow me mew meeooow meeow, me meeeoow mew, meeeeeeoow meow

somebody's arm, leg, or entire body off, the utmost precaution is used
meeoooow'm mew, mew, me meooow meow mew, mew meooow meeeeeeoow me meow

in stowing the line in its tub. Some harpooneers will consume almost an
me meeooow mew meow me mew mew. Meow meeeeeeeeow meow meeeeow meooow me

entire morning in this business, carrying the line high aloft and then
meooow meoooow me meow meeeeoow, meeeooow mew meow meow meeow mew meow

reeving it downwards through a block towards the tub, so as in the act
meeeeow me meeeeooow meeeeow m meoow meeeoow mew mew, me me me mew mew

of coiling to free it from all possible wrinkles and twists.
me meeooow me meow me meow mew meeeeeow meeeeeow mew meeoow.




In the English boats two tubs are used instead of one; the same line
Me mew Meeooow meeow mew meow mew meow meoooow me mew; mew meow meow

being continuously coiled in both tubs. There is some advantage in this;
meoow meeeeeeeeoow meeoow me meow meow. Meeow me meow meeeeeeow me meow;

because these twin-tubs being so small they fit more readily into the
meeooow meeow meow-meow meeow me meeow meow mew meow meoooow meow mew

boat, and do not strain it so much; whereas, the American tub, nearly
meow, mew me mew meeoow me me meow; meeeeow, mew Meeeeeow mew, meeoow

three feet in diameter and of proportionate depth, makes a rather bulky
meoow meow me meooooow mew me meeooooooooow meeow, meeow m meeeow meeow

freight for a craft whose planks are but one half-inch in thickness; for
meeeoow mew m meeow meoow meeeow mew mew mew meow-meow me meeeeooow; mew

the bottom of the whale-boat is like critical ice, which will bear up
mew meeeow me mew meeow-meow me meow meeoooow mew, meeow meow meow me

a considerable distributed weight, but not very much of a concentrated
m meeeeeeeeeow meeeeeeeoow meooow, mew mew meow meow me m meeeeoooooow

one. When the painted canvas cover is clapped on the American line-tub,
mew. Meow mew meeeeow meeeow meeow me meeeoow me mew Meooooow meow-mew,

the boat looks as if it were pulling off with a prodigious great
mew meow meoow me me me meow meeeeow mew meow m meeeeeeeow meoow

wedding-cake to present to the whales.
meeeoow-meow me meeeeow me mew meooow.




Both ends of the line are exposed; the lower end terminating in an
Meow meow me mew meow mew meeeoow; mew meeow mew meeooooooow me me

eye-splice or loop coming up from the bottom against the side of the
mew-meeoow me meow meeoow me meow mew meeoow meoooow mew meow me mew

tub, and hanging over its edge completely disengaged from everything.
mew, mew meeeoow meow mew meow meeeeoooow meooooooow meow meeeeeooow.

This arrangement of the lower end is necessary on two accounts. First:
Meow meeeeeeooow me mew meoow mew me meeeeeoow me mew meeeeoow. Meoow:

In order to facilitate the fastening to it of an additional line from a
Me meeow me meeeooooow mew meeeeeeow me me me me meeeeoooow meow meow m

neighboring boat, in case the stricken whale should sound so deep as
meeeeeeeoow meow, me meow mew meeeooow meoow meooow meoow me meow me

to threaten to carry off the entire line originally attached to the
me meooooow me meoow mew mew meeoow meow meooooooow meeeooow me mew

harpoon. In these instances, the whale of course is shifted like a mug
meeooow. Me meeow meeeeeeow, mew meoow me meooow me meeeoow meow m mew

of ale, as it were, from the one boat to the other; though the
me mew, me me meow, meow mew mew meow me mew meoow; meeoow mew

first boat always hovers at hand to assist its consort. Second: This
meeow meow meooow meeeow me meow me meeeow mew meeeeow. Meooow: Meow

arrangement is indispensable for common safety's sake; for were the
meeeeeeooow me meeeeeeeeooow mew meeoow meooow'm meow; mew meow mew

lower end of the line in any way attached to the boat, and were the
meoow mew me mew meow me mew mew meeeeeow me mew meow, mew meow mew

whale then to run the line out to the end almost in a single, smoking
meeow meow me mew mew meow mew me mew mew meeeow me m meooow, meeeeow

minute as he sometimes does, he would not stop there, for the doomed
meeoow me me meoooooow meow, me meeow mew meow meoow, mew mew meeeow

boat would infallibly be dragged down after him into the profundity of
meow meoow meeoooooow me meoooow meow meoow mew meow mew meeeeeooow me

the sea; and in that case no town-crier would ever find her again.
mew mew; mew me meow meow me meow-meeow meoow meow meow mew meoow.




Before lowering the boat for the chase, the upper end of the line is
Meooow meeeeoow mew meow mew mew meeow, mew meoow mew me mew meow me

taken aft from the tub, and passing round the loggerhead there, is again
meeow mew meow mew mew, mew meeeeow meoow mew meeeooooow meeow, me meeow

carried forward the entire length of the boat, resting crosswise upon
meeeoow meeooow mew meeeow meooow me mew meow, meeeoow meeeeooow meow

the loom or handle of every man's oar, so that it jogs against his wrist
mew meow me meooow me meoow mew'm mew, me meow me meow meeeoow mew meeow

in rowing; and also passing between the men, as they alternately sit at
me meeoow; mew meow meeeeow meeeeow mew mew, me meow meoooooooow mew me

the opposite gunwales, to the leaded chocks or grooves in the extreme
mew meeeeeow meeoooow, me mew meooow meooow me meoooow me mew meeeeow

pointed prow of the boat, where a wooden pin or skewer the size of a
meeeeow meow me mew meow, meoow m meeeow mew me meooow mew meow me m

common quill, prevents it from slipping out. From the chocks it hangs
meeeow meeow, meeeeoow me meow meooooow mew. Meow mew meeeow me meeow

in a slight festoon over the bows, and is then passed inside the boat
me m meeeow meeeeow meow mew meow, mew me meow meooow meeeow mew meow

again; and some ten or twenty fathoms (called box-line) being coiled
meoow; mew meow mew me meeoow meeeeow (meeeow mew-meow) meeow meeeow

upon the box in the bows, it continues its way to the gunwale still a
meow mew mew me mew meow, me meeeoooow mew mew me mew meeeeow meoow m

little further aft, and is then attached to the short-warp--the rope
meooow meeeeow mew, mew me meow meeeeoow me mew meoow-meow--mew meow

which is immediately connected with the harpoon; but previous to that
meeow me meoooooooow meeeeooow meow mew meeeoow; mew meeeooow me meow

connexion, the short-warp goes through sundry mystifications too tedious
meeeoooow, mew meeow-meow meow meeeeow meooow meeeeoooooooow mew meeeoow

to detail.
me meeoow.




Thus the whale-line folds the whole boat in its complicated coils,
Meow mew meoow-meow meeow mew meoow meow me mew meeooooooow meeow,

twisting and writhing around it in almost every direction. All the
meooooow mew meeeooow meeoow me me meooow meoow meeeeooow. Mew mew

oarsmen are involved in its perilous contortions; so that to the timid
meeeeow mew meeoooow me mew meeeooow meeeeeeooow; me meow me mew meoow

eye of the landsman, they seem as Indian jugglers, with the deadliest
mew me mew meeeooow, meow meow me Meeeow meeeeeow, meow mew meoooooow

snakes sportively festooning their limbs. Nor can any son of mortal
meooow meeoooooow meooooooow meoow meoow. Mew mew mew mew me meooow

woman, for the first time, seat himself amid those hempen intricacies,
meeow, mew mew meeow meow, meow meoooow meow meeow meooow meeeeeeeeow,

and while straining his utmost at the oar, bethink him that at any
mew meoow meeeoooow mew meooow me mew mew, meoooow mew meow me mew

unknown instant the harpoon may be darted, and all these horrible
meeooow meoooow mew meeeoow mew me meeoow, mew mew meoow meeeooow

contortions be put in play like ringed lightnings; he cannot be thus
meeeeooooow me mew me meow meow meeoow meeoooooow; me meooow me meow

circumstanced without a shudder that makes the very marrow in his bones
meeeeeoooooow meoooow m meeooow meow meeow mew meow meeeow me mew meeow

to quiver in him like a shaken jelly. Yet habit--strange thing! what
me meeoow me mew meow m meeeow meoow. Mew meoow--meoooow meeow! meow

cannot habit accomplish?--Gayer sallies, more merry mirth, better jokes,
meooow meoow meeeooooow?--Meeow meeooow, meow meoow meeow, meeoow meeow,

and brighter repartees, you never heard over your mahogany, than you
mew meeeooow meeeeeeow, mew meoow meoow meow meow meeeeeow, meow mew

will hear over the half-inch white cedar of the whale-boat, when thus
meow meow meow mew meow-meow meoow meeow me mew meeow-meow, meow meow

hung in hangman's nooses; and, like the six burghers of Calais before
meow me meoooow'm meeoow; mew, meow mew mew meooooow me Meeeow meeoow

King Edward, the six men composing the crew pull into the jaws of death,
Meow Meeoow, mew mew mew meeeoooow mew meow meow meow mew meow me meeow,

with a halter around every neck, as you may say.
meow m meeeow meeoow meeow meow, me mew mew mew.




Perhaps a very little thought will now enable you to account for
Meeeeow m meow meeoow meeooow meow mew meeeow mew me meeooow mew

those repeated whaling disasters--some few of which are casually
meoow meeoooow meoooow meeooooow--meow mew me meeow mew meooooow

line, and lost. For, when the line is darting out, to be seated then in
meow, mew meow. Mew, meow mew meow me meeooow mew, me me meeoow meow me

the boat, is like being seated in the midst of the manifold whizzings
mew meow, me meow meeow meeoow me mew meeow me mew meeeeoow meeooooow

of a steam-engine in full play, when every flying beam, and shaft, and
me m meeow-meeeow me meow meow, meow meoow meeeow meow, mew meeow, mew

wheel, is grazing you. It is worse; for you cannot sit motionless in the
meoow, me meeooow mew. Me me meoow; mew mew meeeow mew meeeeeeeow me mew

heart of these perils, because the boat is rocking like a cradle, and
meeow me meeow meeeow, meeooow mew meow me meeeeow meow m meeeow, mew

you are pitched one way and the other, without the slightest warning;
mew mew meeooow mew mew mew mew meoow, meeeoow mew meeooooow meeeeow;

and only by a certain self-adjusting buoyancy and simultaneousness of
mew meow me m meoooow meow-meeeeeeow meeeooow mew meeoooooooooooow me

volition and action, can you escape being made a Mazeppa of, and run
meeeooow mew meeoow, mew mew meeeow meeow meow m Meoooow me, mew mew

away with where the all-seeing sun himself could never pierce you out.
meow meow meeow mew mew-meooow mew meoooow meeow meoow meeeow mew mew.




Again: as the profound calm which only apparently precedes and
Meeow: me mew meeeeoow meow meoow meow meeeeeeoow meeeeeow mew

prophesies of the storm, is perhaps more awful than the storm itself;
meooooooow me mew meeow, me meeeoow meow meoow meow mew meoow meeeow;

mew, meeeow, mew meow me mew mew meeeeow mew meooooow me mew meeow; mew

into actual play--this is a thing which carries more of true terror than
meow meeeow meow--meow me m meeow meoow meeeoow meow me meow meeoow meow

any other aspect of this dangerous affair. But why say more? All men
mew meeow meeeow me meow meeeeeoow meooow. Mew mew mew meow? Mew mew

live enveloped in whale-lines. All are born with halters round their
meow meeeeeoow me meoow-meeow. Mew mew meow meow meeeoow meoow meeow

necks; but it is only when caught in the swift, sudden turn of death,
meeow; mew me me meow meow meeeow me mew meoow, meeeow meow me meoow,

that mortals realize the silent, subtle, ever-present perils of life.
meow meeeeow meeeeow mew meooow, meeoow, meow-meeooow meooow me meow.

Mew me mew me m meoooooooow, meeeow meooow me mew meeow-meow, mew meoow

mew me meoow meow mew meow meow me meeeow, meow meeoow meeeow meooow

your evening fire with a poker, and not a harpoon, by your side.
meow meoooow meow meow m meoow, mew mew m meeeeow, me meow meow.










CHAPTER 61. Stubb Kills a Whale.

The next day was exceedingly still and sultry, and with nothing special
Mew meow mew mew meeeeeeooow meoow mew meeoow, mew meow meoooow meoooow

It was my turn to stand at the foremast-head; and with my shoulders

meow; meeoow me meow meoow meeeeeeow me meow me m meeoooow meow, meow

after the power which first moved it is withdrawn.
meeow mew meoow meoow meoow meoow me me meeeeeoow.

out of the way of the whale's horrible wallow, and then ranging up for
mew me mew mew me mew meoow'm meeoooow meeoow, mew meow meeooow me mew

another fling.
meeooow meeow.




The red tide now poured from all sides of the monster like brooks down a
Mew mew meow mew meeeow meow mew meoow me mew meeeeow meow meeoow meow m

hill. His tormented body rolled not in brine but in blood, which bubbled

mew meeooow mew meeeooow meeoow me meeow meow. Mew meooooow mew meeeoow

meow me meow mew meeow.




"Pull up--pull up!" he now cried to the bowsman, as the waning whale
"Meow me--meow me!" me mew meoow me mew meeooow, me mew meooow meeow

meeoooow meow mew meoow mew me mew mew.

meow mew meooooooow meeoow meow mew mew. Mew meeow mew meoow!




"He's dead, Mr. Stubb," said Daggoo.
"Me'm meow, Me. Meoow," meow Meeeow.

CHAPTER 62. The Dart.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meow.







A word concerning an incident in the last chapter.
M meow meeeeeeeow me meeeeeow me mew meow meeeoow.




According to the invariable usage of the fishery, the whale-boat pushes
Meeeeooow me mew meooooooow meeow me mew meoooow, mew meoow-meow meooow

off from the ship, with the headsman or whale-killer as temporary
mew meow mew meow, meow mew meooooow me meoow-meooow me meeooooow

steersman, and the harpooneer or whale-fastener pulling the foremost
meoooooow, mew mew meeeeeeoow me meeow-meeeooow meeeeow mew meeeeoow

oar, the one known as the harpooneer-oar. Now it needs a strong, nervous
mew, mew mew meoow me mew meeeeeeoow-mew. Mew me meoow m meeoow, meeeeow

arm to strike the first iron into the fish; for often, in what is called
mew me meeeow mew meeow meow meow mew meow; mew meeow, me meow me meeoow

a long dart, the heavy implement has to be flung to the distance of
m meow meow, mew meoow meeeeeoow mew me me meeow me mew meeeeeow me

twenty or thirty feet. But however prolonged and exhausting the chase,
meeoow me meooow meow. Mew meeeoow meeeeeoow mew meeeeeeeow mew meeow,

the harpooneer is expected to pull his oar meanwhile to the uttermost;
mew meeeooooow me meeeeoow me meow mew mew meoooooow me mew meeeeeoow;

indeed, he is expected to set an example of superhuman activity to the
meooow, me me meooooow me mew me meeooow me meeeooooow meeoooow me mew

rest, not only by incredible rowing, but by repeated loud and intrepid
meow, mew meow me meeeooooow meeoow, mew me meeeooow meow mew meeeooow

exclamations; and what it is to keep shouting at the top of one's
meeeeeeoooow; mew meow me me me meow meooooow me mew mew me mew'm

compass, while all the other muscles are strained and half started--what
meoooow, meoow mew mew meoow meeeoow mew meeoooow mew meow meoooow--meow

that is none know but those who have tried it. For one, I cannot bawl
meow me meow meow mew meeow mew meow meeow me. Mew mew, M meeoow meow

very heartily and work very recklessly at one and the same time. In this
meow meeeeoow mew meow meow meooooooow me mew mew mew meow meow. Me meow

straining, bawling state, then, with his back to the fish, all at once
meeooooow, meeeoow meeow, meow, meow mew meow me mew meow, mew me meow

the exhausted harpooneer hears the exciting cry--"Stand up, and give it
mew meeooooow meeeeeooow meeow mew meeeooow mew--"Meoow me, mew meow me

to him!" He now has to drop and secure his oar, turn round on his
me mew!" Me mew mew me meow mew meeoow mew mew, meow meeow me mew

centre half way, seize his harpoon from the crotch, and with what little
meooow meow mew, meoow mew meeeoow meow mew meooow, mew meow meow meeeow

strength may remain, he essays to pitch it somehow into the whale. No
meeeeoow mew meeoow, me meooow me meeow me meeooow meow mew meeow. Me

wonder, taking the whole fleet of whalemen in a body, that out of fifty
meeoow, meeoow mew meoow meoow me meeeooow me m meow, meow mew me meeow

fair chances for a dart, not five are successful; no wonder that so many
meow meoooow mew m meow, mew meow mew meeeeeeeow; me meeeow meow me meow

meeooow meeooooooow mew meoow meeeow mew meeoooow; me meeoow meow meow

me meow meeeeoow meeow meeow meoow-meeooow me mew meow; me meeeow meow

meow meeow meeeeoow mew meeoow meow meeow meow meow meeeeow; me meeeow

that to many ship owners, whaling is but a losing concern; for it is the
meow me meow meow meeeow, meeeoow me mew m meooow meeeoow; mew me me mew

harpooneer that makes the voyage, and if you take the breath out of his
meooooooow meow meeow mew meeoow, mew me mew meow mew meeoow mew me mew

body how can you expect to find it there when most wanted!
meow mew mew mew meeeow me meow me meoow meow meow meooow!




Again, if the dart be successful, then at the second critical instant,
Meoow, me mew meow me meeeeeeeow, meow me mew meeoow meeeeeow meeooow,

that is, when the whale starts to run, the boatheader and harpooneer
meow me, meow mew meeow meeoow me mew, mew meeoooooow mew meeeooooow

meooooow meoow me meeeeow meow mew mew, me mew meooooow meeeooow me

meeeeoooow mew meoow mew meow. Me me meow meow meeoow meeeow; mew

the headsman, the chief officer of the little craft, takes his proper
mew meeeeoow, mew meeow meoooow me mew meooow meeow, meoow mew meeoow

station in the bows of the boat.
meeeoow me mew meow me mew meow.




Now, I care not who maintains the contrary, but all this is both foolish

and unnecessary. The headsman should stay in the bows from first to
mew meeeeeeooow. Mew meeeeeow meeoow meow me mew meow meow meoow me

last; he should both dart the harpoon and the lance, and no rowing
meow; me meeeow meow meow mew meoooow mew mew meeow, mew me meooow

whatever should be expected of him, except under circumstances obvious
meeeeoow meooow me meooooow me mew, meeoow meeow meoooooooooow meoooow

me mew meoooooow. M meow meow meow meoow meeooooow meeeeow m meeeow meow

of speed in the chase; but long experience in various whalemen of more
me meeow me mew meoow; mew meow meeeooooow me meeooow meeeeoow me meow

meow mew meooow mew meeeeeeow me meow me mew meow meeoooow me meeoooow

me mew meeeoow, me mew mew me mew meeow meow me meow mew meeow me mew

meeoow meow.
