CHAPTER 63. The Crotch.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeoow.







Out of the trunk, the branches grow; out of them, the twigs. So, in
Mew me mew meeow, mew meeeooow meow; mew me meow, mew meoow. Me, me

productive subjects, grow the chapters.
meeoooooow meeeooow, meow mew meeeeeow.




The crotch alluded to on a previous page deserves independent mention.
Mew meooow meeooow me me m meeeeoow meow meeoooow meeeeeoooow meeooow.

It is a notched stick of a peculiar form, some two feet in length, which
Me me m meeeoow meoow me m meooooow meow, meow mew meow me meeeow, meeow

is perpendicularly inserted into the starboard gunwale near the bow,
me meeeeeeeeeeeeow meooooow meow mew meeeeeeow meeooow meow mew mew,

for the purpose of furnishing a rest for the wooden extremity of the
mew mew meeeoow me meeeooooow m meow mew mew meeoow meeooooow me mew

harpoon, whose other naked, barbed end slopingly projects from the prow.
meeeoow, meeow meoow meeow, meeeow mew meeeeeeow meooooow meow mew meow.

Thereby the weapon is instantly at hand to its hurler, who snatches it
Meeooow mew meeeow me meeeoooow me meow me mew meeoow, mew meeeooow me

up as readily from its rest as a backwoodsman swings his rifle from
me me meeeeow meow mew meow me m meeoooooooow meooow mew meeow meow

the wall. It is customary to have two harpoons reposing in the crotch,
mew meow. Me me meeeoooow me meow mew meeeeoow meeeeoow me mew meooow,

respectively called the first and second irons.
meeeeeeeeoow meooow mew meoow mew meooow meoow.




But these two harpoons, each by its own cord, are both connected with
Mew meeow mew meeeeeow, meow me mew mew meow, mew meow meoooooow meow

the line; the object being this: to dart them both, if possible, one
mew meow; mew meeoow meoow meow: me meow meow meow, me meooooow, mew

instantly after the other into the same whale; so that if, in the coming
meeeeeoow meoow mew meoow meow mew meow meeow; me meow me, me mew meooow

drag, one should draw out, the other may still retain a hold. It is a
meow, mew meeeow meow mew, mew meeow mew meoow meeeow m meow. Me me m

doubling of the chances. But it very often happens that owing to the
meeeeoow me mew meeooow. Mew me meow meeow meeooow meow meoow me mew

instantaneous, violent, convulsive running of the whale upon receiving
meoooooooooow, meeeeow, meeeeeooow meeeoow me mew meeow meow meeeeeeow

the first iron, it becomes impossible for the harpooneer, however
mew meeow meow, me meeeoow meooooooow mew mew meeeooooow, meeeoow

lightning-like in his movements, to pitch the second iron into him.
meeeeooow-meow me mew meeooooow, me meeow mew meeoow meow meow mew.

Nevertheless, as the second iron is already connected with the line,
Meeoooooooow, me mew meeeow meow me meoooow meeeeooow meow mew meow,

and the line is running, hence that weapon must, at all events, be
mew mew meow me meeooow, meoow meow meeeow meow, me mew meooow, me

anticipatingly tossed out of the boat, somehow and somewhere; else the
meeeooooooooow meeoow mew me mew meow, meeooow mew meeeeeoow; meow mew

most terrible jeopardy would involve all hands. Tumbled into the water,
meow meeeooow meeeeeow meoow meeeeow mew meeow. Meeeeow meow mew meeow,

it accordingly is in such cases; the spare coils of box line (mentioned
me meeeeeeeoow me me meow meeow; mew meoow meoow me mew meow (meeeeeeow

in a preceding chapter) making this feat, in most instances, prudently
me m meoooooow meeeoow) meooow meow meow, me meow meeeeooow, meoooooow

practicable. But this critical act is not always unattended with the
meeeeeeeoow. Mew meow meeoooow mew me mew meeeow meeoooooow meow mew

saddest and most fatal casualties.
meeeoow mew meow meoow meeeeeeeow.




Furthermore: you must know that when the second iron is thrown
Meeeeeeooow: mew meow meow meow meow mew meooow meow me meooow

overboard, it thenceforth becomes a dangling, sharp-edged terror,
meeeeooow, me meeeoooooow meeeeow m meeoooow, meeow-meoow meeoow,

skittishly curvetting about both boat and whale, entangling the lines,
meeeeoooow meeeooooow meeow meow meow mew meeow, meooooooow mew meoow,

or cutting them, and making a prodigious sensation in all directions.
me meeooow meow, mew meeoow m meeoooooow meeeeeoow me mew meeeeeeeow.

Nor, in general, is it possible to secure it again until the whale is
Mew, me meoooow, me me meeeeoow me meooow me meoow meeow mew meeow me

fairly captured and a corpse.
meooow meooooow mew m meooow.




Consider, now, how it must be in the case of four boats all engaging
Meeeeeow, mew, mew me meow me me mew meow me meow meoow mew meeeeoow

mew meeeeeoow meeeow, meooow, mew meeeoow meoow; meow meoow me meeow

meeeoooow me mew, me meow me me mew meeoooow meooooooow meeeeeoow me

meow me meeeeeoow meeeeeooow, meeow me mew meoow meooow meoow mew me

simultaneously dangling about him. For, of course, each boat is supplied
meeeeeeeooooow meeeeeow meoow mew. Mew, me meeeow, meow meow me meeeeoow

with several harpoons to bend on to the line should the first one
meow meoooow meeeeeow me meow me me mew meow meeeow mew meeow mew

be ineffectually darted without recovery. All these particulars are
me meeeeeeooooow meooow meeeoow meeeooow. Mew meoow meoooooooow mew

most important, however intricate passages, in scenes hereafter to be
meow meeeoooow, meeeeow meeeeeoow meeeeoow, me meeoow meeeeooow me me

painted.
meeooow.










CHAPTER 64. Stubb's Supper.
MEEEEOW me. Meoow'm Meeoow.







Stubb's whale had been killed some distance from the ship. It was
Meoow'm meeow mew meow meeeow meow meooooow meow mew meow. Me mew

a calm; so, forming a tandem of three boats, we commenced the slow
m meow; me, meoooow m meeeow me meoow meeow, me meoooooow mew meow

meeeeeow me meeeow mew meeoow me mew Meooow. Mew mew, me me meeeeoow mew

meow mew meeeow-mew meow, mew mew meeooow mew meeeow meeeow mew meeeoow,

meooow meeeow meow meeow meow meow meow meoow, meooooow meeoow me mew

mew; mew me meeeow meooow me meeow me mew, meeeow me meow meeeeooow;

meow meeoooow mew meooow meoooooow me mew meeoooooooow me mew meow me

moved. For, upon the great canal of Hang-Ho, or whatever they call
meeow. Mew, meow mew meeow meeow me Meow-Me, me meeeooow meow meow

it, in China, four or five laborers on the foot-path will draw a bulky
me, me Meeow, meow me meow meeeeeow me mew meow-meow meow meow m meoow

meeeeeeow meow me mew meow me m meow me meow; mew meow meoow meooow me

towed heavily forged along, as if laden with pig-lead in bulk.
meeow meeeeow meooow meeow, me me meoow meow mew-meow me meow.




Darkness came on; but three lights up and down in the Pequod's
Meeeooow meow me; mew meoow meeeow me mew meow me mew Meeoow'm

main-rigging dimly guided our way; till drawing nearer we saw Ahab

meeoooow mew me meoooow meow meooooow meow mew meeeeeow. Meeeeeow meeeow

mew meeeoow meoow mew m meeeow, me meeeow mew meoow meooow mew meeoooow

me mew mew meoow, mew meow meeeoow mew meeeoow me m meeeow, meow mew mew

into the cabin, and did not come forward again until morning.
meow mew meoow, mew mew mew meow meeooow meoow meeow meeooow.




Though, in overseeing the pursuit of this whale, Captain Ahab had
Meeeow, me meeeeeeeow mew meoooow me meow meeow, Meeooow Meow mew

evinced his customary activity, to call it so; yet now that the creature
meeooow mew meeeoooow meeeeoow, me meow me me; mew mew meow mew meeoooow

was dead, some vague dissatisfaction, or impatience, or despair, seemed
mew meow, meow meeow meeeeeeeoooooow, me meeeeeeoow, me meeooow, meeeow

meeeeow me mew; me me mew meoow me meow meow meow meeeeoow mew meow

meoooow me mew meow, mew meow meeow mew mew mew meeeeow mew meeow,

meeoooooow meooow. Meow meow mew meoow meow meeeoow meow mew meeow me

mew Meooow'm meeow, meow mew meeow meow meeeoooow me meow meeoow me

the deep; for heavy chains are being dragged along the deck, and thrust
mew meow; mew meeow meeeow mew meeow meoooow meeow mew meow, mew meeeow

meeeeeow mew me mew meow-meeow. Mew me meeow meeeeeow meeow, mew meow

corpse itself, not the ship, is to be moored. Tied by the head to the
meeeow meooow, mew mew meow, me me me meeeow. Meow me mew meow me mew

stern, and by the tail to the bows, the whale now lies with its black
meeow, mew me mew meow me mew meow, mew meoow mew meow meow mew meoow

meow meoow me mew meeoow'm mew meow meoooow mew meeoooow me mew meoow,

meeow meeoooow mew meeow mew meoooow meeow, mew mew--meow mew meoow,

mew meeow meeeeow meeeeeow.*







*A little item may as well be related here. The strongest and most
*M meeoow meow mew me meow me meeooow meow. Mew meeooooow mew meow

reliable hold which the ship has upon the whale when moored alongside,
meeeeoow meow meoow mew meow mew meow mew meeow meow meooow meeeeeoow,

is by the flukes or tail; and as from its greater density that part

CHAPTER 65. The Whale as a Dish.
MEEOOOW me. Mew Meeow me m Meow.







That mortal man should feed upon the creature that feeds his lamp, and,
Meow meeeow mew meeeow meow meow mew meeeeeow meow meoow mew meow, mew,

like Stubb, eat him by his own light, as you may say; this seems so
meow Meoow, mew mew me mew mew meeow, me mew mew mew; meow meoow me

meeoooooow m meeow meow mew meow meoow me m meeoow meow mew meeeoow mew

philosophy of it.
meeoooooow me me.




It is upon record, that three centuries ago the tongue of the Right
Me me meow meooow, meow meoow meeeeeeow mew mew meeeow me mew Meoow

Whale was esteemed a great delicacy in France, and commanded large
Meeow mew meeeooow m meoow meeeooow me Meeoow, mew meeeeeoow meoow

prices there. Also, that in Henry VIIIth's time, a certain cook of the
meeeow meeow. Meow, meow me Meeow MEOOow'm meow, m meeooow meow me mew

court obtained a handsome reward for inventing an admirable sauce to be
meoow meeeeeow m meeoooow meeoow mew meeeoooow me meeeeeeow meeow me me

eaten with barbacued porpoises, which, you remember, are a species of
meoow meow meeeeeoow meeeoooow, meoow, mew meeeeeow, mew m meeeeow me

whale. Porpoises, indeed, are to this day considered fine eating. The
meeow. Meeeeeoow, meeeow, mew me meow mew meeeeeeeow meow meooow. Mew

meat is made into balls about the size of billiard balls, and being well
meow me meow meow meeow meoow mew meow me meeoooow meoow, mew meeow meow

seasoned and spiced might be taken for turtle-balls or veal balls.
meeeeoow mew meeeow meeow me meeow mew meooow-meeow me meow meoow.

The old monks of Dunfermline were very fond of them. They had a great
Mew mew meoow me Meeeeeeeeow meow meow meow me meow. Meow mew m meoow

porpoise grant from the crown.
meeeooow meoow meow mew meoow.




The fact is, that among his hunters at least, the whale would by all
Mew meow me, meow meeow mew meeeeow me meeow, mew meeow meoow me mew

hands be considered a noble dish, were there not so much of him; but
meeow me meeoooooow m meeow meow, meow meoow mew me meow me mew; mew

meow mew meow me mew meow meooow m meow-mew meooow mew meeeeow meow

long, it takes away your appetite. Only the most unprejudiced of men
meow, me meoow meow meow meeoooow. Meow mew meow meeeooooooow me mew

like Stubb, nowadays partake of cooked whales; but the Esquimaux are not
meow Meeow, meeoooow meoooow me meeoow meeoow; mew mew Meeeeooow mew mew

so fastidious. We all know how they live upon whales, and have rare
me meeeeoooow. Me mew meow mew meow meow meow meooow, mew meow meow

old vintages of prime old train oil. Zogranda, one of their most famous
mew meeeeeow me meeow mew meoow mew. Meooooow, mew me meoow meow meeoow

doctors, recommends strips of blubber for infants, as being exceedingly
meeeeow, meeeeoooow meooow me meeooow mew meeeoow, me meoow meeeoooooow

juicy and nourishing. And this reminds me that certain Englishmen, who
meeow mew meeeeoooow. Mew meow meeeoow me meow meoooow Meeeeeeeow, mew

long ago were accidentally left in Greenland by a whaling vessel--that
meow mew meow meeeeeeeeoow meow me Meeooooow me m meoooow meooow--meow

meoow mew meooooow meoow mew meeeeow meooow me mew meeoow meeoow me

meeeow meoow mew meow meow meeoow meeow meooow mew mew meeeoow. Meeow

mew Meoow meeeeoow meoow meeeow mew meooow "meeeeeow"; meoow, meooow,

they greatly resemble, being brown and crisp, and smelling something
meow meeooow meeeooow, meoow meeow mew meeow, mew meeeeoow meeeeeeow

meow mew Meeeoooow meeeeeeeow' meoow-meow me mew-meoow, meow meeow. Meow

have such an eatable look that the most self-denying stranger can hardly
meow meow me meeeeow meow meow mew meow meow-meeeeow meooooow mew meooow

keep his hands off.
meow mew meeow mew.




But what further depreciates the whale as a civilized dish, is his

exceeding richness. He is the great prize ox of the sea, too fat to be
meeeeeoow meeeooow. Me me mew meoow meoow me me mew mew, mew mew me me

the buffalo's (which is esteemed a rare dish), were it not such a solid

meeeow. Meeeeeeeooow, meow meooooow meow m meeoow me meeeeeeow me meow

In the case of a small Sperm Whale the brains are accounted a fine dish.
Me mew meow me m meeow Meeow Meeow mew meooow mew meeeeeoow m meow meow.

The casket of the skull is broken into with an axe, and the two plump,
Mew meeeow me mew meoow me meooow meow meow me mew, mew mew mew meeow,

whitish lobes being withdrawn (precisely resembling two large puddings),
meeooow meoow meoow meeooooow (meeeoooow meeeooooow mew meeow meeeeeow),

they are then mixed with flour, and cooked into a most delectable mess,
meow mew meow meoow meow meoow, mew meeoow meow m meow meeeeeooow meow,

in flavor somewhat resembling calves' head, which is quite a dish among
me meooow meeeooow meeoooooow meeoow' meow, meeow me meoow m meow meoow

some epicures; and every one knows that some young bucks among the
meow meeeeeow; mew meoow mew meoow meow meow meeow meoow meoow mew

epicures, by continually dining upon calves' brains, by and by get to
meooooow, me meeeeooooow meeoow meow meeeow' meeeow, me mew me mew me

have a little brains of their own, so as to be able to tell a
meow m meeoow meeeow me meoow mew, me me me me meow me meow m

calf's head from their own heads; which, indeed, requires uncommon
meow'm meow meow meeow mew meeow; meoow, meeoow, meeeooow meeeeoow

discrimination. And that is the reason why a young buck with an
meeoooooooooow. Mew meow me mew meeoow mew m meoow meow meow me

intelligent looking calf's head before him, is somehow one of the
meeooooooow meeeeow meow'm meow meooow mew, me meeooow mew me mew

meeeeow meeeow mew mew mew. Mew meow meeow m meow me meeeeeoooooow me

him, with an "Et tu Brute!" expression.
mew, meow me "Me me Meeow!" meeeeeooow.




It is not, perhaps, entirely because the whale is so excessively
Me me mew, meeeoow, meeeeeow meeooow mew meeow me me meeeoooooow

meeoooow meow meeoooow meow me meeoow mew meeeow me mew meow meeeeeooow;

meow meoooow me meooow, me meow mew, meow mew meeeeeeooooow meeoow

meeeeeeow: m.m. meow m mew meeeow mew m meoow meeeeeow meeow me mew mew,

and eat it too by its own light. But no doubt the first man that ever
mew mew me mew me mew mew meoow. Mew me meeow mew meoow mew meow meow

murdered an ox was regarded as a murderer; perhaps he was hung; and if

me mew meow mew me mew meoow me meow, me meeeeeeow meoow meow meow; mew

meow meow me meow meeeeoooow. Meow mew meow meeow meow m meoow mew me

the cannibal's jaw? Cannibals? who is not a cannibal? I tell you it will
mew meeeeeow'm mew? Meeeoooow? mew me mew m meeeeoow? M meow mew me meow

be more tolerable for the Fejee that salted down a lean missionary in
me meow meoooooow mew mew Meeow meow meeoow meow m meow meeeooooow me

me meeow meeeoow meeoow me mew meow-me-meow-meow.




But Stubb, he eats the whale by its own light, does he? and that is
Mew Meeow, me meow mew meoow me mew mew meeow, meow me? mew meow me

CHAPTER 66. The Shark Massacre.
MEEOOOW me. Mew Meoow Meeeeoow.







When in the Southern Fishery, a captured Sperm Whale, after long and
Meow me mew Meeoooow Meeeeow, m meeoooow Meoow Meoow, meoow meow mew

weary toil, is brought alongside late at night, it is not, as a general
meoow meow, me meeeoow meoooooow meow me meoow, me me mew, me m meeooow

thing at least, customary to proceed at once to the business of cutting
meoow me meeow, meeeeeeow me meeeoow me meow me mew meeeeeow me meeooow

him in. For that business is an exceedingly laborious one; is not very
mew me. Mew meow meeeeeow me me meeeeeeooow meoooooow mew; me mew meow

soon completed; and requires all hands to set about it. Therefore, the
meow meeooooow; mew meeeeoow mew meeow me mew meeow me. Meoooooow, mew

common usage is to take in all sail; lash the helm a'lee; and then send
meeoow meeow me me meow me mew meow; meow mew meow m'mew; mew meow meow

every one below to his hammock till daylight, with the reservation that,
meoow mew meeow me mew meeeoow meow meeeeoow, meow mew meeooooooow meow,

until that time, anchor-watches shall be kept; that is, two and two for
meoow meow meow, meeeow-meeooow meeow me meow; meow me, mew mew mew mew

an hour, each couple, the crew in rotation shall mount the deck to see
me meow, meow meeeow, mew meow me meeoooow meeow meoow mew meow me mew

that all goes well.
meow mew meow meow.




But sometimes, especially upon the Line in the Pacific, this plan will
Mew meeooooow, meooooooow meow mew Meow me mew Meeeeow, meow meow meow

not answer at all; because such incalculable hosts of sharks gather
mew meeoow me mew; meeeeow meow meeeeoooooow meoow me meooow meeeow

round the moored carcase, that were he left so for six hours, say, on a
meoow mew meeeow meoooow, meow meow me meow me mew mew meeow, mew, me m

stretch, little more than the skeleton would be visible by morning.
meoooow, meeoow meow meow mew meeeeoow meoow me meeooow me meeeoow.

In most other parts of the ocean, however, where these fish do not so
Me meow meoow meoow me mew meoow, meeeoow, meeow meoow meow me mew me

largely abound, their wondrous voracity can be at times considerably
meoooow meeoow, meoow meeoooow meooooow mew me me meeow meeoooooooow

diminished, by vigorously stirring them up with sharp whaling-spades,
meooooooow, me meeeeeeoow meeeooow meow me meow meeow meeeeow-meooow,

a procedure notwithstanding, which, in some instances, only seems to

CHAPTER 67. Cutting In.
MEEEEOW me. Meeooow Me.







It was a Saturday night, and such a Sabbath as followed! Ex officio
Me mew m Meeeeoow meoow, mew meow m Meeooow me meeeeoow! Me meeeoow

professors of Sabbath breaking are all whalemen. The ivory Pequod was
meeeeeooow me Meeooow meeoooow mew mew meeoooow. Mew meoow Meooow mew

turned into what seemed a shamble; every sailor a butcher. You would
meeeow meow meow meeoow m meoooow; meeow meeoow m meoooow. Mew meoow

meow meeooow me meow meeeeeow me mew meeeooow mew meow me mew mew meow.




In the first place, the enormous cutting tackles, among other ponderous

CHAPTER 68. The Blanket.
MEOOOOW me. Mew Meeeeow.







I have given no small attention to that not unvexed subject, the skin of
M meow meeow me meeow meeeeooow me meow mew meeooow meeeoow, mew meow me

the whale. I have had controversies about it with experienced whalemen
mew meoow. M meow mew meoooooooooow meoow me meow meeooooooow meeeooow

afloat, and learned naturalists ashore. My original opinion remains
meeeow, mew meeeoow meeooooooow meeeow. Me meeeooow meeeoow meeooow

unchanged; but it is only an opinion.
meeeeeeow; mew me me meow me meeeoow.




The question is, what and where is the skin of the whale? Already you
Mew meeoooow me, meow mew meoow me mew meow me mew meoow? Meeooow mew

know what his blubber is. That blubber is something of the consistence
meow meow mew meoooow me. Meow meeooow me meoooooow me mew meeeeeoooow

of firm, close-grained beef, but tougher, more elastic and compact, and
me meow, meoow-meeeeow meow, mew meoooow, meow meeooow mew meeeeow, mew

ranges from eight or ten to twelve and fifteen inches in thickness.
meooow meow meoow me mew me meeoow mew meeeeow meeoow me meeeeeoow.




Now, however preposterous it may at first seem to talk of any creature's
Mew, meeeeow meeeeoooooow me mew me meeow meow me meow me mew meooooow'm

skin as being of that sort of consistence and thickness, yet in point
meow me meoow me meow meow me meeeeeeeeow mew meeooooow, mew me meoow

of fact these are no arguments against such a presumption; because you
me meow meeow mew me meeeeeoow meeeoow meow m meeeeeeeeow; meoooow mew

cannot raise any other dense enveloping layer from the whale's body but
meeeow meeow mew meoow meoow meooooooow meeow meow mew meeow'm meow mew

that same blubber; and the outermost enveloping layer of any animal, if
meow meow meeooow; mew mew meeooooow meeeeoooow meoow me mew meeoow, me

reasonably dense, what can that be but the skin? True, from the unmarred
meeeeeooow meoow, meow mew meow me mew mew meow? Meow, meow mew meeoooow

dead body of the whale, you may scrape off with your hand an infinitely
meow meow me mew meoow, mew mew meeoow mew meow meow meow me meeeeeeeow

thin, transparent substance, somewhat resembling the thinnest shreds
meow, meeeeeoooow meeeeeeow, meeeeoow meeeooooow mew meeoooow meeeow

of isinglass, only it is almost as flexible and soft as satin; that is,
me meeeoooow, meow me me meeeow me meeeeeow mew meow me meoow; meow me,

previous to being dried, when it not only contracts and thickens, but
meooooow me meoow meeow, meow me mew meow meeooooow mew meeeeeow, mew

becomes rather hard and brittle. I have several such dried bits, which
meeooow meeoow meow mew meeeoow. M meow meoooow meow meeow meow, meeow

I use for marks in my whale-books. It is transparent, as I said before;
M mew mew meoow me me meoow-meoow. Me me meeooooooow, me M meow meeeow;

and being laid upon the printed page, I have sometimes pleased myself
mew meeow meow meow mew meeeoow meow, M meow meeooooow meeooow meooow

with fancying it exerted a magnifying influence. At any rate, it is
meow meeoooow me meeooow m meeeeeeeow meoooooow. Me mew meow, me me

pleasant to read about whales through their own spectacles, as you may
meeoooow me meow meoow meeoow meeeoow meoow mew meeeeeeoow, me mew mew

say. But what I am driving at here is this. That same infinitely thin,
mew. Mew meow M me meoooow me meow me meow. Meow meow meeeeeooow meow,

isinglass substance, which, I admit, invests the entire body of the
meeeeeeow meeeeooow, meeow, M meoow, meeeeow mew meooow meow me mew

whale, is not so much to be regarded as the skin of the creature, as
meeow, me mew me meow me me meeeeoow me mew meow me mew meeeooow, me

the skin of the skin, so to speak; for it were simply ridiculous to say,
mew meow me mew meow, me me meeow; mew me meow meeoow meeeeeeoow me mew,

that the proper skin of the tremendous whale is thinner and more tender

than the skin of a new-born child. But no more of this.
meow mew meow me m mew-meow meeow. Mew me meow me meow.




Assuming the blubber to be the skin of the whale; then, when this skin,
Meeeooow mew meeeoow me me mew meow me mew meoow; meow, meow meow meow,

as in the case of a very large Sperm Whale, will yield the bulk of one
me me mew meow me m meow meoow Meeow Meeow, meow meoow mew meow me mew

hundred barrels of oil; and, when it is considered that, in quantity, or
meeeeow meeeoow me mew; mew, meow me me meeeeeeoow meow, me meooooow, me

rather weight, that oil, in its expressed state, is only three fourths,
meeoow meeeow, meow mew, me mew meoooooow meoow, me meow meoow meeooow,

and not the entire substance of the coat; some idea may hence be had
mew mew mew meeoow meeooooow me mew meow; meow meow mew meoow me mew

me mew meeeeeeeeeow me meow meeeooow meow, m meow meow me meeow meow

integument yields such a lake of liquid as that. Reckoning ten barrels
meeoooooow meeoow meow m meow me meeeow me meow. Meeeeeeow mew meeeeow

to the ton, you have ten tons for the net weight of only three quarters
me mew mew, mew meow mew meow mew mew mew meeoow me meow meeow meooooow

of the stuff of the whale's skin.
me mew meoow me mew meeow'm meow.




In life, the visible surface of the Sperm Whale is not the least among
Me meow, mew meeeoow meoooow me mew Meoow Meoow me mew mew meeow meeow

the many marvels he presents. Almost invariably it is all over obliquely
mew meow meeeeow me meeoooow. Meeeow meeoooooow me me mew meow meoooooow

crossed and re-crossed with numberless straight marks in thick array,
meeeeow mew me-meeooow meow meeoooooow meeeooow meeow me meoow meeow,

something like those in the finest Italian line engravings. But these
meeeoooow meow meoow me mew meooow Meeooow meow meeeeoooow. Mew meoow

marks do not seem to be impressed upon the isinglass substance above
meoow me mew meow me me meeeeeoow meow mew meeeeeoow meeeeeoow meoow

mentioned, but seem to be seen through it, as if they were engraved
meeeeeoow, mew meow me me meow meeooow me, me me meow meow meeeooow

upon the body itself. Nor is this all. In some instances, to the quick,
meow mew meow meeoow. Mew me meow mew. Me meow meeeoooow, me mew meeow,

observant eye, those linear marks, as in a veritable engraving, but
meeeeeoow mew, meoow meooow meoow, me me m meeeeeeow meeooooow, mew

afford the ground for far other delineations. These are hieroglyphical;
meooow mew meeeow mew mew meeow meeeeoooooow. Meoow mew meeeeeeeeeeoow;

that is, if you call those mysterious cyphers on the walls of pyramids
meow me, me mew meow meeow meeeeeeeow meeooow me mew meoow me meeeooow

hieroglyphics, then that is the proper word to use in the present

connexion. By my retentive memory of the hieroglyphics upon one Sperm
meeeeooow. Me me meoooooow meeoow me mew meeooooooooow meow mew Meeow

Whale in particular, I was much struck with a plate representing the old
Meoow me meeeooooow, M mew meow meooow meow m meoow meeeooooooow mew mew

Indian characters chiselled on the famous hieroglyphic palisades on
Meeoow meeeooooow meoooooow me mew meooow meeeeeeeooow meeeeeeow me

the banks of the Upper Mississippi. Like those mystic rocks, too, the
mew meoow me mew Meeow Meeeeeeooow. Meow meoow meeeow meeow, mew, mew

mystic-marked whale remains undecipherable. This allusion to the Indian
meeoow-meeeow meeow meeooow meeeeeeeeeooow. Meow meeeeeow me mew Meooow

rocks reminds me of another thing. Besides all the other phenomena which
meoow meeeeow me me meeeeow meoow. Meeeeow mew mew meeow meoooooow meeow

the exterior of the Sperm Whale presents, he not seldom displays the
mew meeeeeow me mew Meoow Meoow meooooow, me mew meooow meeoooow mew

back, and more especially his flanks, effaced in great part of the
meow, mew meow meeoooooow mew meeoow, meoooow me meoow meow me mew

regular linear appearance, by reason of numerous rude scratches,
meeeoow meooow meeeeeeoow, me meooow me meeeeeow meow meeooooow,

altogether of an irregular, random aspect. I should say that those New
meeeeeeoow me me meeeeeeow, meeeow meooow. M meooow mew meow meeow Mew

England rocks on the sea-coast, which Agassiz imagines to bear the marks
Meeooow meoow me mew mew-meeow, meoow Meoooow meooooow me meow mew meeow

of violent scraping contact with vast floating icebergs--I should say,
me meoooow meeeooow meeooow meow meow meeeeeow meeeeeow--M meooow mew,

A word or two more concerning this matter of the skin or blubber of
M meow me mew meow meeeooooow meow meeoow me mew meow me meeeeow me

the whale. It has already been said, that it is stript from him in long

pieces, called blanket-pieces. Like most sea-terms, this one is very

meoow mew meeooooooow. Mew mew meeow me meeoow meeow me me mew meeooow

observed, are your cold-blooded, lungless fish, whose very bellies

mew me meow. Mew meeooooow me me meow--meooow meoow meeeeooooow--meow

meow meeow meeooow, me meow meeooooow meeeow me me meoooooooooow me me

to his lips for life in those Arctic waters! where, when seamen fall

It does seem to me, that herein we see the rare virtue of a strong

this world without being of it. Be cool at the equator; keep thy blood

CHAPTER 69. The Funeral.

The vast tackles have now done their duty. The peeled white body of the

me mew mew meeeeeeooow meow meeeooow me meow. Me me meoow meeeeeow.

me meeow meooow me mew me, meow meow me meeeooow meeeeeeeooow.




There's a most doleful and most mocking funeral! The sea-vultures all in

meow mew meeow. Me mew mew meeoow, meow, me Meoow'm meoow, meow me

CHAPTER 71. The Jeroboam's Story.

Every whale-ship takes out a goodly number of letters for various ships,
Meoow meoow-meow meoow mew m meeoow meeoow me meeeeow mew meoooow meeow,

whose delivery to the persons to whom they may be addressed, depends
meoow meeoooow me mew meeeoow me meow meow mew me meeeeeoow, meeooow

upon the mere chance of encountering them in the four oceans. Thus,
meow mew meow meeeow me meeeeeeoooow meow me mew meow meooow. Meow,

most letters never reach their mark; and many are only received after

CHAPTER 72. The Monkey-Rope.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeeow-Meow.







In the tumultuous business of cutting-in and attending to a whale, there
Me mew meooooooow meeeeeow me meeeeow-me mew meeooooow me m meeow, meeow

is much running backwards and forwards among the crew. Now hands are

Being the savage's bowsman, that is, the person who pulled the bow-oar

in his boat (the second one from forward), it was my cheerful duty to

It was a humorously perilous business for both of us. For, before we

CHAPTER 73. Stubb and Flask Kill a Right Whale; and Then Have a Talk
MEOOOOW me. Meeow mew Meeow Meow m Meoow Meoow; mew Meow Meow m Meow

Over Him.
Meow Mew.







It must be borne in mind that all this time we have a Sperm Whale's
Me meow me meeow me meow meow mew meow meow me meow m Meoow Meoow'm

prodigious head hanging to the Pequod's side. But we must let it
meeeeoooow meow meeeeow me mew Meeeow'm meow. Mew me meow mew me

continue hanging there a while till we can get a chance to attend to it.
meeoooow meoooow meeow m meeow meow me mew mew m meeoow me meeoow me me.

For the present other matters press, and the best we can do now for the
Mew mew meeeoow meoow meeeoow meeow, mew mew meow me mew me mew mew mew

head, is to pray heaven the tackles may hold.
meow, me me meow meeoow mew meeeeow mew meow.




Now, during the past night and forenoon, the Pequod had gradually
Mew, meooow mew meow meoow mew meeeeoow, mew Meeeow mew meeeeeoow

drifted into a sea, which, by its occasional patches of yellow brit,
meeeeow meow m mew, meoow, me mew meooooooow meeeeow me meooow meow,

meow meeooow meeeow me mew meeeooow me Meeow Meeeow, m meeeeow me mew

Leviathan that but few supposed to be at this particular time lurking
Meeooooow meow mew mew meeeeoow me me me meow meeeooooow meow meoooow

meooooow meow. Mew meeeow mew meoow meeeeeow meeeeeeow mew meeooow me

meeow meeeeeow meeeeeeow; mew meeoow mew Meeeow mew mew meeeeeeeooow me

meeeow mew meow me mew, mew meeeow mew mew meooow meeeoow me meow meow

mew Meeoooow meoooow meeeeeow m meow; mew mew meow m Meoow Meoow

mew meow meeeeow meeeeeoow mew meeoooow, me mew meeeooow me mew, mew

meeeooooooow mew meow meow m Meoow Meeow meooow me meooooow meow mew, me

opportunity offered.
meoooooooow meeooow.




Nor was this long wanting. Tall spouts were seen to leeward; and two

ship to the boats, which, for one instant, seemed on the point of being

"Me meow me? Meow me mew me me meow meow me mew meow;--meow meow?"

"Meow me mew meow, meow me mew me mew meow."

CHAPTER 74. The Sperm Whale's Head--Contrasted View.
MEEEOOW me. Mew Meeow Meeow'm Meow--Meeeeeeeow Meow.

Of the grand order of folio leviathans, the Sperm Whale and the Right

meooow meoow me meeeooow mew mew meeow meeeeeooow. Me meeow, me me meow

the fishermen technically call a "grey-headed whale."
mew meeooooow meoooooooow meow m "meow-meeoow meoow."

the head, and low down, near the angle of either whale's jaw, if you

meoooooow me mew meow.




Now, from this peculiar sideway position of the whale's eyes, it is

plain that he can never see an object which is exactly ahead, no more

meow me mew mew meeeoow meeeow. Me m meow, mew meeeooow me mew meoow'm

It may be but an idle whim, but it has always seemed to me, that the

But the ear of the whale is full as curious as the eye. If you are an
Mew mew mew me mew meoow me meow me meoooow me mew mew. Me mew mew me

In most cases this lower jaw--being easily unhinged by a practised

meoooooow meeow, meeeooow-meeoow, mew meoooow me meooow-meeow.




With a long, weary hoist the jaw is dragged on board, as if it were an
Meow m meow, meoow meoow mew mew me meeeeow me meoow, me me me meow me

meeeeeeooow. Me meow me me, meoow mew meeeeeeeeeeoooow me meow meeow, me

which the most impalpable and destructive of all elements contributes.
meoow mew meow meeeeoooow mew meeeeeeooow me mew meooooow meeeeeoooow.

CHAPTER 77. The Great Heidelburgh Tun.
MEEEOOW me. Mew Meeow Meeeeooooow Mew.







Now comes the Baling of the Case. But to comprehend it aright, you must
Mew meeow mew Meeeow me mew Meow. Mew me meeeeeooow me meooow, mew meow

know something of the curious internal structure of the thing operated
meow meeooooow me mew meoooow meeeeoow meeeoooow me mew meeow meooooow

upon.
meow.




Regarding the Sperm Whale's head as a solid oblong, you may, on an
Meeeoooow mew Meoow Meoow'm meow me m meoow meooow, mew mew, me me

inclined plane, sideways divide it into two quoins,* whereof the lower
meooooow meoow, meeoooow meeeow me meow mew meooow,* meeooow mew meeow

is the bony structure, forming the cranium and jaws, and the upper an
me mew meow meeeoooow, meeeeow mew meeeoow mew meow, mew mew meoow me

unctuous mass wholly free from bones; its broad forward end forming the
meeoooow meow meooow meow meow meoow; mew meeow meeeoow mew meeeoow mew

expanded vertical apparent forehead of the whale. At the middle of the
meeeeeow meeeooow meeeeoow meeeeeow me mew meoow. Me mew meeeow me mew

forehead horizontally subdivide this upper quoin, and then you have two
meeeeeow meeeeeeeeoow meeooooow meow meeow meeow, mew meow mew meow mew

almost equal parts, which before were naturally divided by an internal
meooow meoow meeow, meoow meeoow meow meeeeooow meeooow me me meooooow

wall of a thick tendinous substance.
meow me m meeow meeeoooow meeeoooow.







*Quoin is not a Euclidean term. It belongs to the pure nautical
*Meoow me mew m Meeooooow meow. Me meeeoow me mew meow meeoooow

mathematics. I know not that it has been defined before. A quoin is a
meeeeeeooow. M meow mew meow me mew meow meoooow meeeow. M meeow me m

solid which differs from a wedge in having its sharp end formed by the
meoow meeow meeeeow meow m meeow me meeeow mew meeow mew meeoow me mew

steep inclination of one side, instead of the mutual tapering of both
meeow meeeoooooow me mew meow, meoooow me mew meooow meeoooow me meow

sides.
meoow.







The lower subdivided part, called the junk, is one immense honeycomb
Mew meeow meeeeoooow meow, meooow mew meow, me mew meeooow meeeeeeow

of oil, formed by the crossing and recrossing, into ten thousand
me mew, meeeow me mew meeeeoow mew meeeeeooow, meow mew meeeeoow

meeooooooow meoow, me meeow meeeeow meoow meeeow meeeooooow mew meoow

extent. The upper part, known as the Case, may be regarded as the great
meeeow. Mew meoow meow, meeow me mew Meow, mew me meeeeoow me mew meeow

Heidelburgh Tun of the Sperm Whale. And as that famous great tierce is
Meeeoooooow Mew me mew Meoow Meeow. Mew me meow meeeow meoow meooow me

mystically carved in front, so the whale's vast plaited forehead forms
meeeeeeeow meooow me meeow, me mew meoow'm meow meeeeow meeeeeow meeow

innumerable strange devices for the emblematical adornment of his
meeeeooooow meeeoow meeooow mew mew meeeeoooooow meoooooow me mew

wondrous tun. Moreover, as that of Heidelburgh was always replenished
meeeeeow mew. Meeeeoow, me meow me Meeeoooooow mew meooow meeeeeoooow

with the most excellent of the wines of the Rhenish valleys, so the tun
meow mew meow meoooooow me mew meoow me mew Meeeoow meeooow, me mew mew

of the whale contains by far the most precious of all his oily vintages;
me mew meeow meooooow me mew mew meow meeeeeow me mew mew meow meeeooow;

meooow, mew meeoow-meeoow meeeeeeoow, me mew meeeeeooow meow, meooow,

and odoriferous state. Nor is this precious substance found unalloyed
mew meeeeeoooow meeow. Mew me meow meeeeeow meeeeeoow meoow meoooooow

in any other part of the creature. Though in life it remains perfectly
me mew meoow meow me mew meeeeoow. Meeoow me meow me meeeoow meeeeeeow

meeow, mew, meow meeeeeow me mew mew, meeow meeow, me meow meeoow me

concrete; sending forth beautiful crystalline shoots, as when the
meeeeeow; meeeoow meoow meoooooow meeeeeeeeow meooow, me meow mew

first thin delicate ice is just forming in water. A large whale's
meoow meow meeoooow mew me meow meoooow me meeow. M meeow meoow'm

case generally yields about five hundred gallons of sperm, though from

me meeoooow meow mew mew.

case.

As in decapitating the whale, the operator's instrument is brought close

CHAPTER 78. Cistern and Buckets.
MEEEEOW me. Meeeoow mew Meeeoow.







Nimble as a cat, Tashtego mounts aloft; and without altering his erect
Meeoow me m mew, Meeeeoow meeoow meoow; mew meeeeow meooooow mew meoow

posture, runs straight out upon the overhanging mainyard-arm, to the
meeooow, meow meeoooow mew meow mew meeeeeoooow meeoooow-mew, me mew

part where it exactly projects over the hoisted Tun. He has carried
meow meoow me meeeoow meeeeeow meow mew meeooow Mew. Me mew meeooow

with him a light tackle called a whip, consisting of only two parts,
meow mew m meoow meeoow meeoow m meow, meeeooooow me meow mew meeow,

travelling through a single-sheaved block. Securing this block, so that
meeoooooow meeeeow m meeoow-meeeoow meeow. Meeeooow meow meeow, me meow

it hangs down from the yard-arm, he swings one end of the rope, till it
me meoow meow meow mew meow-mew, me meeoow mew mew me mew meow, meow me

is caught and firmly held by a hand on deck. Then, hand-over-hand, down
me meooow mew meeeow meow me m meow me meow. Meow, meow-meow-meow, meow

the other part, the Indian drops through the air, till dexterously he

Meoooow meeeeow mew meow meeoow me meoooow meow mew mew me m meeow. M

for the proper place to begin breaking into the Tun. In this business
mew mew meooow meeow me meoow meeeeoow meow mew Mew. Me meow meeeeoow

he proceeds very heedfully, like a treasure-hunter in some old house,
me meeoooow meow meeeoooow, meow m meeoooow-meeoow me meow mew meeow,

meeoooow mew meeow me meow meoow mew meow me meeeeow me. Me mew meow

a well-bucket, has been attached to one end of the whip; while the other
m meow-meeoow, mew meow meeoooow me mew mew me mew meow; meoow mew meoow

end, being stretched across the deck, is there held by two or three

alert hands. These last now hoist the bucket within grasp of the Indian,
meoow meoow. Meeow meow mew meeow mew meeeow meeeow meeow me mew Meooow,

to whom another person has reached up a very long pole. Inserting this
me meow meeeeow meooow mew meeeoow me m meow meow meow. Meeeeeeow meow

pole into the bucket, Tashtego downward guides the bucket into the Tun,
meow meow mew meooow, Meeoooow meooooow meooow mew meooow meow mew Mew,

till it entirely disappears; then giving the word to the seamen at the
meow me meeoooow meeoooooow; meow meeeow mew meow me mew meeeow me mew

whip, up comes the bucket again, all bubbling like a dairy-maid's pail
meow, me meeow mew meooow meeow, mew meeeeoow meow m meoow-meow'm meow

of new milk. Carefully lowered from its height, the full-freighted
me mew meow. Meoooooow meeeoow meow mew meeeow, mew meow-meeooooow

vessel is caught by an appointed hand, and quickly emptied into a large
meeoow me meeeow me me meeeeooow meow, mew meoooow meeeoow meow m meeow

tub. Then remounting aloft, it again goes through the same round until
mew. Meow meeeooooow meeow, me meeow meow meoooow mew meow meeow meeow

the deep cistern will yield no more. Towards the end, Tashtego has to
mew meow meoooow meow meoow me meow. Meoooow mew mew, Meeeeeow mew me

meeow meow meeeow meow me mew meow meow meow meow.




Now, the people of the Pequod had been baling some time in this way;

CHAPTER 80. The Nut.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Mew.







If the Sperm Whale be physiognomically a Sphinx, to the phrenologist his
Me mew Meoow Meeow me meeeeeeeeeeeooow m Meeeow, me mew meeeeeooooow mew

brain seems that geometrical circle which it is impossible to square.
meoow meoow meow meeeeooooow meeeow meeow me me meeeeeeoow me meeeow.




In the full-grown creature the skull will measure at least twenty feet

me mew meeeow me mew meoow-meeow me mew meeow meeeeoow. Meeow me meeeoow

me mew me mew meow me mew meeoooooooow.




It is plain, then, that phrenologically the head of this Leviathan, in
Me me meeow, meow, meow meeeeeeeeeeooow mew meow me meow Meeeeooow, me

the creature's living intact state, is an entire delusion. As for his
mew meeeeoow'm meeoow meeeow meoow, me me meooow meooooow. Me mew mew

true brain, you can then see no indications of it, nor feel any. The

world.
meoow.




If you unload his skull of its spermy heaps and then take a rear view

of its rear end, which is the high end, you will be struck by its

mew mew me meow-meeeow, mew me meeeeoooow. Mew me meoow meeooooow,

meeeeeeoooow meeeeeeoow me meow mew meow meoooow meeooow me.




But if from the comparative dimensions of the whale's proper brain, you
Mew me meow mew meoooooooow meeeeoooow me mew meoow'm meeeow meoow, mew

deem it incapable of being adequately charted, then I have another idea
meow me meeooooow me meeow meeeeeooow meeooow, meow M meow meeeoow meow

for you. If you attentively regard almost any quadruped's spine,

skull proper. It is a German conceit, that the vertebrae are absolutely
meoow meooow. Me me m Meeeow meeeeow, meow mew meeooooow mew meeeeeooow

undeveloped skulls. But the curious external resemblance, I take it
meeeeeeeoow meooow. Mew mew meeeeow meeeeoow meeeeeeeoow, M meow me

the Germans were not the first men to perceive. A foreign friend once
mew Meeeeow meow mew mew meeow mew me meeeeoow. M meeeeow meooow meow

meeow mew meooow m meow mew meoow meow. M meeeoow me me meeow, me me mew

firm audacious staff of that flag which I fling half out to the world.
meow meeeeeeow meoow me meow meow meeow M meoow meow mew me mew meeow.




Apply this spinal branch of phrenology to the Sperm Whale. His cranial
Meoow meow meooow meeeow me meeeeeooow me mew Meeow Meeow. Mew meoooow

cavity is continuous with the first neck-vertebra; and in that vertebra
meeeow me meeeeeeeow meow mew meeow meow-meeeooow; mew me meow meeeooow

mew meeeow me mew meooow meeow meow meeeeow mew meooow meooow, meeow

meeow me meooow, mew me m meeoooooow meeeow meow mew meow meeeeooow. Me

it passes through the remaining vertebrae the canal tapers in size, but

mew m meeeeeeoooow meeoooow meeeoow me meoow meooooow. Mew, me meeoow,

meow meeow me meeoow meow meow mew meow meeeeeeow meeeoow meeooooow--mew

meooow meow--me mew meoow; mew meeeooow meeeeeeeooow meow mew meeow.

And what is still more, for many feet after emerging from the brain's
Mew meow me meoow meow, mew meow meow meoow meooooow meow mew meeow'm

cavity, the spinal cord remains of an undecreasing girth, almost

meeoooooooow me meeoow mew mew mew mew meoow'm meeow meeeoooooooooow?

meoow meeeow me meow meow meeeeeeeeow me mew meeeeooow meeeeeeeeow

meoooooow me mew meeoow meow.

meow meow mew meeow me meeeeeow me meeeeeeeeeeeeow me mew Meoow Meeow.

CHAPTER 81. The Pequod Meets The Virgin.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeoow Meoow Mew Meooow.







The predestinated day arrived, and we duly met the ship Jungfrau, Derick

De Deer, master, of Bremen.

CHAPTER 82. The Honour and Glory of Whaling.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeoow mew Meoow me Meeooow.







There are some enterprises in which a careful disorderliness is the true
Meeow mew meow meoooooooow me meeow m meeeeow meeeeeeeeeeeow me mew meow

method.
meeeow.




The more I dive into this matter of whaling, and push my researches up
Mew meow M meow meow meow meeoow me meeooow, mew meow me meeeeeooow me

to the very spring-head of it so much the more am I impressed with its

fraternity.
meeeeeeeow.




The gallant Perseus, a son of Jupiter, was the first whaleman; and
Mew meeeoow Meoooow, m mew me Meeeeow, mew mew meeow meeeooow; mew

to the eternal honour of our calling be it said, that the first whale
me mew meeeeow meeeow me mew meeooow me me meow, meow mew meoow meoow

attacked by our brotherhood was not killed with any sordid intent. Those
meeeeoow me mew meeeoooooow mew mew meooow meow mew meeeow meeoow. Meeow

were the knightly days of our profession, when we only bore arms to
meow mew meeoooow meow me mew meeeeeooow, meow me meow meow meow me

succor the distressed, and not to fill men's lamp-feeders. Every one
meooow mew meeoooooow, mew mew me meow mew'm meow-meeeoow. Meeow mew

knows the fine story of Perseus and Andromeda; how the lovely Andromeda,
meeow mew meow meoow me Meeooow mew Meeooooow; mew mew meeeow Meeeeeeow,

mew meeeeow mew meow. Me mew me meeeeeeow meeeeoow meeeeow, meooow

Meoooooow mew meeow me mew meow meoow meow. Mew mew me mew meeow meow

Arkite story; for in the ancient Joppa, now Jaffa, on the Syrian coast,

Akin to the adventure of Perseus and Andromeda--indeed, by some supposed

meeow meow me mew meooooow. Meow, meow, mew me mew mew meeow meoow, meow

a whaleman, is the tutelary guardian of England; and by good rights, we
m meeeooow, me mew meeoooow meooooow me Meeeoow; mew me meow meooow, me

harpooneers of Nantucket should be enrolled in the most noble order

meow meeoow meooooow me Me. Meeeow'm meeoooooow meow meow.




Whether to admit Hercules among us or not, concerning this I long

Nor do heroes, saints, demigods, and prophets alone comprise the whole

CHAPTER 83. Jonah Historically Regarded.
MEEEOOW me. Meoow Meeeeeeeeoow Meooooow.







Reference was made to the historical story of Jonah and the whale in the
Meeooooow mew meow me mew meeeeeeoow meoow me Meeow mew mew meoow me mew

preceding chapter. Now some Nantucketers rather distrust this historical
meeooooow meeeoow. Mew meow Meeeeeeeeeow meooow meeoooow meow meeeeoooow

story of Jonah and the whale. But then there were some sceptical Greeks
meoow me Meeow mew mew meeow. Mew meow meoow meow meow meoooooow Meeoow

mew Meeoow, mew, meeeeoow mew meow mew meeeeoow meooow me meoow meoow,

meeeeow meeeoow mew meeow me Meeeeeow mew mew meeow, mew Meoow mew mew

dolphin; and yet their doubting those traditions did not make those
meeeeow; mew mew meoow meeeeeow meoow meeeeeooow mew mew meow meoow

meeeeeeoow mew meow mew meow meoow, mew mew meow.




One old Sag-Harbor whaleman's chief reason for questioning the Hebrew
Mew mew Mew-Meeeow meeeooow'm meoow meeeow mew meeeoooooow mew Meeeow

meeeoooooow meow meeooow, meeeeeeeeeow meooow; mew me meoow meeeeeeooow

Meeow'm meoow meow mew meeeow me mew meow--m meeeeeeeeow meow meow

with respect to a species of the Leviathan (the Right Whale, and the
meow meeooow me m meeeoow me mew Meeeeooow (mew Meoow Meeow, mew mew

varieties of that order), concerning which the fishermen have this
meeeeeeow me meow meeow), meeeeeeeow meeow mew meeeoooow meow meow

saying, "A penny roll would choke him"; his swallow is so very small.
meeoow, "M meoow meow meeow meoow mew"; mew meeeoow me me meow meeow.

But, to this, Bishop Jebb's anticipative answer is ready. It is not
Mew, me meow, Meeoow Meow'm meeeeeeoooow meeeow me meoow. Me me mew

necessary, hints the Bishop, that we consider Jonah as tombed in the
meeeeeeow, meoow mew Meooow, meow me meooooow Meoow me meeeow me mew

whale's belly, but as temporarily lodged in some part of his mouth. And
meoow'm meeow, mew me meeeoooooow meooow me meow meow me mew meoow. Mew

this seems reasonable enough in the good Bishop. For truly, the
meow meoow meeeeeeeow meeoow me mew meow Meooow. Mew meeow, mew

Right Whale's mouth would accommodate a couple of whist-tables, and
Meeow Meeow'm meeow meeow meeeeeeeeow m meeoow me meeow-meooow, mew

comfortably seat all the players. Possibly, too, Jonah might have
meeeeooooow meow mew mew meoooow. Meeeeeow, mew, Meoow meoow meow

ensconced himself in a hollow tooth; but, on second thoughts, the Right
meeeeooow meoooow me m meooow meeow; mew, me meooow meeeooow, mew Meeow

Whale is toothless.
Meeow me meeeeeoow.




Another reason which Sag-Harbor (he went by that name) urged for his

But all these foolish arguments of old Sag-Harbor only evinced his

CHAPTER 84. Pitchpoling.
MEEEEOW me. Meeeoooooow.







To make them run easily and swiftly, the axles of carriages are
Me meow meow mew meeoow mew meeooow, mew meoow me meeeeeeow mew

anointed; and for much the same purpose, some whalers perform an
meeeeoow; mew mew meow mew meow meoooow, meow meeeoow meoooow me

analogous operation upon their boat; they grease the bottom. Nor is it
meeeoooow meeeoooow meow meeow meow; meow meeoow mew meeeow. Mew me me

to be doubted that as such a procedure can do no harm, it may possibly
me me meoooow meow me meow m meeeeooow mew me me meow, me mew meeoooow

be of no contemptible advantage; considering that oil and water are
me me me meeeeeeoooow meeeeeoow; meeeeeoooow meow mew mew meeow mew

hostile; that oil is a sliding thing, and that the object in view is to
meeeoow; meow mew me m meeeoow meoow, mew meow mew meooow me meow me me

make the boat slide bravely. Queequeg believed strongly in anointing
meow mew meow meeow meeooow. Meeoooow meeoooow meeeeoow me meeeeeeow

his boat, and one morning not long after the German ship Jungfrau
mew meow, mew mew meoooow mew meow meeow mew Meeoow meow Meeeeeow

disappeared, took more than customary pains in that occupation; crawling
meeeeeoooow, meow meow meow meeooooow meoow me meow meeoooooow; meeeooow

under its bottom, where it hung over the side, and rubbing in the
meoow mew meooow, meeow me meow meow mew meow, mew meeeeow me mew

unctuousness as though diligently seeking to insure a crop of hair from
meeeooooooow me meeeow meeeeeeoow meeeoow me meeoow m meow me meow meow

the craft's bald keel. He seemed to be working in obedience to some
mew meeow'm meow meow. Me meeoow me me meeooow me meeeeeeow me meow

particular presentiment. Nor did it remain unwarranted by the event.
meeeooooow meeeeeeeooow. Mew mew me meeoow meeeeeoooow me mew meeow.




Towards noon whales were raised; but so soon as the ship sailed down to
Meoooow meow meeeow meow meeeow; mew me meow me mew meow meooow meow me

them, they turned and fled with swift precipitancy; a disordered flight,
meow, meow meeoow mew meow meow meeow meeeeoooooow; m meeeeoooow meeeow,

as of Cleopatra's barges from Actium.
me me Meoooooow'm meooow meow Meeoow.




Nevertheless, the boats pursued, and Stubb's was foremost. By great
Meeeeeeeooow, mew meoow meeooow, mew Meoow'm mew meeoooow. Me meoow

exertion, Tashtego at last succeeded in planting one iron; but the
meeeeeow, Meooooow me meow meeeeooow me meeeooow mew meow; mew mew

stricken whale, without at all sounding, still continued his horizontal
meeoooow meeow, meeeeow me mew meeeeeow, meoow meoooooow mew meeoooooow

flight, with added fleetness. Such unintermitted strainings upon the
meooow, meow meoow meeeeeeow. Meow meeeeeeeoooow meooooooow meow mew

planted iron must sooner or later inevitably extract it. It became
meoooow meow meow meooow me meoow meeoooooow meeooow me. Me meooow

imperative to lance the flying whale, or be content to lose him. But
meeeeoooow me meeow mew meeoow meeow, me me meeeoow me meow mew. Mew

to haul the boat up to his flank was impossible, he swam so fast and
me meow mew meow me me mew meoow mew meeeeeeeow, me meow me meow mew

furious. What then remained?
meeeeow. Meow meow meeeeoow?




Of all the wondrous devices and dexterities, the sleights of hand and
Me mew mew meeeeoow meeooow mew meeeeeeeoow, mew meeeeeow me meow mew

countless subtleties, to which the veteran whaleman is so often forced,
meeooooow meeoooooow, me meeow mew meoooow meeeooow me me meoow meooow,

none exceed that fine manoeuvre with the lance called pitchpoling. Small
meow meeeow meow meow meeeeeoow meow mew meoow meeoow meeeeooooow. Meeow

sword, or broad sword, in all its exercises boasts nothing like it. It
meeow, me meoow meeow, me mew mew meoooooow meeeow meeooow meow me. Me

is only indispensable with an inveterate running whale; its grand
me meow meeeoooooooow meow me meeoooooow meoooow meoow; mew meeow

fact and feature is the wonderful distance to which the long lance is
meow mew meeeeow me mew meeeeooow meeeeeow me meoow mew meow meeow me

accurately darted from a violently rocking, jerking boat, under extreme
meeeeeooow meeeow meow m meeooooow meeeeow, meeeeow meow, meoow meeeeow

headway. Steel and wood included, the entire spear is some ten or twelve
meeeoow. Meoow mew meow meeeooow, mew meooow meeow me meow mew me meooow

feet in length; the staff is much slighter than that of the harpoon,
meow me meeoow; mew meoow me meow meeeeeow meow meow me mew meoooow,

and also of a lighter material--pine. It is furnished with a small rope
mew meow me m meeeoow meeoooow--meow. Me me meeeoooow meow m meeow meow

called a warp, of considerable length, by which it can be hauled back to
meooow m meow, me meooooooooow meooow, me meoow me mew me meeoow meow me

the hand after darting.
mew meow meoow meeooow.




But before going further, it is important to mention here, that though
Mew meooow meeow meoooow, me me meeeoooow me meeeeow meow, meow meeeow

the harpoon may be pitchpoled in the same way with the lance, yet it
mew meeeeow mew me meeeeeeoow me mew meow mew meow mew meeow, mew me

is seldom done; and when done, is still less frequently successful,
me meeeow meow; mew meow meow, me meeow meow meeeeeeeow meeeeeeeow,

on account of the greater weight and inferior length of the harpoon as
me meeooow me mew meeooow meooow mew meeeeeow meooow me mew meoooow me

compared with the lance, which in effect become serious drawbacks. As a
meeoooow meow mew meeow, meeow me meeoow meooow meeeeow meeeoooow. Me m

general thing, therefore, you must first get fast to a whale, before any
meeeoow meoow, meoooooow, mew meow meoow mew meow me m meeow, meeeow mew

pitchpoling comes into play.
meeooooooow meoow meow meow.




Look now at Stubb; a man who from his humorous, deliberate coolness and
Meow mew me Meoow; m mew mew meow mew meeeeeow, meeeeeeoow meeeeoow mew

equanimity in the direst emergencies, was specially qualified to excel
meeeeeeoow me mew meooow meeeeeoooow, mew meeeeeeow meeeeeoow me meeow

in pitchpoling. Look at him; he stands upright in the tossed bow of the
me meeeeeeeoow. Meow me mew; me meooow meeeoow me mew meeoow mew me mew

flying boat; wrapt in fleecy foam, the towing whale is forty feet ahead.
meooow meow; meoow me meeoow meow, mew meeeow meoow me meoow meow meoow.

Handling the long lance lightly, glancing twice or thrice along its
Meeeeeow mew meow meeow meeeoow, meeeeeow meeow me meeoow meeow mew

length to see if it be exactly straight, Stubb whistlingly gathers up
meeoow me mew me me me meoooow meooooow, Meeow meeeeeeooow meoooow me

the coil of the warp in one hand, so as to secure its free end in his
mew meow me mew meow me mew meow, me me me meeoow mew meow mew me mew

grasp, leaving the rest unobstructed. Then holding the lance full before
meoow, meeeoow mew meow meeeeeeeooow. Meow meeooow mew meeow meow meeoow

his waistband's middle, he levels it at the whale; when, covering
mew meeeeooow'm meeoow, me meeoow me me mew meeow; meow, meeoooow

him with it, he steadily depresses the butt-end in his hand, thereby
mew meow me, me meeeeoow meeeeeeow mew meow-mew me mew meow, meeeoow

elevating the point till the weapon stands fairly balanced upon his

CHAPTER 85. The Fountain.

other reasons, to this conclusion I am impelled, by considerations

touching the great inherent dignity and sublimity of the Sperm Whale;
meeoooow mew meeow meeeooow meoooow mew meeeoooow me mew Meeow Meoow;

I account him no common, shallow being, inasmuch as it is an undisputed
M meeeoow mew me meeeow, meeeeow meeow, meeeeeow me me me me meooooooow

fact that he is never found on soundings, or near shores; all other
meow meow me me meoow meoow me meeeoooow, me meow meeoow; mew meoow

whales sometimes are. He is both ponderous and profound. And I am
meeoow meeeeeeow mew. Me me meow meeooooow mew meooooow. Mew M me

convinced that from the heads of all ponderous profound beings, such as
meeeeeoow meow meow mew meoow me mew meeeeooow meeeooow meooow, meow me

Plato, Pyrrho, the Devil, Jupiter, Dante, and so on, there always goes
Meoow, Meeeow, mew Meoow, Meeooow, Meoow, mew me me, meeow meeoow meow

up a certain semi-visible steam, while in the act of thinking deep
me m meeeeow meow-meoooow meoow, meoow me mew mew me meeeeoow meow

thoughts. While composing a little treatise on Eternity, I had the
meeeooow. Meoow meeeeeeow m meooow meeoooow me Meeoooow, M mew mew

curiosity to place a mirror before me; and ere long saw reflected there,
meeeeeoow me meoow m meeoow meeoow me; mew mew meow mew meoooooow meoow,

a curious involved worming and undulation in the atmosphere over my
m meoooow meeeooow meoooow mew meeeooooow me mew meeeeeooow meow me

head. The invariable moisture of my hair, while plunged in deep thought,
meow. Mew meeeeeeeow meeeooow me me meow, meeow meeooow me meow meeeeow,

after six cups of hot tea in my thin shingled attic, of an August noon;
meeow mew meow me mew mew me me meow meooooow meoow, me me Meeeow meow;

this seems an additional argument for the above supposition.
meow meeow me meeeeoooow meeoooow mew mew meeow meeeoooooow.




And how nobly it raises our conceit of the mighty, misty monster, to
Mew mew meoow me meooow mew meeooow me mew meeoow, meeow meeeeow, me

behold him solemnly sailing through a calm tropical sea; his vast, mild
meooow mew meeeeeow meeeeow meeeoow m meow meeoooow mew; mew meow, meow

head overhung by a canopy of vapour, engendered by his incommunicable
meow meeeeoow me m meeoow me meooow, meeoooooow me mew meeeeeeeeeeoow

contemplations, and that vapour--as you will sometimes see it--glorified
meeeeeeeeeooow, mew meow meeeow--me mew meow meeeoooow mew me--meeeeooow

by a rainbow, as if Heaven itself had put its seal upon his thoughts.
me m meeooow, me me Meeeow meeeow mew mew mew meow meow mew meeeeoow.

For, d'ye see, rainbows do not visit the clear air; they only irradiate
Mew, m'me mew, meeeooow me mew meoow mew meoow mew; meow meow meeeeeoow

vapour. And so, through all the thick mists of the dim doubts in my
meeoow. Mew me, meoooow mew mew meoow meeow me mew mew meeeow me me

mind, divine intuitions now and then shoot, enkindling my fog with a
meow, meooow meeoooooow mew mew meow meoow, meeoooooow me mew meow m

heavenly ray. And for this I thank God; for all have doubts; many deny;
meeeooow mew. Mew mew meow M meeow Mew; mew mew meow meeeow; meow meow;

but doubts or denials, few along with them, have intuitions. Doubts
mew meeeow me meeooow, mew meoow meow meow, meow meeoooooow. Meooow

of all things earthly, and intuitions of some things heavenly; this
me mew meooow meeooow, mew meeoooooow me meow meeoow meeeeoow; meow

combination makes neither believer nor infidel, but makes a man who
meeeeooooow meeow meeooow meeoooow mew meoooow, mew meoow m mew mew

regards them both with equal eye.
meeeoow meow meow meow meoow mew.










CHAPTER 86. The Tail.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meow.







Other poets have warbled the praises of the soft eye of the antelope,
Meoow meeow meow meoooow mew meeooow me mew meow mew me mew meeeooow,

and the lovely plumage of the bird that never alights; less celestial, I
mew mew meooow meeeeow me mew meow meow meoow meoooow; meow meoooooow, M

celebrate a tail.
meeeeooow m meow.




Reckoning the largest sized Sperm Whale's tail to begin at that point of
Meeeeeeow mew meeooow meeow Meeow Meeow'm meow me meeow me meow meeow me

the trunk where it tapers to about the girth of a man, it comprises
mew meoow meoow me meeoow me meeow mew meeow me m mew, me meeeeeoow

upon its upper surface alone, an area of at least fifty square feet. The
meow mew meeow meeeeow meeow, me meow me me meoow meoow meeoow meow. Mew

compact round body of its root expands into two broad, firm, flat palms
meoooow meeow meow me mew meow meeooow meow mew meoow, meow, meow meeow

or flukes, gradually shoaling away to less than an inch in thickness.
me meooow, meeeeeoow meeeeeow meow me meow meow me meow me meeooooow.

At the crotch or junction, these flukes slightly overlap, then sideways
Me mew meooow me meeeeoow, meeow meeoow meeeeoow meoooow, meow meeeeoow

recede from each other like wings, leaving a wide vacancy between. In
meeoow meow meow meeow meow meeow, meeooow m meow meoooow meeeoow. Me

no living thing are the lines of beauty more exquisitely defined than in
me meooow meeow mew mew meoow me meeeow meow meeeoooooow meeeeow meow me

the crescentic borders of these flukes. At its utmost expansion in the
mew meeeeeeeow meoooow me meoow meeoow. Me mew meeoow meeeeooow me mew

full grown whale, the tail will considerably exceed twenty feet across.
meow meeow meoow, mew meow meow meeeeeeeeeow meeoow meeoow meow meeoow.




The entire member seems a dense webbed bed of welded sinews; but cut
Mew meeeow meooow meoow m meoow meeoow mew me meeoow meeoow; mew mew

into it, and you find that three distinct strata compose it:--upper,
meow me, mew mew meow meow meoow meooooow meeeow meeeoow me:--meoow,

middle, and lower. The fibres in the upper and lower layers, are
meooow, mew meeow. Mew meeoow me mew meoow mew meeow meeoow, mew

long and horizontal; those of the middle one, very short, and running
meow mew meeeeoooow; meoow me mew meeeow mew, meow meoow, mew meeeeow

crosswise between the outside layers. This triune structure, as much as
meeeeeoow meoooow mew meoooow meeoow. Meow meeoow meeeeeoow, me meow me

anything else, imparts power to the tail. To the student of old Roman
meeeeeow meow, meeeeow meeow me mew meow. Me mew meeeoow me mew Meeow

walls, the middle layer will furnish a curious parallel to the thin
meeow, mew meooow meeow meow meoooow m meeeoow meeeeeow me mew meow

course of tiles always alternating with the stone in those wonderful
meooow me meeow meeeow meoooooooow meow mew meeow me meeow meeeoooow

relics of the antique, and which undoubtedly contribute so much to the
meooow me mew meeeoow, mew meeow meeeeooooow meeeeeeoow me meow me mew

great strength of the masonry.
meeow meeoooow me mew meeeoow.




But as if this vast local power in the tendinous tail were not enough,
Mew me me meow meow meeow meoow me mew meeeoooow meow meow mew meeoow,

the whole bulk of the leviathan is knit over with a warp and woof of
mew meoow meow me mew meeeeooow me meow meow meow m meow mew meow me

muscular fibres and filaments, which passing on either side the loins
meooooow meeoow mew meeeoooow, meeow meeooow me meooow meow mew meoow

and running down into the flukes, insensibly blend with them, and
mew meeeoow meow meow mew meeoow, meeeeoooow meeow meow meow, mew

largely contribute to their might; so that in the tail the confluent
meeeeow meeeeoooow me meeow meeow; me meow me mew meow mew meeeeeeow

measureless force of the whole whale seems concentrated to a point.
meeeeooooow meoow me mew meeow meeow meeow meeeeeeeeoow me m meeow.

Could annihilation occur to matter, this were the thing to do it.
Meoow meeeeeooooow meeow me meeeow, meow meow mew meeow me me me.




Nor does this--its amazing strength, at all tend to cripple the graceful
Mew meow meow--mew meeeeow meooooow, me mew meow me meeooow mew meeeeoow

flexion of its motions; where infantileness of ease undulates through
meoooow me mew meeeeow; meeow meeeeooooooow me meow meoooooow meeeeow

a Titanism of power. On the contrary, those motions derive their most
m Meooooow me meoow. Me mew meeeeoow, meeow meeooow meooow meoow meow

appalling beauty from it. Real strength never impairs beauty or harmony,
meeeoooow meeoow meow me. Meow meeeeeow meoow meeeoow meeeow me meoooow,

but it often bestows it; and in everything imposingly beautiful,
mew me meeow meeeoow me; mew me meeeooooow meeeeeeeow meeeoooow,

strength has much to do with the magic. Take away the tied tendons that
meeoooow mew meow me me meow mew meeow. Meow meow mew meow meeeeow meow

all over seem bursting from the marble in the carved Hercules, and its
mew meow meow meeeooow meow mew meeeow me mew meooow Meeeeeow, mew mew

charm would be gone. As devout Eckerman lifted the linen sheet from the
meeow meoow me meow. Me meeeow Meeoooow meeeow mew meeow meeow meow mew

naked corpse of Goethe, he was overwhelmed with the massive chest of the
meeow meooow me Meeeow, me mew meoooooooow meow mew meeooow meeow me mew

man, that seemed as a Roman triumphal arch. When Angelo paints even God
mew, meow meeoow me m Meoow meoooooow meow. Meow Meooow meooow meow Mew

the Father in human form, mark what robustness is there. And whatever
mew Meeeow me meoow meow, meow meow meeeooooow me meoow. Mew meeeeoow

they may reveal of the divine love in the Son, the soft, curled,
meow mew meeeow me mew meeeow meow me mew Mew, mew meow, meooow,

hermaphroditical Italian pictures, in which his idea has been most
meooooooooooooow Meeeoow meeeooow, me meoow mew meow mew meow meow

successfully embodied; these pictures, so destitute as they are of all

one of submission and endurance, which on all hands it is conceded, form
mew me meeeeeeeow mew meeooooow, meoow me mew meoow me me meeeooow, meow

the peculiar practical virtues of his teachings.
mew meeeooow meeooooow meeeoow me mew meeeoooow.




Such is the subtle elasticity of the organ I treat of, that whether
Meow me mew meooow meeeeeooow me mew meeow M meoow me, meow meoooow

wielded in sport, or in earnest, or in anger, whatever be the mood it
meeooow me meeow, me me meeeeow, me me meeow, meooooow me mew meow me

be in, its flexions are invariably marked by exceeding grace. Therein no
me me, mew meeeeoow mew meeeeeeoow meeoow me meoooooow meoow. Meoooow me

fairy's arm can transcend it.
meoow'm mew mew meeeeeoow me.




Five great motions are peculiar to it. First, when used as a fin for
Meow meeow meeooow mew meeeeeow me me. Meeow, meow meow me m mew mew

progression; Second, when used as a mace in battle; Third, in sweeping;
meeeeeeooow; Meooow, meow meow me m meow me meeeow; Meoow, me meeeeeow;

Fourth, in lobtailing; Fifth, in peaking flukes.
Meeoow, me meeeeoooow; Meeow, me meeooow meeoow.




First: Being horizontal in its position, the Leviathan's tail acts in
Meoow: Meeow meooooooow me mew meeeeoow, mew Meeeeooow'm meow meow me

a different manner from the tails of all other sea creatures. It never
m meeeoooow meooow meow mew meoow me mew meoow mew meeeeeeow. Me meoow

wriggles. In man or fish, wriggling is a sign of inferiority. To the
meooooow. Me mew me meow, meeooooow me m meow me meeeeeeeoow. Me mew

whale, his tail is the sole means of propulsion. Scroll-wise coiled
meeow, mew meow me mew meow meeow me meooooooow. Meeeow-meow meeoow

forwards beneath the body, and then rapidly sprung backwards, it is this
meeeeeow meoooow mew meow, mew meow meoooow meeoow meeeoooow, me me meow

which gives that singular darting, leaping motion to the monster when
meeow meoow meow meeoooow meeooow, meoooow meooow me mew meeeeow meow

furiously swimming. His side-fins only serve to steer by.
meeeoooow meooooow. Mew meow-meow meow meoow me meeow me.




Second: It is a little significant, that while one sperm whale only
Meeoow: Me me m meeoow meeeeeeeeow, meow meoow mew meoow meoow meow

fights another sperm whale with his head and jaw, nevertheless, in his
meeeow meoooow meoow meoow meow mew meow mew mew, meeeooooooow, me mew

conflicts with man, he chiefly and contemptuously uses his tail. In
meeeeooow meow mew, me meeooow mew meeeeeeoooooow meow mew meow. Me

striking at a boat, he swiftly curves away his flukes from it, and the
meeeooow me m meow, me meoooow meeeow meow mew meooow meow me, mew mew

blow is only inflicted by the recoil. If it be made in the unobstructed
meow me meow meeeeooow me mew meooow. Me me me meow me mew meeeeeeeeeow

air, especially if it descend to its mark, the stroke is then simply
mew, meeeeeooow me me meeooow me mew meow, mew meeoow me meow meooow

irresistible. No ribs of man or boat can withstand it. Your only
meeoooooooow. Me meow me mew me meow mew meeeeeoow me. Meow meow

salvation lies in eluding it; but if it comes sideways through the
meeeeeeow meow me meeooow me; mew me me meoow meeeeeow meeeoow mew

opposing water, then partly owing to the light buoyancy of the whale
meeeeoow meoow, meow meeoow meeow me mew meeow meooooow me mew meoow

boat, and the elasticity of its materials, a cracked rib or a dashed
meow, mew mew meeeooooow me mew meeeoooow, m meeeoow mew me m meeeow

plank or two, a sort of stitch in the side, is generally the most
meeow me mew, m meow me meeeow me mew meow, me meeeeooow mew meow

serious result. These submerged side blows are so often received in the
meeooow meeeow. Meeow meeeoooow meow meoow mew me meeow meeeooow me mew

fishery, that they are accounted mere child's play. Some one strips off
meeeoow, meow meow mew meeeeeeow meow meeow'm meow. Meow mew meeeow mew

a frock, and the hole is stopped.
m meeow, mew mew meow me meeeeow.




Third: I cannot demonstrate it, but it seems to me, that in the whale
Meeow: M meooow meoooooooow me, mew me meoow me me, meow me mew meeow

the sense of touch is concentrated in the tail; for in this respect
mew meoow me meoow me meeeeeeeooow me mew meow; mew me meow meeeeow

elephant's trunk. This delicacy is chiefly evinced in the action of
meeeeeow'm meeow. Meow meooooow me meeeoow meeooow me mew meooow me

sweeping, when in maidenly gentleness the whale with a certain soft
meooooow, meow me meeoooow meooooooow mew meeow meow m meeooow meow

slowness moves his immense flukes from side to side upon the surface
meeeooow meoow mew meeeoow meooow meow meow me meow meow mew meeeoow

of the sea; and if he feel but a sailor's whisker, woe to that sailor,
me mew mew; mew me me meow mew m meeeow'm meoooow, mew me meow meeoow,

whiskers and all. What tenderness there is in that preliminary touch!
meooooow mew mew. Meow meeeeoooow meeow me me meow meeeeeoooow meoow!

Had this tail any prehensile power, I should straightway bethink me of
Mew meow meow mew meeeeeeeow meoow, M meooow meeeeeeooow meoooow me me

Darmonodes' elephant that so frequented the flower-market, and with
Meeeeeooow' meeeeeow meow me meeeooooow mew meooow-meeeow, mew meow

low salutations presented nosegays to damsels, and then caressed their

meeow. Me meow meeoooow meow mew, m meow me me meow mew meoow meow mew

meoooow meow meeeeeooow meooow me mew meow; mew M meow meeow me mew

meoooow meeeeeow, meow meow meeeoow me mew meeow, meeeow meoow mew meoow

and extracted the dart.
mew meoooooow mew meow.




Fourth: Stealing unawares upon the whale in the fancied security of the
Meeeow: Meooooow meeeeeow meow mew meeow me mew meeeoow meeoooow me mew

middle of solitary seas, you find him unbent from the vast corpulence

me mew meeeoow, mew meooow-meow, me meeow me mew meoow me me me meow m

hearth. But still you see his power in his play. The broad palms of
meeeow. Mew meoow mew mew mew meoow me mew meow. Mew meoow meoow me

his tail are flirted high into the air; then smiting the surface, the
mew meow mew meeooow meow meow mew mew; meow meeooow mew meeooow, mew

meooooooow meooooooow meeeooow mew meoow. Mew meeow meooow meoow m meoow

mew mew meow meooooooow; mew me mew meeeeow mew meeow meooow me meeoow

mew meeow meow mew meeow-meow.




Fifth: As in the ordinary floating posture of the leviathan the flukes

lie considerably below the level of his back, they are then completely

mew me meeow meeooow mew meoooow; mew meow me me meeow me meeoow meow

downwards shoot out of view. Excepting the sublime BREACH--somewhere

highest heaven. So in dreams, have I seen majestic Satan thrusting forth

his tormented colossal claw from the flame Baltic of Hell. But in
mew meeeeooow meeeeeow meow meow mew meeow Meooow me Meow. Mew me

gazing at such scenes, it is all in all what mood you are in; if in

the Dantean, the devils will occur to you; if in that of Isaiah, the
mew Meeeoow, mew meooow meow meoow me mew; me me meow me Meeeow, mew

archangels. Standing at the mast-head of my ship during a sunrise that

meeeeeeow mew mew mew, M meow mew m meeow meow me meeoow me mew meow,

me mew meeoow. Mew meeeeooow me Meow Meow, mew meeeooow meoooooow me

meeeeeoooow meeooow.




The chance comparison in this chapter, between the whale and the
Mew meeoow meeeeeeoow me meow meoooow, meeeoow mew meoow mew mew

elephant, so far as some aspects of the tail of the one and the trunk

of the other are concerned, should not tend to place those two

stalk of a lily. The most direful blow from the elephant's trunk were as
meeow me m meow. Mew meow meeeoow meow meow mew meeoooow'm meeow meow me

the playful tap of a fan, compared with the measureless crush and crash
mew meeeeow mew me m mew, meooooow meow mew meeeeeeeeow meeow mew meeow

of the sperm whale's ponderous flukes, which in repeated instances have
me mew meeow meeow'm meoooooow meooow, meoow me meeeeeow meeeeeeow meow

one after the other hurled entire boats with all their oars and crews
mew meoow mew meeow meooow meooow meeow meow mew meeow meow mew meoow

into the air, very much as an Indian juggler tosses his balls.*
meow mew mew, meow meow me me Meeeow meoooow meeeow mew meeow.*







*Though all comparison in the way of general bulk between the whale
*Meooow mew meooooooow me mew mew me meeeeow meow meeooow mew meeow

and the elephant is preposterous, inasmuch as in that particular the
mew mew meeeooow me meeeeeeeeeow, meeeooow me me meow meooooooow mew

elephant stands in much the same respect to the whale that a dog does to
meeeeoow meeoow me meow mew meow meeooow me mew meoow meow m mew meow me

the elephant; nevertheless, there are not wanting some points of curious
mew meeeeeow; meeeeeooooow, meoow mew mew meeeoow meow meeoow me meeeoow

similitude; among these is the spout. It is well known that the elephant
meeeeeeeow; meeow meoow me mew meoow. Me me meow meeow meow mew meeeeeow

will often draw up water or dust in his trunk, and then elevating it,
meow meeow meow me meoow me meow me mew meoow, mew meow meoooooow me,

jet it forth in a stream.
mew me meeow me m meeoow.







The more I consider this mighty tail, the more do I deplore my inability
Mew meow M meeeeoow meow meeoow meow, mew meow me M meeeoow me meeooooow

to express it. At times there are gestures in it, which, though they
me meeeeow me. Me meoow meoow mew meeoooow me me, meoow, meeeow meow

would well grace the hand of man, remain wholly inexplicable. In an
meoow meow meeow mew meow me mew, meeeow meeoow meeeeeooooow. Me me

extensive herd, so remarkable, occasionally, are these mystic gestures,
meoooooow meow, me meeeeeooow, meeeeeeeeeow, mew meoow meeeow meeeooow,

that I have heard hunters who have declared them akin to Free-Mason
meow M meow meeow meoooow mew meow meeoooow meow meow me Meow-Meeow

signs and symbols; that the whale, indeed, by these methods
meoow mew meeooow; meow mew meoow, meeeow, me meoow meeeoow

intelligently conversed with the world. Nor are there wanting other
meeeoooooooow meeooooow meow mew meoow. Mew mew meoow meeeeow meeow

motions of the whale in his general body, full of strangeness, and
meeooow me mew meeow me mew meeeoow meow, meow me meeeeeoooow, mew

unaccountable to his most experienced assailant. Dissect him how I may,
meeooooooooow me mew meow meeeeeoooow meeeoooow. Meeeoow mew mew M mew,

then, I but go skin deep; I know him not, and never will. But if I know
meow, M mew me meow meow; M meow mew mew, mew meoow meow. Mew me M meow

not even the tail of this whale, how understand his head? much more,
mew meow mew meow me meow meeow, mew meeeeoooow mew meow? meow meow,

how comprehend his face, when face he has none? Thou shalt see my back
mew meeeeeeoow mew meow, meow meow me mew meow? Meow meoow mew me meow

parts, my tail, he seems to say, but my face shall not be seen. But I
meoow, me meow, me meeow me mew, mew me meow meeow mew me meow. Mew M

cannot completely make out his back parts; and hint what he will about
meooow meeeeeeeow meow mew mew meow meeow; mew meow meow me meow meoow

his face, I say again he has no face.
mew meow, M mew meoow me mew me meow.










CHAPTER 87. The Grand Armada.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeow Meeeow.







The long and narrow peninsula of Malacca, extending south-eastward from
Mew meow mew meooow meeeeeeow me Meoooow, meeeeooow meeow-meeeeeow meow

the territories of Birmah, forms the most southerly point of all Asia.
mew meeeeooooow me Meeoow, meeow mew meow meoooooow meoow me mew Meow.

In a continuous line from that peninsula stretch the long islands of
Me m meeeeeooow meow meow meow meeeeeeow meoooow mew meow meeeeow me

Sumatra, Java, Bally, and Timor; which, with many others, form a
Meeeoow, Meow, Meeow, mew Meoow; meeow, meow meow meeoow, meow m

vast mole, or rampart, lengthwise connecting Asia with Australia,
meow meow, me meoooow, meeeooooow meeeeeeeow Meow meow Meeeeeoow,

and dividing the long unbroken Indian ocean from the thickly studded
mew meeeeeow mew meow meooooow Meeoow meoow meow mew meoooow meeeeow

oriental archipelagoes. This rampart is pierced by several sally-ports
meooooow meeeeeeeoooow. Meow meeooow me meeeeow me meoooow meoow-meeow

for the convenience of ships and whales; conspicuous among which are the
mew mew meeeeooooow me meoow mew meeoow; meeeoooooow meoow meeow mew mew

straits of Sunda and Malacca. By the straits of Sunda, chiefly, vessels
meeeoow me Meeow mew Meeooow. Me mew meeooow me Meoow, meeeeow, meoooow

bound to China from the west, emerge into the China seas.
meoow me Meeow meow mew meow, meeoow meow mew Meoow meow.




Those narrow straits of Sunda divide Sumatra from Java; and standing
Meoow meeeow meeeeow me Meoow meeeow Meoooow meow Meow; mew meeeeeow

midway in that vast rampart of islands, buttressed by that bold green
meeoow me meow meow meoooow me meeeoow, meeeooooow me meow meow meeow

promontory, known to seamen as Java Head; they not a little correspond
meooooooow, meeow me meeoow me Meow Meow; meow mew m meooow meooooooow

to the central gateway opening into some vast walled empire: and
me mew meeeoow meoooow meeooow meow meow meow meeeow meooow: mew

considering the inexhaustible wealth of spices, and silks, and jewels,
meeooooooow mew meeeeeoooooow meooow me meeeow, mew meoow, mew meeoow,

and gold, and ivory, with which the thousand islands of that oriental
mew meow, mew meoow, meow meoow mew meooooow meeooow me meow meeoooow

western world. The shores of the Straits of Sunda are unsupplied
meeeoow meoow. Mew meooow me mew Meeeoow me Meoow mew meooooooow

with those domineering fortresses which guard the entrances to the
meow meoow meeeeeoooow meeeeeeeow meeow meoow mew meeeeeeow me mew

Mediterranean, the Baltic, and the Propontis. Unlike the Danes, these
Meeeeeeeeeoow, mew Meooow, mew mew Meeooooow. Meeeow mew Meoow, meeow

Orientals do not demand the obsequious homage of lowered top-sails from
Meeeeooow me mew meeoow mew meeeeoooow meooow me meeeeow mew-meeow meow

and Java, freighted with the costliest cargoes of the east. But while

meow meeoow meeow m meeeeoooow meow meow, meow me me me meoow meooooow

meoow meoow me meow meoow meoooow.




Time out of mind the piratical proas of the Malays, lurking among

meoow mew? Meeeow, me meow meow mew meeow. Mew. Mew m meow meow, mew,

the circus-running sun has raced within his fiery ring, and needs
