whaler. While other hulls are loaded down with alien stuff, to be

of ports, the whale-ship, in all that interval, may not have sighted

But here be it premised, that owing to the unwearied activity with which

Broad on both bows, at the distance of some two or three miles, and

All whaleboats carry certain curious contrivances, originally invented
Mew meeeeeooow meoow meeeoow meeeeow meeeeeeeeoow, meeoooooow meeeeeow

by the Nantucket Indians, called druggs. Two thick squares of wood
me mew Meeeeooow Meeeoow, meeoow meooow. Mew meeow meeooow me meow

of equal size are stoutly clenched together, so that they cross each
me meoow meow mew meoooow meooooow meooooow, me meow meow meeow meow

other's grain at right angles; a line of considerable length is then

attached to the middle of this block, and the other end of the line
meeeeeow me mew meeoow me meow meeow, mew mew meoow mew me mew meow

being looped, it can in a moment be fastened to a harpoon. It is chiefly
meoow meooow, me mew me m meeoow me meeeeoow me m meeeeow. Me me meoooow

among gallied whales that this drugg is used. For then, more whales
meoow meoooow meeeow meow meow meeow me meow. Mew meow, meow meeeow

are close round you than you can possibly chase at one time. But sperm
mew meeow meoow mew meow mew mew meeeeoow meeow me mew meow. Mew meoow

whales are not every day encountered; while you may, then, you must
meeoow mew mew meoow mew meeeoooooow; meoow mew mew, meow, mew meow

kill all you can. And if you cannot kill them all at once, you must wing
meow mew mew mew. Mew me mew meeeow meow meow mew me meow, mew meow meow

them, so that they can be afterwards killed at your leisure. Hence it
meow, me meow meow mew me meeeeeeoow meooow me meow meeooow. Meeow me

is, that at times like these the drugg, comes into requisition. Our boat

was furnished with three of them. The first and second were successfully

the time.

CHAPTER 88. Schools and Schoolmasters.
MEEEOOW me. Meoooow mew Meeeeeeooooow.







The previous chapter gave account of an immense body or herd of Sperm
Mew meeeeoow meeeeow meow meeooow me me meeooow meow me meow me Meoow

Whales, and there was also then given the probable cause inducing those
Meeoow, mew meeow mew meow meow meeow mew meeoooow meoow meeeeoow meoow

vast aggregations.
meow meeeeeeeeeow.




Now, though such great bodies are at times encountered, yet, as must
Mew, meeoow meow meeow meooow mew me meeow meeeeeeeeow, mew, me meow

have been seen, even at the present day, small detached bands are
meow meow meow, meow me mew meeeeow mew, meoow meeeeeow meeow mew

occasionally observed, embracing from twenty to fifty individuals each.
meooooooooow meeeeeow, meeooooow meow meeeow me meoow meoooooooow meow.

Such bands are known as schools. They generally are of two sorts; those
Meow meoow mew meoow me meeooow. Meow meeeoooow mew me mew meeow; meeow

composed almost entirely of females, and those mustering none but young
meeeooow meeeow meeeeeow me meeeeow, mew meeow meeooooow meow mew meoow

vigorous males, or bulls, as they are familiarly designated.
meeoooow meeow, me meeow, me meow mew meeeooooow meeeeeeoow.




In cavalier attendance upon the school of females, you invariably see a
Me meeoooow meeeeoooow meow mew meeeow me meeeeow, mew meeeeeeoow mew m

male of full grown magnitude, but not old; who, upon any alarm, evinces
meow me meow meeow meeeeooow, mew mew mew; mew, meow mew meoow, meeooow

his gallantry by falling in the rear and covering the flight of his
mew meeeoooow me meeeeow me mew meow mew meeeooow mew meooow me mew

ladies. In truth, this gentleman is a luxurious Ottoman, swimming about
meeeow. Me meeow, meow meeeeooow me m meeeeeoow Meoooow, meeeooow meoow

over the watery world, surroundingly accompanied by all the solaces
meow mew meeoow meeow, meeeeeeeeeoow meeeeeeeeow me mew mew meoooow

and endearments of the harem. The contrast between this Ottoman and
mew meeeeooooow me mew meoow. Mew meooooow meeeoow meow Meeooow mew

his concubines is striking; because, while he is always of the largest
mew meeeooooow me meeeeeow; meeeeow, meeow me me meeeow me mew meeeeow

leviathanic proportions, the ladies, even at full growth, are not
meoooooooow meeeeooooow, mew meooow, meow me meow meeoow, mew mew

more than one-third of the bulk of an average-sized male. They are
meow meow mew-meeow me mew meow me me meoooow-meeow meow. Meow mew

comparatively delicate, indeed; I dare say, not to exceed half a dozen
meoooooooooow meeoooow, meeoow; M meow mew, mew me meooow meow m meoow

yards round the waist. Nevertheless, it cannot be denied, that upon the
meeow meeow mew meeow. Meeeeeooooow, me meeeow me meeeow, meow meow mew

whole they are hereditarily entitled to EMBONPOINT.
meoow meow mew meeeeeeoooow meeeeoow me MEEEEOOOOW.




It is very curious to watch this harem and its lord in their indolent
Me me meow meeeoow me meeow meow meeow mew mew meow me meoow meeoooow

ramblings. Like fashionables, they are for ever on the move in leisurely
meeeeeoow. Meow meeeeeeeeoow, meow mew mew meow me mew meow me meeeeeeow

search of variety. You meet them on the Line in time for the full flower
meooow me meeooow. Mew meow meow me mew Meow me meow mew mew meow meeeow

of the Equatorial feeding season, having just returned, perhaps, from
me mew Meeeeoooow meeeoow meeeow, meeeow meow meooooow, meeooow, meow

spending the summer in the Northern seas, and so cheating summer of all
meooooow mew meeoow me mew Meooooow meow, mew me meeeeoow meeeow me mew

unpleasant weariness and warmth. By the time they have lounged up and
meooooooow meeooooow mew meooow. Me mew meow meow meow meoooow me mew

meow mew meeeoooow me mew Meeooow meeeow, meow meoow mew mew Meeeeoow

waters in anticipation of the cool season there, and so evade the other
meeoow me meeeeoooooow me mew meow meooow meoow, mew me meeow mew meoow

meeeeeoow meeeeeoooow me mew meow.




When serenely advancing on one of these journeys, if any strange

suspicious sights are seen, my lord whale keeps a wary eye on his
meeeeeeeow meooow mew meow, me meow meeow meoow m meow mew me mew

interesting family. Should any unwarrantably pert young Leviathan coming

meow mew, meeeeow me meow meeeeeeoooooow meoow me mew me mew meeeow,

meow meow meeeeeeoow meow mew Meeeow meeooow mew, mew meooow mew meow!

mew meeeoooow meow me meooow meeeow, mew mew mew meow. Meow meoow meow

meeow meow meoow meow, meeeeeeow meeeoow meow meeeooow, mew me meeeooow

mew mew meeeeeoow meow meow meow meoooooow meeoooooow meeow meeeeow. Mew

meeeeeooow meooow.




But supposing the invader of domestic bliss to betake himself away at
Mew meeeeeoow mew meeeeow me meeeooow meeow me meeoow meeooow meow me

meow meoow Meeeoow meeeeoow meeeeeeeeow meeow mew meooooow meooooooow.

Granting other whales to be in sight, the fishermen will seldom give
Meeeeeow meoow meeoow me me me meoow, mew meeeeeeow meow meeoow meow

chase to one of these Grand Turks; for these Grand Turks are too lavish
meeow me mew me meoow Meoow Meeow; mew meoow Meoow Meoow mew mew meeeow

of their strength, and hence their unctuousness is small. As for the
me meeow meeeeeow, mew meoow meoow meeeeeeoooow me meeow. Me mew mew

meow mew mew meeeeeoow meow meoow, mew, meeow meow mew meeeeeoow meow

meow meow me meeeeeeoow; me meeow, meow meow mew meooooow meow. Mew

Whale has no taste for the nursery, however much for the bower; and so,

meoow; meoow meow me meeoow. Me meow meow, meeeooooooow, me mew meooow

meeeoow, mew meeeeow meow meoow Meeeoooow meow mew meoooow meooow.




Now, as the harem of whales is called by the fishermen a school, so
Mew, me mew meeow me meooow me meooow me mew meeeeooow m meeeow, me

is the lord and master of that school technically known as the
me mew meow mew meeoow me meow meooow meoooooooow meoow me mew

meoooooow, meow meeow meoow me meeeow meeeeow, me meooow meow me meeoow

meoooooooow mew meow me meeeeow meoow, mew mew meeow me me. Mew meeow,

meeeeeeeooow, meeow meow meoooooow meow meoooow meow mew meow meeeeeow

The same secludedness and isolation to which the schoolmaster whale

meeoow--meeoow me meeeeow mew. Meow meeooooow meow-meeeoow Meeeow Meeow,

me meow meow me mew meow mew mew Meeeow meoooow; mew mew me meeow me

mew meeow me meow meoow meoooow.




The schools composing none but young and vigorous males, previously

meeeeeeow meoow meooooow meow-meeeow, meooooow meooow, meeeeooow mew,

mew meoow meow meoow mew meow meow meooow meeeeeeooow me m meoow meow.




The Forty-barrel-bull schools are larger than the harem schools. Like
Mew Meoow-meeoow-meow meeeeow mew meooow meow mew meoow meoooow. Meow

quest of settlements, that is, harems.
meoow me meeeoooooow, meow me, meeeow.




Another point of difference between the male and female schools is

meooooooow me meow m meow.










CHAPTER 89. Fast-Fish and Loose-Fish.
MEEOOOW me. Meow-Meow mew Meeow-Meow.







The allusion to the waif and waif-poles in the last chapter but one,
Mew meeeooow me mew meow mew meow-meeow me mew meow meeeeow mew mew,

necessitates some account of the laws and regulations of the whale
meooooooooow meow meoooow me mew meow mew meeeeeoooow me mew meeow

fishery, of which the waif may be deemed the grand symbol and badge.
meoooow, me meeow mew meow mew me meeoow mew meoow meeoow mew meoow.




It frequently happens that when several ships are cruising in company,
Me meeeeeeeow meeeoow meow meow meeooow meoow mew meeoooow me meeooow,

a whale may be struck by one vessel, then escape, and be finally killed
m meeow mew me meeoow me mew meeoow, meow meeoow, mew me meeeoow meeeow

and captured by another vessel; and herein are indirectly comprised
mew meeoooow me meeeoow meeeow; mew meeeow mew meeeooooow meeeeeoow

many minor contingencies, all partaking of this one grand feature. For
meow meeow meeeeeeeeooow, mew meeeoooow me meow mew meoow meoooow. Mew

example,--after a weary and perilous chase and capture of a whale,
meeooow,--meeow m meoow mew meeeeoow meeow mew meeeeow me m meoow,

the body may get loose from the ship by reason of a violent storm; and
mew meow mew mew meoow meow mew meow me meooow me m meeooow meoow; mew

drifting far away to leeward, be retaken by a second whaler, who, in a
meeeooow mew meow me meeeeow, me meeeeow me m meooow meooow, mew, me m

calm, snugly tows it alongside, without risk of life or line. Thus
meow, meooow meow me meeooooow, meoooow meow me meow me meow. Meow

the most vexatious and violent disputes would often arise between
mew meow meoooooow mew meoooow meooooow meeow meeow meoow meoooow

the fishermen, were there not some written or unwritten, universal,
mew meeeoooow, meow meeow mew meow meoooow me meoooooow, meeeeooow,

undisputed law applicable to all cases.
meeeeoooow mew meeeeoooow me mew meoow.




Perhaps the only formal whaling code authorized by legislative
Meoooow mew meow meooow meeeeow meow meeoooooow me meeooooooow

enactment, was that of Holland. It was decreed by the States-General in
meeooooow, mew meow me Meeeeow. Me mew meeooow me mew Meeeow-Meeeeow me

A.D. 1695. But though no other nation has ever had any written whaling
M.M. meow. Mew meeoow me meeow meeeow mew meow mew mew meoooow meeeeow

law, yet the American fishermen have been their own legislators and
mew, mew mew Meooooow meeeeeeow meow meow meeow mew meeeeooooow mew

lawyers in this matter. They have provided a system which for terse
meeeeow me meow meeoow. Meow meow meeeeeow m meeoow meoow mew meoow

comprehensiveness surpasses Justinian's Pandects and the By-laws of
meeeeeeeeooooooow meoooooow Meeeeeeow'm Meeeeoow mew mew Me-meow me

the Chinese Society for the Suppression of Meddling with other People's
mew Meeooow Meeooow mew mew Meeeeeeeoow me Meeeeoow meow meeow Meeoow'm

Business. Yes; these laws might be engraven on a Queen Anne's farthing,
Meeeooow. Mew; meoow meow meeow me meeeeoow me m Meeow Meow'm meooooow,

or the barb of a harpoon, and worn round the neck, so small are they.
me mew meow me m meeooow, mew meow meoow mew meow, me meeow mew meow.




I. A Fast-Fish belongs to the party fast to it.
M. M Meow-Meow meoooow me mew meoow meow me me.




II. A Loose-Fish is fair game for anybody who can soonest catch it.
ME. M Meoow-Meow me meow meow mew meeooow mew mew meeeoow meeow me.




But what plays the mischief with this masterly code is the admirable
Mew meow meeow mew meeeooow meow meow meeeeeow meow me mew meoooooow

brevity of it, which necessitates a vast volume of commentaries to
meeeoow me me, meoow meeeeeeeeoow m meow meooow me meeeeeeoooow me

expound it.
meeeeow me.




First: What is a Fast-Fish? Alive or dead a fish is technically fast,
Meeow: Meow me m Meow-Meow? Meoow me meow m meow me meeeeeeooow meow,

when it is connected with an occupied ship or boat, by any medium at all
meow me me meeooooow meow me meeeeoow meow me meow, me mew meeoow me mew

controllable by the occupant or occupants,--a mast, an oar, a nine-inch
meeeooooooow me mew meeoooow me meeeeeoow,--m meow, me mew, m meow-meow

cable, a telegraph wire, or a strand of cobweb, it is all the same.
meoow, m meeeeeoow meow, me m meooow me meeeow, me me mew mew meow.

Likewise a fish is technically fast when it bears a waif, or any other
Meeeooow m meow me meeeeeoooow meow meow me meoow m meow, me mew meeow

recognised symbol of possession; so long as the party waifing it plainly
meeeooooow meooow me meeeeeeoow; me meow me mew meeow meoooow me meeooow

evince their ability at any time to take it alongside, as well as their
meooow meeow meeooow me mew meow me meow me meeeeeoow, me meow me meoow

intention so to do.
meoooooow me me me.




These are scientific commentaries; but the commentaries of the whalemen
Meoow mew meeeeeeeow meeeeeeeeeow; mew mew meeeeoooooow me mew meeeeoow

themselves sometimes consist in hard words and harder knocks--the
meooooooow meeeoooow meeooow me meow meeow mew meeoow meeeow--mew

Coke-upon-Littleton of the fist. True, among the more upright and
Meow-meow-Meeeeeoow me mew meow. Meow, meeow mew meow meeooow mew

honourable whalemen allowances are always made for peculiar cases,
meeeeeeoow meeeooow meeeeeeeow mew meooow meow mew meeeeeow meeow,

where it would be an outrageous moral injustice for one party to claim
meoow me meoow me me meeeeeeeow meoow meeeoooow mew mew meoow me meeow

possession of a whale previously chased or killed by another party. But
meooooooow me m meeow meeoooooow meeeow me meeeow me meoooow meeow. Mew

others are by no means so scrupulous.
meeoow mew me me meeow me meooooooow.




Some fifty years ago there was a curious case of whale-trover litigated
Meow meoow meeow mew meoow mew m meeeoow meow me meeow-meeoow meoooooow

in England, wherein the plaintiffs set forth that after a hard chase of
me Meoooow, meeeeow mew meeeooooow mew meeow meow meoow m meow meeow me

a whale in the Northern seas; and when indeed they (the plaintiffs) had
m meoow me mew Meeeooow meow; mew meow meeeow meow (mew meeeeeooow) mew

succeeded in harpooning the fish; they were at last, through peril of
meeeeeeow me meeeeeeoow mew meow; meow meow me meow, meoooow meoow me

their lives, obliged to forsake not only their lines, but their boat
meeow meeow, meoooow me meoooow mew meow meeow meoow, mew meeow meow

itself. Ultimately the defendants (the crew of another ship) came up
meeeow. Meeeeoooow mew meeeeeeeow (mew meow me meeeeow meow) meow me

with the whale, struck, killed, seized, and finally appropriated it
meow mew meoow, meeoow, meooow, meeoow, mew meeooow meeeooooooow me

before the very eyes of the plaintiffs. And when those defendants were
meooow mew meow meow me mew meeoooooow. Mew meow meoow meeeeeeoow meow

remonstrated with, their captain snapped his fingers in the plaintiffs'
meooooooooow meow, meeow meeeoow meoooow mew meeooow me mew meeeeeeeow'

teeth, and assured them that by way of doxology to the deed he had done,
meeow, mew meoooow meow meow me mew me meeeeeow me mew meow me mew meow,

he would now retain their line, harpoons, and boat, which had remained
me meoow mew meeoow meoow meow, meeeeeow, mew meow, meeow mew meeeooow

attached to the whale at the time of the seizure. Wherefore the
meeeeeow me mew meeow me mew meow me mew meeeeow. Meeeeeoow mew

plaintiffs now sued for the recovery of the value of their whale, line,
meeeooooow mew meow mew mew meooooow me mew meoow me meeow meoow, meow,

harpoons, and boat.
meeeeeow, mew meow.




Mr. Erskine was counsel for the defendants; Lord Ellenborough was
Me. Meeooow mew meeeoow mew mew meeeeeeeow; Meow Meeeeeeeeoow mew

the judge. In the course of the defence, the witty Erskine went on
mew meeow. Me mew meeoow me mew meeeeow, mew meeow Meeeoow meow me

to illustrate his position, by alluding to a recent crim. con.
me meeeeoooow mew meeeeoow, me meooooow me m meooow meow. mew.

case, wherein a gentleman, after in vain trying to bridle his wife's
meow, meoooow m meeooooow, meoow me meow meooow me meeoow mew meow'm

viciousness, had at last abandoned her upon the seas of life; but in
meeeeeoooow, mew me meow meeeoooow mew meow mew meow me meow; mew me

the course of years, repenting of that step, he instituted an action to
mew meeeow me meoow, meeeeeeow me meow meow, me meeeeeooow me meooow me

recover possession of her. Erskine was on the other side; and he
meeooow meooooooow me mew. Meeooow mew me mew meeow meow; mew me

then supported it by saying, that though the gentleman had originally
meow meoooooow me me meeeow, meow meeoow mew meeeeeoow mew meeeeeeeow

harpooned the lady, and had once had her fast, and only by reason of the
meoooooow mew meow, mew mew meow mew mew meow, mew meow me meeoow me mew

great stress of her plunging viciousness, had at last abandoned her; yet
meeow meeeow me mew meooooow meoooooooow, mew me meow meeeoooow mew; mew

abandon her he did, so that she became a loose-fish; and therefore
meeooow mew me mew, me meow mew meeoow m meeow-meow; mew meeooooow

when a subsequent gentleman re-harpooned her, the lady then became that
meow m meeoooooow meeeeeoow me-meeeeeoow mew, mew meow meow meeoow meow

subsequent gentleman's property, along with whatever harpoon might have
meeeeoooow meoooooow'm meeeeoow, meoow meow meeeooow meoooow meeow meow

been found sticking in her.
meow meoow meeeeoow me mew.




Now in the present case Erskine contended that the examples of the whale
Mew me mew meeeoow meow Meeeeow meeeeeeow meow mew meeeeoow me mew meeow

and the lady were reciprocally illustrative of each other.
mew mew meow meow meeeeoooooow meeeeeeoooow me meow meoow.




These pleadings, and the counter pleadings, being duly heard, the very
Meeow meeeeeeow, mew mew meeooow meeooooow, meoow meow meeow, mew meow

learned Judge in set terms decided, to wit,--That as for the boat, he
meeeoow Meeow me mew meoow meeooow, me mew,--Meow me mew mew meow, me

awarded it to the plaintiffs, because they had merely abandoned it
meeeeow me me mew meooooooow, meoooow meow mew meooow meoooooow me

to save their lives; but that with regard to the controverted whale,
me meow meoow meeow; mew meow meow meooow me mew meeeooooooow meeow,

harpoons, and line, they belonged to the defendants; the whale, because
meeeeeow, mew meow, meow meeeeeow me mew meeeeeooow; mew meeow, meeeeow

it was a Loose-Fish at the time of the final capture; and the harpoons
me mew m Meeow-Meow me mew meow me mew meoow meeooow; mew mew meeeooow

and line because when the fish made off with them, it (the fish)
mew meow meeooow meow mew meow meow mew meow meow, me (mew meow)

acquired a property in those articles; and hence anybody who afterwards
meeeeeow m meeeooow me meoow meeeooow; mew meeow meeeeow mew meeeeeeoow

took the fish had a right to them. Now the defendants afterwards took
meow mew meow mew m meoow me meow. Mew mew meeeeeeoow meeeooooow meow

the fish; ergo, the aforesaid articles were theirs.
mew meow; meow, mew meeeeeeow meooooow meow meooow.




A common man looking at this decision of the very learned Judge, might
M meeoow mew meeeeow me meow meeeooow me mew meow meeeoow Meoow, meoow

possibly object to it. But ploughed up to the primary rock of the
meeeeoow meeeow me me. Mew meeeooow me me mew meeeeow meow me mew

matter, the two great principles laid down in the twin whaling laws
meooow, mew mew meeow meooooooow meow meow me mew meow meeooow meow

meeeeeooow meooow, mew meeooow mew meeeeeooow me Meow Meeeeeeeeoow me

mew meeow meeow meow; meeow mew meow meeeeoow Meow-Meow mew Meeow-Meow,

I say, will, on reflection, be found the fundamentals of all human
M mew, meow, me meeoooooow, me meoow mew meeeeeeeeeow me mew meeow

meeeeooooooow; mew meeeeeeeeeeeoow mew meeeeooooow meeooow me meeeoooow,

the Temple of the Law, like the Temple of the Philistines, has but two
mew Meeeow me mew Mew, meow mew Meeeow me mew Meeeeeeeoow, mew mew mew

props to stand on.
meeow me meeow me.




Is it not a saying in every one's mouth, Possession is half of the law:
Me me mew m meooow me meeow mew'm meeow, Meeeeeeoow me meow me mew mew:

that is, regardless of how the thing came into possession? But often
meow me, meeoooooow me mew mew meoow meow meow meeoooooow? Mew meeow

meeeeeeeow me mew meeow me mew mew. Meow mew mew meeoow mew meeow me

Meeeeow meeow mew Meeeeoooow meooow mew Meow-Meow, meoooow meeeeeooow me

mew meeow me mew mew? Meow me mew meeeoooow meeeeoow me mew meeow'm meow

mite but a Fast-Fish? What is yonder undetected villain's marble mansion
meow mew m Meow-Meow? Meow me meeoow meeoooooow meeeoow'm meeeow meeeoow

meow me meow meeooow meeeeoow mew m Meow-Meow? Meow me mew Meeeeoooow me

Savesoul's income of L100,000 seized from the scant bread and cheese
Meeeooow'm meeoow me MEOW,mew meooow meow mew meoow meeow mew meeeow

of hundreds of thousands of broken-backed laborers (all sure of heaven

meeeoow mew me Meeeeoow'm meow) meow me meow meeeeeow MEOW,mew mew m

Fast-Fish? What are the Duke of Dunder's hereditary towns and hamlets

but Fast-Fish? What to that redoubted harpooneer, John Bull, is poor
mew Meow-Meow? Meow me meow meeeoooow meeeooooow, Meow Meow, me meow

Latin from the books of the Laws of England, which taken along with the

me meow meow; mew mew meow mew meeoooow me meooow!"

meow meoow; me me me m mew meeeoow meeeow mew mew meeeow. Mew meow, meow

meow mew meow meoow mew meow meow mew.










CHAPTER 92. Ambergris.
MEEOOOW me. Meeeeeeow.







Now this ambergris is a very curious substance, and so important as
Mew meow meeeeooow me m meow meoooow meeeeooow, mew me meeooooow me

an article of commerce, that in 1791 a certain Nantucket-born Captain
me meeeoow me meeeooow, meow me meow m meeooow Meeeeeeow-meow Meeeeow

Coffin was examined at the bar of the English House of Commons on that

meoow me m meow, meeeeeoooow, meeeoow, meeeooow meeeeooow, meow mew

I opine, that it is plainly traceable to the first arrival of the

CHAPTER 93. The Castaway.

It was but some few days after encountering the Frenchman, that a most

Now, in the whale ship, it is not every one that goes in the boats. Some

Nippers. Strictly this word is not indigenous to the whale's vocabulary.

me me meoow,--m meow-mew-meoooow mew m meeow-mew. Mew meeooow-meow me

CHAPTER 95. The Cassock.
MEEEOOW me. Mew Meeeeow.







Had you stepped on board the Pequod at a certain juncture of this
Mew mew meeeoow me meeow mew Meooow me m meeeoow meeoooow me meow

me Meow, mew meeow meow me Meooooow. Mew me meow, meeeow, me me; me,

Meow Mew, mew mew, mew meeeow mew, mew meoooooow mew meow, mew meoow me

mew me meeeeeeooow me mew meeow Meooow, me meeeow mew meoow me mew meow

meeeeow me mew Meeow Meow me Meeow.




Look at the sailor, called the mincer, who now comes along, and assisted

African hunter the pelt of a boa. This done he turns the pelt inside

me mew. Mew meow, me me meoow meow; meow meeeooow meow meeow meow me me,

me mew meeow mew, me meeeooooow meeow meeeoow meeoow meow me. Mew meeoow

mew meooow meeoow mew meeeeoow me mew meow meeoooooow me mew meoooow.

meoooow mew, meeow meooooow me mew meeeooow meeeeeoow me mew meooow.

*Bible leaves! Bible leaves! This is the invariable cry from the mates

to the mincer. It enjoins him to be careful, and cut his work into as

CHAPTER 96. The Try-Works.
MEOOOOW me. Mew Mew-Meeow.







Besides her hoisted boats, an American whaler is outwardly distinguished
Meoooow mew meeeoow meeow, me Meooooow meooow me meeeeeoow meeooooooooow

by her try-works. She presents the curious anomaly of the most solid
me mew mew-meoow. Mew meeeooow mew meeeeow meoooow me mew meow meoow

meeeoow meeeoow meow mew mew meow me meeeeeeeooow mew meeooooow meow.

It is as if from the open field a brick-kiln were transported to her
Me me me me meow mew meow meoow m meeow-meow meow meoooooooow me mew

planks.
meooow.




The try-works are planted between the foremast and mainmast, the most
Mew mew-meoow mew meeooow meeeeow mew meeeooow mew meeeeeow, mew meow

roomy part of the deck. The timbers beneath are of a peculiar strength,
meeow meow me mew meow. Mew meeeoow meeeoow mew me m meeeeeow meeeeeow,

fitted to sustain the weight of an almost solid mass of brick and
meeoow me meoooow mew meeeow me me meooow meoow meow me meoow mew

mortar, some ten feet by eight square, and five in height. The
meooow, meow mew meow me meeow meeeow, mew meow me meeoow. Mew

foundation does not penetrate the deck, but the masonry is firmly

sides, and screwing it down to the timbers. On the flanks it is cased

hatchway. Removing this hatch we expose the great try-pots, two in
meooooow. Meeeeoow meow meeow me meeoow mew meeow mew-meow, mew me

number, and each of several barrels' capacity. When not in use, they are
meeoow, mew meow me meeeoow meeooow' meooooow. Meow mew me mew, meow mew

kept remarkably clean. Sometimes they are polished with soapstone

and sand, till they shine within like silver punch-bowls. During the

mew meeeoow me, meow mew meow meow. Me me m meeow meow mew meeeeeow

meeoooooooow meeeooooow. Me mew me mew meow meow mew-mew me mew Meeeow,

mew meeow me meeooooow mew meow meow.




Removing the fire-board from the front of the try-works, the bare

It was about nine o'clock at night that the Pequod's try-works were

"All ready there? Off hatch, then, and start her. You cook, fire the
"Mew meeow meoow? Mew meeow, meow, mew meoow mew. Mew meow, meow mew

works." This was an easy thing, for the carpenter had been thrusting his

me mew mew meow. Me mew me meeeeeeeeow, meow, Meooow meow meoow me, meow

me mew meow me mew meeeeoow me meeeeeow meeow. Me meooow meow mew meow

wing of the day of judgment; it is an argument for the pit.
meow me mew mew me meeeooow; me me me meeeeeow mew mew mew.




By midnight the works were in full operation. We were clear from the

So seemed it to me, as I stood at her helm, and for long hours silently

But that night, in particular, a strange (and ever since inexplicable)

meeooow me mew mew!




Look not too long in the face of the fire, O man! Never dream with thy

But even Solomon, he says, "the man that wandereth out of the way

CHAPTER 97. The Lamp.
MEOOOOW me. Mew Meow.







Had you descended from the Pequod's try-works to the Pequod's
Mew mew meoooooow meow mew Meeeow'm mew-meoow me mew Meeeow'm

forecastle, where the off duty watch were sleeping, for one single

in their triangular oaken vaults, each mariner a chiselled muteness; a
me meoow meeeeeeoow meeow meeoow, meow meoooow m meeooooow meeeeoow; m

score of lamps flashing upon his hooded eyes.
meeow me meoow meeoooow meow mew meeeow meow.




In merchantmen, oil for the sailor is more scarce than the milk of
Me meoooooooow, mew mew mew meeeow me meow meeoow meow mew meow me

queens. To dress in the dark, and eat in the dark, and stumble in
meooow. Me meoow me mew meow, mew mew me mew meow, mew meeeoow me

darkness to his pallet, this is his usual lot. But the whaleman, as he
meeeooow me mew meeoow, meow me mew meoow mew. Mew mew meeeeeow, me me

seeks the food of light, so he lives in light. He makes his berth an
meoow mew meow me meeow, me me meoow me meeow. Me meeow mew meeow me

Aladdin's lamp, and lays him down in it; so that in the pitchiest night

the ship's black hull still houses an illumination.
mew meow'm meeow meow meoow meeeow me meeeeeeeooow.




See with what entire freedom the whaleman takes his handful of
Mew meow meow meooow meoooow mew meeoooow meoow mew meeeeow me

the try-works, and replenishes them there, as mugs of ale at a vat. He
mew mew-meoow, mew meeeeooooow meow meoow, me meow me mew me m mew. Me

burns, too, the purest of oil, in its unmanufactured, and, therefore,
meoow, mew, mew meeoow me mew, me mew meeeeeeeooooow, mew, meeeoooow,

unvitiated state; a fluid unknown to solar, lunar, or astral
meeeeeooow meeow; m meoow meeooow me meoow, meoow, me meooow

contrivances ashore. It is sweet as early grass butter in April. He
meeoooooooow meeoow. Me me meoow me meoow meeow meooow me Meeow. Me

goes and hunts for his oil, so as to be sure of its freshness and
meow mew meeow mew mew mew, me me me me meow me mew meeooooow mew

genuineness, even as the traveller on the prairie hunts up his own
meeeeeoooow, meow me mew meeooooow me mew meeooow meeow me mew mew

supper of game.
meeoow me meow.










CHAPTER 98. Stowing Down and Clearing Up.

CHAPTER 99. The Doubloon.
MEEEEOW me. Mew Meeeeoow.







Ere now it has been related how Ahab was wont to pace his quarter-deck,
Mew mew me mew meow meoooow mew Meow mew meow me meow mew meeooow-meow,

taking regular turns at either limit, the binnacle and mainmast; but
meeoow meeeeow meoow me meooow meeow, mew meeeooow mew meeoooow; mew

CHAPTER 100. Leg and Arm.
MEEEOOW mew. Mew mew Mew.




The Pequod, of Nantucket, Meets the Samuel Enderby, of London.
Mew Meeeow, me Meeeeeeow, Meoow mew Meeeow Meeooow, me Meeeow.







"Ship, ahoy! Hast seen the White Whale?"

So cried Ahab, once more hailing a ship showing English colours, bearing

CHAPTER 101. The Decanter.
MEEOOOW mew. Mew Meooooow.







Ere the English ship fades from sight, be it set down here, that
Mew mew Meeeoow meow meoow meow meeow, me me mew meow meow, meow

she hailed from London, and was named after the late Samuel Enderby,
mew meeoow meow Meeoow, mew mew meeow meoow mew meow Meooow Meeeeow,

merchant of that city, the original of the famous whaling house of
meeeooow me meow meow, mew meeeeeow me mew meeoow meeeeow meeow me

Enderby & Sons; a house which in my poor whaleman's opinion, comes not
Meeooow & Meow; m meoow meeow me me meow meeoooow'm meeooow, meoow mew

far behind the united royal houses of the Tudors and Bourbons, in point
mew meeoow mew meeeow meeow meooow me mew Meooow mew Meooooow, me meoow

of real historical interest. How long, prior to the year of our
me meow meeeeeeeow meeeooow. Mew meow, meoow me mew meow me mew

Lord 1775, this great whaling house was in existence, my numerous
Meow meow, meow meeow meoooow meeow mew me meeeeeoow, me meooooow

fish-documents do not make plain; but in that year (1775) it fitted
meow-meeooooow me mew meow meoow; mew me meow meow (meow) me meooow

out the first English ships that ever regularly hunted the Sperm Whale;
mew mew meeow Meeooow meoow meow meow meeeeeoow meooow mew Meeow Meeow;

though for some score of years previous (ever since 1726) our valiant
meeoow mew meow meeow me meeow meooooow (meow meeow meow) mew meeeeow

Coffins and Maceys of Nantucket and the Vineyard had in large fleets
Meeooow mew Meeeow me Meeeeeeow mew mew Meooooow mew me meoow meooow

pursued that Leviathan, but only in the North and South Atlantic: not
meoooow meow Meeooooow, mew meow me mew Meoow mew Meeow Meeoooow: mew

elsewhere. Be it distinctly recorded here, that the Nantucketers were
meeeeooow. Me me meeeeeeeow meooooow meow, meow mew Meeeeeeeooow meow

the first among mankind to harpoon with civilized steel the great Sperm
mew meoow meoow meeooow me meeeeow meow meeooooow meeow mew meeow Meoow

Whale; and that for half a century they were the only people of the
Meeow; mew meow mew meow m meeeeow meow meow mew meow meeoow me mew

whole globe who so harpooned him.
meoow meoow mew me meeeeeeow mew.




In 1778, a fine ship, the Amelia, fitted out for the express purpose,
Me meow, m meow meow, mew Meeeow, meooow mew mew mew meeooow meeooow,

and at the sole charge of the vigorous Enderbys, boldly rounded Cape
mew me mew meow meooow me mew meooooow Meeeeeow, meeeow meeeeow Meow

Horn, and was the first among the nations to lower a whale-boat of any
Meow, mew mew mew meeow meoow mew meeeoow me meeow m meeow-meow me mew

sort in the great South Sea. The voyage was a skilful and lucky one;
meow me mew meoow Meeow Mew. Mew meeoow mew m meoooow mew meeow mew;

and returning to her berth with her hold full of the precious sperm, the
mew meeeoooow me mew meoow meow mew meow meow me mew meeeeoow meoow, mew

Amelia's example was soon followed by other ships, English and American,
Meeoow'm meoooow mew meow meeoooow me meoow meeow, Meeeeow mew Meooooow,

and thus the vast Sperm Whale grounds of the Pacific were thrown open.
mew meow mew meow Meeow Meoow meeeeow me mew Meeeoow meow meeoow meow.

But not content with this good deed, the indefatigable house again
Mew mew meeeeow meow meow meow meow, mew meeeeeoooooow meoow meoow

meeeeeeow meooow: Meeeow mew mew mew Meow--mew meow, meeow meooow meow

expense, the British government was induced to send the sloop-of-war
meoooow, mew Meeooow meeeeeeoow mew meoooow me meow mew meoow-me-mew

mew meow meeeeow; mew meow meow mew meooow. Mew meow me mew mew. Me

me me m meeeoow meeoow me mew meooow meeeow me Meeow. Meow meow--meow

meow mew meoow Meeeooow Meeooow Meeeow meeow meooow meoooooow meeow.

Mew Meeow me meow meooow meooow mew meeeoooow me m Meeeeow Meeeow, m

Nantucketer.
Meeooooooow.

Mew meeoow me mew Meeooooow, meeeoooow, meoow meoow, M meeow, meeoow me

the present day; though doubtless the original Samuel must long ago have

meeeeow mew meeow mew mew meoow Meeow Mew me mew meeow meeow.




The ship named after him was worthy of the honour, being a very fast
Mew meow meeow meoow mew mew meooow me mew meeeow, meoow m meow meow

sailer and a noble craft every way. I boarded her once at midnight
meooow mew m meoow meeow meoow mew. M meeeoow mew meow me meeeeeow

The beef was fine--tough, but with body in it. They said it was
Mew meow mew meow--meeow, mew meow meow me me. Meow meow me mew

meoow meow meow, mew meow meow meoow me mew meoow meow meow meoooooow.

But why was it, think ye, that the Samuel Enderby, and some other

The English were preceded in the whale fishery by the Hollanders,
Mew Meeooow meow meeeooow me mew meoow meeeeow me mew Meeoooooow,

The quantity of beer, too, is very large, 10,800 barrels. Now, as those

But no more; enough has been said to show that the old Dutch whalers

CHAPTER 102. A Bower in the Arsacides.
MEEOOOW mew. M Meoow me mew Meeeeeoow.







Hitherto, in descriptively treating of the Sperm Whale, I have chiefly
Meeoooow, me meoooooooooow meooooow me mew Meoow Meoow, M meow meoooow

meeeooow meeeeooooooow me mew, me meooooow me mew me meeeooow mew meoow

further, and untagging the points of his hose, unbuckling his garters,
meeooow, mew meeeeeoow mew meooow me mew meow, meeeeoooow mew meeeeow,

and casting loose the hooks and the eyes of the joints of his innermost
mew meoooow meoow mew meeow mew mew meow me mew meeoow me mew meoooooow

bones, set him before you in his ultimatum; that is to say, in his
meoow, mew mew meooow mew me mew meeeeeeow; meow me me mew, me mew

unconditional skeleton.
meeeeeeeeeoow meeeeeow.




But how now, Ishmael? How is it, that you, a mere oarsman in the
Mew mew mew, Meeeeow? Mew me me, meow mew, m meow meoooow me mew

fishery, pretend to know aught about the subterranean parts of the

me mew meeeeow me mew Meoooow; mew me meow me mew meeeooow, meow me m

specimen rib for exhibition? Explain thyself, Ishmael. Can you land
meeeeeow mew mew meeeeeooow? Meeeoow meeeoow, Meoooow. Mew mew meow

m meow-meeow meeow me meow meow mew meeeeeeooow, me m meow meooow m

roast-pig? Surely not. A veritable witness have you hitherto been,

Ishmael; but have a care how you seize the privilege of Jonah alone;
Meeeeow; mew meow m meow mew mew meeow mew meeeeeeow me Meeow meeow;

mew meeeeeoow me meeeeeeooow meow mew meooow mew meoow; mew meeeoow,

meeeeeeow; mew meeoow me mew meeeow-meow, meeow-meeow, meeeoooow, mew

cheeseries in his bowels.
meeeeeooow me mew meeoow.




I confess, that since Jonah, few whalemen have penetrated very far
M meeooow, meow meeow Meoow, mew meeeeeow meow meeoooooow meow mew

beneath the skin of the adult whale; nevertheless, I have been blessed

meow-meeeoow mew meow-meeow, mew meeoooow mew meow mew meeeoow mew mew

meeeeeow me meow meoow mew?




And as for my exact knowledge of the bones of the leviathan in their
Mew me mew me meoow meeeeooow me mew meeow me mew meeeeooow me meoow

gigantic, full grown development, for that rare knowledge I am indebted

me me meow meoow meooow Meeeoow, meow me Meeooow, mew me mew Meeeeooow.

For being at Tranque, years ago, when attached to the trading-ship Dey
Mew meeow me Meeeeow, meeow mew, meow meeoooow me mew meeooow-meow Mew

me Meeooow, M mew meeeoow me meoow meow me mew Meeeeeeoow meeoooow meow

meoooow.




Among many other fine qualities, my royal friend Tranquo, being gifted

meeoow-meeeeeoow, meoooow-meeeoooow meeow mew meow meow mew meooow.




Chief among these latter was a great Sperm Whale, which, after an
Meoow meoow meeow meeeow mew m meeow Meoow Meeow, meoow, meoow me

unusually long raging gale, had been found dead and stranded, with his
meeeeeoow meow meeoow meow, mew meow meeow meow mew meooooow, meow mew

meooow mew meeooow mew. Meow mew meow meow mew me meow meow meooooow me

meow mew meeeeoow mew meeeoooow meeeoooooow me mew Meeeoow meow, meeow m

grand temple of lordly palms now sheltered it.
meoow meeeow me meeoow meeow mew meeeoooow me.

CHAPTER 103. Measurement of The Whale's Skeleton.
MEEOOOW mew. Meeooooooow me Mew Meoow'm Meeeeeow.







In the first place, I wish to lay before you a particular, plain

statement, touching the living bulk of this leviathan, whose skeleton we
meoooooow, meeoooow mew meooow meow me meow meeeeeeow, meoow meeeeeow me

are briefly to exhibit. Such a statement may prove useful here.
mew meeeoow me meeeeow. Meow m meeeeooow mew meeow meooow meow.




According to a careful calculation I have made, and which I partly base
Meeeeeeow me m meeeoow meeeeeeeeow M meow meow, mew meoow M meeoow meow

upon Captain Scoresby's estimate, of seventy tons for the largest
meow Meeeeow Meeeooow'm meeeooow, me meeeoow meow mew mew meeeeow

sized Greenland whale of sixty feet in length; according to my careful
meoow Meeeeeeow meoow me meeow meow me meooow; meoooooow me me meeeoow

calculation, I say, a Sperm Whale of the largest magnitude, between
meeeeeeooow, M mew, m Meeow Meeow me mew meoooow meeeeeeow, meeeoow

eighty-five and ninety feet in length, and something less than forty
meeoow-meow mew meeoow meow me meeeow, mew meeeeeeow meow meow meeow

feet in its fullest circumference, such a whale will weigh at least
meow me mew meeeeow meeeeeeeeeeow, meow m meoow meow meoow me meeow

ninety tons; so that, reckoning thirteen men to a ton, he would
meeoow meow; me meow, meeeeooow meeeooow mew me m mew, me meeow

considerably outweigh the combined population of a whole village of one
meeeeoooooow meeeooow mew meeeeoow meeeeoooow me m meoow meeeeow me mew

thousand one hundred inhabitants.
meeeeoow mew meeeeow meeeeeeooow.




Think you not then that brains, like yoked cattle, should be put to this

leviathan, to make him at all budge to any landsman's imagination?
meoooooow, me meow mew me mew meeow me mew meeeeoow'm meeeeeeeeow?

billiard-ball. I was told that there were still smaller ones, but they
meeeeoow-meow. M mew meow meow meoow meow meeow meeooow meow, mew meow

had been lost by some little cannibal urchins, the priest's children,
mew meow meow me meow meeeow meeeeoow meeeeow, mew meooow'm meooooow,

who had stolen them to play marbles with. Thus we see how that the
mew mew meeoow meow me meow meeeoow meow. Meow me mew mew meow mew

spine of even the hugest of living things tapers off at last into simple
meeow me meow mew meooow me meeeow meeeow meooow mew me meow meow meeeow

child's play.
meoow'm meow.










CHAPTER 104. The Fossil Whale.
MEOOOOW mew. Mew Meeoow Meeow.







From his mighty bulk the whale affords a most congenial theme whereon
Meow mew meeoow meow mew meoow meoooow m meow meeeeeoow meoow meeooow

to enlarge, amplify, and generally expatiate. Would you, you could not
me meeooow, meeeeow, mew meoooooow meeeeeeow. Meoow mew, mew meoow mew

meeow. Mew me meow meow meeow mew meeeooow meow meeeooow me meow,

and the yards he measures about the waist; only think of the gigantic
mew mew meeow me meeeeoow meeow mew meeow; meow meeow me mew meooooow

meeeow mew meeeeow meeoow meow me mew meeeeeeeooow meeow-meow me m

line-of-battle-ship.
meow-me-meeoow-meow.




Since I have undertaken to manhandle this Leviathan, it behooves me

to approve myself omnisciently exhaustive in the enterprise; not

mew me mew meeooooow meow me mew meeoow. Meooow meeeoow meeeeeoow mew

me meow me mew meeeeow meeeeeeoow mew meeeeoooow meeeeeeeeooow, me

mew meeeeow me meoooow mew me me meooooooooooow, meeeeeeeoooow, mew

Leviathan--to an ant or a flea--such portly terms might justly be deemed

meeeeeeeoooow meeeeeoooooow. Mew meow Meeooooow me mew meow, mew meow me

altered. Fain am I to stagger to this emprise under the weightiest

meeow me mew meooooooow. Mew meow me me meow, meow meeeeeow me mew meow

invariably used a huge quarto edition of Johnson, expressly purchased

bulk more fitted him to compile a lexicon to be used by a whale author

like me.
meow me.




One often hears of writers that rise and swell with their subject,
Mew meoow meeow me meoooow meow meow mew meeow meow meeow meoooow,

flea, though many there be who have tried it.
meow, meeoow meow meoow me mew meow meoow me.




Ere entering upon the subject of Fossil Whales, I present my credentials

me m meeeeooow, me meeeeow meow me me meeeoooooooow meow M meow meow

Detached broken fossils of pre-adamite whales, fragments of their bones

unknown Leviathanic species.
meeooow Meeeeeeeoow meeeeow.

When I stand among these mighty Leviathan skeletons, skulls, tusks,

whale's; and, king of creation, he left his wake along the present lines

of the Andes and the Himmalehs. Who can show a pedigree like Leviathan?
me mew Meeow mew mew Meeeoooow. Mew mew meow m meeeeeow meow Meeeeeeow?

Ahab's harpoon had shed older blood than the Pharaoh's. Methuselah seems

Nor must there be omitted another strange attestation of the antiquity

the venerable John Leo, the old Barbary traveller.

"Not far from the Sea-side, they have a Temple, the Rafters and Beams
"Mew mew meow mew Mew-meow, meow meow m Meeoow, mew Meoooow mew Meoow

of which are made of Whale-Bones; for Whales of a monstrous size are

meeeeoooow meow me meow meow meow meoow. Mew Meeeow Meeeow meeeoow, meow

without immediate death. But the truth of the Matter is, that on either
meeooow meeeeeoow meoow. Mew mew meoow me mew Meeeow me, meow me meooow

side of the Temple, there are Rocks that shoot two Miles into the Sea,
meow me mew Meeoow, meoow mew Meeow meow meoow mew Meeow meow mew Mew,

and wound the Whales when they light upon 'em. They keep a Whale's Rib
mew meoow mew Meeeow meow meow meoow meow 'me. Meow meow m Meoow'm Mew

of an incredible length for a Miracle, which lying upon the Ground with
me me meooooooow meooow mew m Meeeeow, meeow meoow meow mew Meeoow meow

its convex part uppermost, makes an Arch, the Head of which cannot be
mew meooow meow meeeoooow, meeow me Meow, mew Meow me meoow meeeow me

reached by a Man upon a Camel's Back. This Rib (says John Leo) is said
meeeeow me m Mew meow m Meoow'm Meow. Meow Mew (meow Meow Mew) me meow

to have layn there a hundred Years before I saw it. Their Historians
me meow meow meeow m meoooow Meoow meeeow M mew me. Meoow Meooooooow

meeeow, meow m Meeeeow mew meooooow'm me Meeooow, meow meow meow Meooow,

and some do not stand to assert, that the Prophet Jonas was cast forth
mew meow me mew meoow me meeoow, meow mew Meoooow Meoow mew meow meeow

by the Whale at the Base of the Temple."
me mew Meeow me mew Meow me mew Meooow."




In this Afric Temple of the Whale I leave you, reader, and if you be a
Me meow Meoow Meooow me mew Meoow M meeow mew, meeeow, mew me mew me m

CHAPTER 105. Does the Whale's Magnitude Diminish?--Will He Perish?
MEOOOOW mew. Meow mew Meoow'm Meoooooow Meeeeoow?--Meow Me Meooow?







Inasmuch, then, as this Leviathan comes floundering down upon us from
Meeoooow, meow, me meow Meeeeeeow meeow meeeeeeooow meow meow me meow

the head-waters of the Eternities, it may be fitly inquired, whether,
mew meow-meooow me mew Meeoooooow, me mew me meoow meeeooow, meeooow,

in the long course of his generations, he has not degenerated from the
me mew meow meooow me mew meeeeooooow, me mew mew meeooooooow meow mew

original bulk of his sires.
meooooow meow me mew meeow.




But upon investigation we find, that not only are the whales of the
Mew meow meeeeooooooow me meow, meow mew meow mew mew meooow me mew

present day superior in magnitude to those whose fossil remains are
meeooow mew meooooow me meeeeeoow me meeow meeow meooow meeeeow mew

found in the Tertiary system (embracing a distinct geological period
meoow me mew Meeeeoow meeeow (meeeeeeow m meeeeoow meeoooooow meeoow

prior to man), but of the whales found in that Tertiary system, those
meeow me mew), mew me mew meeoow meeow me meow Meeeooow meooow, meoow

belonging to its latter formations exceed in size those of its earlier
meeeeeoow me mew meooow meeeeoooow meooow me meow meeow me mew meeeoow

ones.
meow.




Of all the pre-adamite whales yet exhumed, by far the largest is the
Me mew mew mew-meeeoow meeeow mew meeeeow, me mew mew meoooow me mew

Alabama one mentioned in the last chapter, and that was less than
Meeeoow mew meoooooow me mew meow meeeeow, mew meow mew meow meow

seventy feet in length in the skeleton. Whereas, we have already seen,
meoooow meow me meooow me mew meeeeeow. Meeeeow, me meow meeeoow meow,

that the tape-measure gives seventy-two feet for the skeleton of a large
meow mew meow-meoooow meoow meeeeow-mew meow mew mew meooooow me m meoow

sized modern whale. And I have heard, on whalemen's authority, that
meoow meooow meoow. Mew M meow meeow, me meeeeeow'm meeeeooow, meow

Sperm Whales have been captured near a hundred feet long at the time of
Meeow Meeeow meow meow meeeooow meow m meeooow meow meow me mew meow me

capture.
meeeeow.




But may it not be, that while the whales of the present hour are an
Mew mew me mew me, meow meeow mew meeeow me mew meeooow meow mew me

advance in magnitude upon those of all previous geological periods; may
meeeoow me meeeeeoow meow meoow me mew meooooow meeeeeeeow meeeoow; mew

it not be, that since Adam's time they have degenerated?
me mew me, meow meeow Meow'm meow meow meow meeeeeeeeow?




Assuredly, we must conclude so, if we are to credit the accounts of such
Meeeeeoow, me meow meeeeeow me, me me mew me meeoow mew meeeooow me meow

gentlemen as Pliny, and the ancient naturalists generally. For Pliny
meeooooow me Meoow, mew mew meoooow meeeeeeeeow meeeoooow. Mew Meoow

tells us of Whales that embraced acres of living bulk, and Aldrovandus
meoow me me Meeoow meow meeeeeow meeow me meeeow meow, mew Meeeoooooow

of others which measured eight hundred feet in length--Rope Walks and
me meeoow meeow meeoooow meoow meeeoow meow me meeoow--Meow Meeow mew

Thames Tunnels of Whales! And even in the days of Banks and Solander,
Meeoow Meoooow me Meooow! Mew meow me mew meow me Meeow mew Meooooow,

Cooke's naturalists, we find a Danish member of the Academy of Sciences
Meeow'm meeeeeeeoow, me meow m Meooow meeoow me mew Meoooow me Meeoooow

setting down certain Iceland Whales (reydan-siskur, or Wrinkled Bellies)
meeooow meow meoooow Meoooow Meeoow (meeeow-meooow, me Meeeooow Meeooow)

at one hundred and twenty yards; that is, three hundred and sixty feet.
me mew meoooow mew meeeow meeow; meow me, meeow meeeoow mew meeow meow.

And Lacepede, the French naturalist, in his elaborate history of whales,
Mew Meeeooow, mew Meooow meeeeeooow, me mew meeeeeeow meoooow me meooow,

in the very beginning of his work (page 3), sets down the Right Whale at
me mew meow meoooooow me mew meow (meow m), meow meow mew Meeow Meeow me

one hundred metres, three hundred and twenty-eight feet. And this work
mew meeooow meooow, meeow meeooow mew meeoow-meoow meow. Mew meow meow

was published so late as A.D. 1825.
mew meeeeooow me meow me M.M. meow.




But will any whaleman believe these stories? No. The whale of to-day is

me mew me mew meeooooow me Meeow'm meow. Mew me meow M me meoow Meeow

me, M, m meeeeeow (meow meow me mew), meow meow meow me meow mew me.

Because I cannot understand how it is, that while the Egyptian mummies

mew meeeoow mew meeow meoow meeoow meow meeeeeeeeow.

CHAPTER 106. Ahab's Leg.
MEEEOOW mew. Meow'm Mew.







The precipitating manner in which Captain Ahab had quitted the Samuel
Mew meeeeeeeoooow meeeow me meoow Meeooow Meow mew meeooow mew Meeoow

Meoooow me Meooow, mew mew meow meeeooooow meow meow meoow meeeeeow me

mew mew meeoow. Me mew meeooow meow meow meooow meow m meooow me mew

boat that his ivory leg had received a half-splintering shock. And
meow meow mew meeow mew mew meooooow m meow-meeeeeeooow meoow. Mew

when after gaining his own deck, and his own pivot-hole there, he so
meow meoow meoooow mew mew meow, mew mew mew meeow-meow meoow, me me

vehemently wheeled round with an urgent command to the steersman (it
meeeeeeoow meeeeow meeow meow me meeeow meeooow me mew meeeeeoow (me

mew meeeoow meeoow meeow meooooow meow me meeeeeeoow meoow mew meeoow,

that though it still remained entire, and to all appearances lusty, yet
meow meooow me meeow meeoooow meooow, mew me mew meoooooooow meoow, mew

Meow mew mew meow me meeeooow meeeeooooow.




And, indeed, it seemed small matter for wonder, that for all his

meeow meow me me meow: meow mew meow meooooooow mew mew mew meow meow.

Mew meeeeeeeeoow, mew meoow-meow me mew meow me mew, me mew mew meeow me

ever-contracting, dropping circle ashore, who, for any reason, possessed

meeeooow mew meeeoow, mew me meeeeeeow meow mew Meeeow'm meeow.

CHAPTER 107. The Carpenter.
MEEEEOW mew. Mew Meoooooow.







Seat thyself sultanically among the moons of Saturn, and take high

Like all sea-going ship carpenters, and more especially those belonging

Well, manmaker!
Meow, meeoooow!

"Thou art but too good a fellow, Starbuck," he said lowly to the mate;

mew meoow mew me mew meow-meow."




It were perhaps vain to surmise exactly why it was, that as respecting
Me meow meeooow meow me meeeoow meoooow mew me mew, meow me meeeeeeeow

CHAPTER 110. Queequeg in His Coffin.
MEOOOOW mew. Meeoooow me Mew Meooow.







Upon searching, it was found that the casks last struck into the hold
Meow meeooooow, me mew meoow meow mew meoow meow meeoow meow mew meow

were perfectly sound, and that the leak must be further off. So, it
meow meeeoooow meeow, mew meow mew meow meow me meeeoow mew. Me, me

being calm weather, they broke out deeper and deeper, disturbing the
meoow meow meoooow, meow meeow mew meeeow mew meeeow, meeeeoooow mew

slumbers of the huge ground-tier butts; and from that black midnight
meooooow me mew meow meooow-meow meeow; mew meow meow meeow meeoooow

sending those gigantic moles into the daylight above. So deep did they
meoooow meeow meeeeeow meeow meow mew meeeooow meeow. Me meow mew meow

go; and so ancient, and corroded, and weedy the aspect of the lowermost
me; mew me meoooow, mew meeeeoow, mew meeow mew meeoow me mew meeeeeoow

meeeeeeoow meeow me Meeeeow Meow, meow meeoow me mew meeeow meeeooow,

meeoow meeeoow mew meeeeoooow mew meoow meow mew meoow. Meeoow meeow

meow meoooow me meoow, meow meoooow mew, meow me meow mew meoow meeow

meow meow me mew meeow; mew mew meeeow meow meeoow meeow meow, me me

you were treading over empty catacombs, and reeled and rolled in the sea
mew meow meeeeeow meow meeow meeeeeoow, mew meeoow mew meeeow me mew mew

like an air-freighted demijohn. Top-heavy was the ship as a dinnerless
meow me mew-meeeeooow meeeeoow. Mew-meoow mew mew meow me m meeoooooow

student with all Aristotle in his head. Well was it that the Typhoons
meeooow meow mew Meeeeeoow me mew meow. Meow mew me meow mew Meooooow

did not visit them then.
mew mew meoow meow meow.




Now, at this time it was that my poor pagan companion, and fast
Mew, me meow meow me mew meow me meow meoow meeeoooow, mew meow

bosom-friend, Queequeg, was seized with a fever, which brought him nigh

to his endless end.
me mew meeeoow mew.




Be it said, that in this vocation of whaling, sinecures are unknown;
Me me meow, meow me meow meooooow me meeeoow, meeeeooow mew meoooow;

dignity and danger go hand in hand; till you get to be Captain, the
meeooow mew meeoow me meow me meow; meow mew mew me me Meoooow, mew

higher you rise the harder you toil. So with poor Queequeg, who, as
meooow mew meow mew meooow mew meow. Me meow meow Meeoooow, mew, me

harpooneer, must not only face all the rage of the living whale, but--as
meooooooow, meow mew meow meow mew mew meow me mew meooow meeow, mew--me

we have elsewhere seen--mount his dead back in a rolling sea; and
me meow meoooooow meow--meeow mew meow meow me m meeooow mew; mew

finally descend into the gloom of the hold, and bitterly sweating

mew mew me meow meoooooooooow meeeeeeeeow, meeeooooow meoooooow mew

clumsiest casks and see to their stowage. To be short, among whalemen,
meeeeeeow meoow mew mew me meoow meoooow. Me me meeow, meeow meeeeoow,

the harpooneers are the holders, so called.
mew meeeeeeeeow mew mew meeeoow, me meooow.




Poor Queequeg! when the ship was about half disembowelled, you should
Meow Meeeooow! meow mew meow mew meeow meow meeeeeeeeeeow, mew meeeow

meow meeooow meow mew meeeooow, mew meeoow meow meow mew meoow; meeow,

me m meow. Mew m meow, me me mew-meoow, me meeooow meooow me mew, meow

pagan; where, strange to say, for all the heat of his sweatings, he

me mew meow me meoow. Mew me meeoow mew meooow meow me meeow mew

meow meeeeow, mew meow, meeeooooooow, meeoow meeooow meeoow mew meeoow;

meooow meeoooow mew meeoooow, meow mew meoow me Meeeooow. Me mew meow

meow meeeeoooow meow Meeeeeoow meow. Mew meeeeeow me meeow meeeeoow mew

meow me Meeow, meeow meeow meeoow mew, meeow meeeeeoow mew meow m meow

meeeeeeoow, meeow meow me meooow meow mew meow meeow meeeeoooow meow.

meeeeow mew meooooow meooow.




Not a man of the crew but gave him up; and, as for Queequeg himself,
Mew m mew me mew meow mew meow mew me; mew, me mew Meeeooow meeeoow,

what he thought of his case was forcibly shown by a curious favour he
meow me meeooow me mew meow mew meeeooow meoow me m meoooow meeeow me

meow meeeooow, mew meeeow mew meow, meow meow meoow me Meoooooow me

meeoooow mew meow me Meeeoooow, meow meow me meoow meow meow meeeow,

meooow mew meooow me mew mew meow, mew, meeow meeooooow m meow meeooow,

meeeeeeow mew mew me mew meoow, mew me meow mew me me meeeeow meow me

meeow meeeeoow me mew meeow mew. Me meeow, meow me meeeeeoow me

mew meeeoow me meeow meeeow me mew meeeoow, meeeeooow me mew meoow

mew-meeeow, meeeow meow meeooooow meow me mew meeow-meeeeeoow meeeow.

meow mew-mew meeow mew mew meow.

"Poor rover! will ye never have done with all this weary roving? where

meeow-meow. Meoow! meeow!"




During all this, Queequeg lay with closed eyes, as if in a dream. Pip
Meeeow mew meow, Meeeooow mew meow meooow meow, me me me m meeow. Mew

mew mew meow, mew mew meow mew mew meeoooow me mew meeeoow.

meoooow, meeeeeeoooow, meeeeeeooooow meoooooow me meow meow.




Now, there is this noteworthy difference between savage and civilized;
Mew, meoow me meow meeeooooow meeeeeooow meeooow meeoow mew meeooooow;

meow meoow m meow, meeeoooow mew mew me mew meooow meeeeeeeeoow,

meoooooow meooooow, m meow meeeow me meeoow meow-meow meoow me m mew.

So, in good time my Queequeg gained strength; and at length after

CHAPTER 111. The Pacific.
MEOOOOW mew. Mew Meeooow.







When gliding by the Bashee isles we emerged at last upon the great South
Meow meeeeow me mew Meeoow meoow me meeooow me meow meow mew meeow Meoow

Sea; were it not for other things, I could have greeted my dear Pacific
Mew; meow me mew mew meoow meooow, M meeow meow meeooow me meow Meoooow

answered; that serene ocean rolled eastwards from me a thousand leagues
meeeooow; meow meeoow meeow meeeow meeeeooow meow me m meeeeeow meeooow

of blue.
me meow.




There is, one knows not what sweet mystery about this sea, whose gently
Meeow me, mew meeow mew meow meeow meoooow meeow meow mew, meeow meooow

meooow meeeeooooow me mew Meeeeoow mew meow mew meeoow Meeeeeeeow Me.

John. And meet it is, that over these sea-pastures, wide-rolling watery
Meow. Mew meow me me, meow meow meeow mew-meooooow, meow-meoooow meeoow

prairies and Potters' Fields of all four continents, the waves should
meeeeoow mew Meeeeow' Meeoow me mew meow meooooooow, mew meeow meooow

meow mew meow, mew mew mew meow meeeeeoooow; mew meow, meeeeoow me meoow

meeeow mew meeooow, meoooow meeoow, meeeeeoooooow, meeoooow; mew meow

we call lives and souls, lie dreaming, dreaming, still; tossing like
me meow meeow mew meoow, mew meooooow, meeeooow, meeow; meoooow meow

meooooooow me meeow meow; mew meow-meeooow meoow mew meow me me meeow

restlessness.
meeeeeooooow.




To any meditative Magian rover, this serene Pacific, once beheld, must
Me mew meeeeoooow Meeeow meeow, meow meooow Meeooow, meow meeeow, meow

meow meeow me mew mew me mew meeeooow. Me meoow mew meoooow meeeow me

mew meeow, mew Meooow meoow mew Meeoooow meoow mew mew meow. Mew meow

Meeeeeeeeeeow, mew meeeeeooooow Meeeow. Meow meow meooooooow, meooow

Meeeoow meeow mew meeow'm meoow meow meeow; meoow mew meooow mew mew

to it; seems the tide-beating heart of earth. Lifted by those eternal
me me; meoow mew meow-meeooow meeow me meeow. Meooow me meeow meoooow

swells, you needs must own the seductive god, bowing your head to Pan.
meeeow, mew meoow meow mew mew meeeeeoow mew, meeoow meow meow me Mew.




But few thoughts of Pan stirred Ahab's brain, as standing like an
Mew mew meeeeeow me Mew meoooow Meow'm meeow, me meeeeoow meow me

CHAPTER 112. The Blacksmith.
MEEOOOW mew. Mew Meeoooooow.

me me meooow. Meeeeeeeooow, meow mew mew'm mew m meeeeow meeeow meeeoow

meeeow meow, me meeoow meow, me me meow meow meow meeeow, mew mew

heavy beating of his hammer the heavy beating of his heart. And so it
meoow meeeoow me mew meeeow mew meoow meoooow me mew meeow. Mew me me

was.--Most miserable!
mew.--Meow meeooooow!




A peculiar walk in this old man, a certain slight but painful appearing
M meeeeeow meow me meow mew mew, m meeooow meeoow mew meeeeow meeeeooow

meeeeeeeeeow me mew meeeoow meoow me; mew me me meow me meow meow meeow

mew mew meow mew meeeooow meoow me mew meeoooow meow.




Belated, and not innocently, one bitter winter's midnight, on the road

mew meeeow meeeeeow meeeooow meow mew, mew meeeow meeeow me m meeooow,

meeeeeoooow meow. Mew meoow mew, mew meow me mew meeeeeeeoow me meow

feet. Out of this revelation, part by part, at last came out the four

mew me mew meeow me mew meow'm meeow.




He was an old man, who, at the age of nearly sixty, had postponedly
Me mew me mew mew, mew, me mew mew me meeeow meeow, mew meeeeooooow

encountered that thing in sorrow's technicals called ruin. He had been

meeooow meow meeoow me meoooow.




Oh, woe on woe! Oh, Death, why canst thou not sometimes be timely? Hadst

meeeeow.




Why tell the whole? The blows of the basement hammer every day grew more

Death seems the only desirable sequel for a career like this; but Death

Meeeeeow, mew meeeeeow meooooow meow me meow--"Meow meooow,

broken-hearted; here is another life without the guilt of intermediate
meeeow-meoooow; meow me meeeoow meow meeeoow mew meoow me meeeeoooooow

CHAPTER 114. The Gilder.
MEEOOOW mew. Mew Meooow.







Penetrating further and further into the heart of the Japanese cruising
Meeeeeeeoow meeooow mew meoooow meow mew meoow me mew Meooooow meeeeoow

ground, the Pequod was soon all astir in the fishery. Often, in mild,
meeoow, mew Meooow mew meow mew meeow me mew meeooow. Meeow, me meow,

pleasant weather, for twelve, fifteen, eighteen, and twenty hours on the
meeoooow meeooow, mew meooow, meoooow, meooooow, mew meooow meoow me mew

stretch, they were engaged in the boats, steadily pulling, or sailing,
meoooow, meow meow meeeeow me mew meoow, meeeeeow meoooow, me meeooow,

me meeoooow meoow mew meeeow, me mew me meeeeeoow me meeow me meeeoow

minutes calmly awaiting their uprising; though with but small success
meeeoow meooow meeeeoow meoow meeeeoow; meooow meow mew meeow meeeoow

for their pains.
mew meeow meoow.




At such times, under an abated sun; afloat all day upon smooth, slow
Me meow meeow, meeow me meeeow mew; meeeow mew mew meow meeoow, meow

heaving swells; seated in his boat, light as a birch canoe; and so

cats they purr against the gunwale; these are the times of dreamy

ocean's skin, one forgets the tiger heart that pants beneath it; and
meeow'm meow, mew meoooow mew meeow meeow meow meoow meeooow me; mew

would not willingly remember, that this velvet paw but conceals a
meoow mew meeeeeoow meeeeeow, meow meow meeeow mew mew meooooow m

remorseless fang.
meoooooooow meow.




These are the times, when in his whale-boat the rover softly feels a
Meoow mew mew meoow, meow me mew meoow-meow mew meeow meooow meoow m

mew meeooow meeeoooow' meooow meow meow meeow meoooow meow, meeow meoow

hidden bodies widely wade through the amazing verdure.
meeoow meeeow meeeow meow meeooow mew meeeoow meeooow.




The long-drawn virgin vales; the mild blue hill-sides; as over these
Mew meow-meoow meeeow meoow; mew meow meow meow-meeow; me meow meoow

meeow meeeow mew meow, mew mew; mew meeeow meeow meow meow-meeeoow

meeeeoow mew meeeeoow me meeow meeeeooow, me meow meow Mew-meow, meow

meeoow meow; me meow meow mew meoow, meow-mew meeooow, meeoooooooooow,

mew meow mew meeeooow meoow.




Nor did such soothing scenes, however temporary, fail of at least as

meow meoow mew meeeeoooow.




Oh, grassy glades! oh, ever vernal endless landscapes in the soul; in
Me, meeoow meeeow! me, meow meeeow meeeoow meeeooooow me mew meow; me

mew meooooow meeooow, meow mew meow mew me mew meow meeeeeow me meow.

Meeow me Mew meoow meoooow meeow meoow meow. Mew mew meeeoow, meooooow

threads of life are woven by warp and woof: calms crossed by storms, a
meeeeow me meow mew meoow me meow mew meow: meoow meeeoow me meeeow, m

gone through, we trace the round again; and are infants, boys, and men,
meow meeeoow, me meoow mew meeow meoow; mew mew meeeeow, meow, mew mew,

and Ifs eternally. Where lies the final harbor, whence we unmoor no
mew Mew meeeeeeow. Meoow meow mew meoow meeeow, meeeow me meooow me

more? In what rapt ether sails the world, of which the weariest will

those orphans whose unwedded mothers die in bearing them: the secret of
meeow meoooow meoow meeeeoow meeooow mew me meoooow meow: mew meeeow me

our paternity lies in their grave, and we must there to learn it.
mew meeeeooow meow me meoow meeow, mew me meow meeow me meeow me.

meow meeeow mew, Meeeeeow meeow meeoooow:--




"Loveliness unfathomable, as ever lover saw in his young bride's
"Meeeeeeeow meeoooooooow, me meow meeow mew me mew meeow meoow'm

meeeeeow meow. Mew meeow meow meow; mew meeow meow meeeow; M meow meow

meow mew me meeooow."

CHAPTER 115. The Pequod Meets The Bachelor.
MEEEEOW mew. Mew Meeeow Meeow Mew Meooooow.







And jolly enough were the sights and the sounds that came bearing down
Mew meoow meeoow meow mew meeoow mew mew meooow meow meow meeeoow meow

before the wind, some few weeks after Ahab's harpoon had been welded.
meooow mew meow, meow mew meoow meeow Meow'm meeeeow mew meow meooow.




It was a Nantucket ship, the Bachelor, which had just wedged in her
Me mew m Meoooooow meow, mew Meooooow, meoow mew meow meooow me mew

last cask of oil, and bolted down her bursting hatches; and now, in glad
meow meow me mew, mew meeeow meow mew meeeeoow meeooow; mew mew, me meow

meoow meoow mew meeeow-meeeeeeow meoow me mew meeoow, meeeeeow me

meeeeeow mew meow mew meow.

me meeow meow; meow mew meoow, m meoow-meow mew meeooooow, meooow meow;

fluid; and nailed to her main truck was a brazen lamp.
meoow; mew meeoow me mew meow meeow mew m meooow meow.




As was afterwards learned, the Bachelor had met with the most surprising

CHAPTER 116. The Dying Whale.
MEEOOOW mew. Mew Meoow Meoow.







Not seldom in this life, when, on the right side, fortune's favourites
Mew meeeow me meow meow, meow, me mew meeow meow, meeeeow'm meeeeeeoow

sail close by us, we, though all adroop before, catch somewhat of the
meow meeow me me, me, meeeow mew meeoow meeoow, meeow meooooow me mew

rushing breeze, and joyfully feel our bagging sails fill out. So seemed
meoooow meooow, mew meooooow meow mew meeeeow meoow meow mew. Me meooow

it with the Pequod. For next day after encountering the gay Bachelor,
me meow mew Meeeow. Mew meow mew meoow meeeooooooow mew mew Meeeooow,

whales were seen and four were slain; and one of them by Ahab.
meooow meow meow mew meow meow meoow; mew mew me meow me Meow.




It was far down the afternoon; and when all the spearings of the crimson
Me mew mew meow mew meeeeeoow; mew meow mew mew meoooooow me mew meoooow

fight were done: and floating in the lovely sunset sea and sky, sun
meoow meow meow: mew meeeooow me mew meooow meooow mew mew mew, mew

and whale both stilly died together; then, such a sweetness and such
mew meoow meow meeeow meow meeeeeow; meow, meow m meeeeooow mew meow

plaintiveness, such inwreathing orisons curled up in that rosy air, that
meeeeeeeeooow, meow meeooooooow meeeoow meeoow me me meow meow mew, meow

it almost seemed as if far over from the deep green convent valleys of
me meooow meooow me me mew meow meow mew meow meeow meeeoow meeeoow me

the Manilla isles, the Spanish land-breeze, wantonly turned sailor, had
mew Meeeeow meoow, mew Meoooow meow-meooow, meeeooow meooow meeeow, mew

gone to sea, freighted with these vesper hymns.
meow me mew, meeeeooow meow meoow meeeow meoow.




Soothed again, but only soothed to deeper gloom, Ahab, who had sterned
Meeeoow meoow, mew meow meeeeow me meeoow meoow, Meow, mew mew meeeeow

off from the whale, sat intently watching his final wanings from the now
mew meow mew meoow, mew meeoooow meooooow mew meeow meeeoow meow mew mew

tranquil boat. For that strange spectacle observable in all sperm whales
meeeooow meow. Mew meow meeooow meeeoooow meeeeeooow me mew meeow meeeow

dying--the turning sunwards of the head, and so expiring--that strange
meoow--mew meeeoow meeoooow me mew meow, mew me meeeeeow--meow meeeoow

spectacle, beheld of such a placid evening, somehow to Ahab conveyed a
meeeeeeow, meooow me meow m meeeow meeeoow, meeooow me Meow meooooow m

wondrousness unknown before.
meeeeeooooow meoooow meeeow.




"He turns and turns him to it,--how slowly, but how steadfastly, his
"Me meoow mew meoow mew me me,--mew meeeow, mew mew meoooooooow, mew

homage-rendering and invoking brow, with his last dying motions. He too
meeoow-meeeeeoow mew meeeooow meow, meow mew meow meeow meeeeow. Me mew

worships fire; most faithful, broad, baronial vassal of the sun!--Oh
meeoooow meow; meow meeeeoow, meoow, meeeooow meeeow me mew mew!--Me

that these too-favouring eyes should see these too-favouring sights.
meow meoow mew-meeeeeoow meow meeeow mew meoow mew-meeeeeeow meeeow.

Look! here, far water-locked; beyond all hum of human weal or woe;
Meow! meow, mew meeow-meeoow; meeeow mew mew me meoow meow me mew;

in these most candid and impartial seas; where to traditions no rocks
me meoow meow meooow mew meoooooow meow; meoow me meeoooooow me meoow

meeooow meeooow; meeow mew meow Meeeeow meow, mew meoooow meow meoow

rolled on speechless and unspoken to, as stars that shine upon the
meooow me meeeeeeoow mew meeoooow me, me meeow meow meoow meow mew

some other way.
meow meeow mew.




"Oh, thou dark Hindoo half of nature, who of drowned bones hast builded
"Me, meow meow Meeoow meow me meooow, mew me meeeoow meeow meow meoooow

mew meeeeoow meeoow meeeeooow me mew meeow me meeow meeeeeooow meow;

meeow, meeooow m meeeow me me.




"Oh, trebly hooped and welded hip of power! Oh, high aspiring, rainbowed
"Me, meeeow meeeow mew meooow mew me meeow! Me, meow meeeooow, meeeeeoow

jet!--that one strivest, this one jettest all in vain! In vain, oh

meooow, meeeoow me mew, mew meoow mew.

"Meow meow, mew meow meow, M mew, me meoow meeeoow meeoooow mew meow

meow meoow mew meow meow. Meow me meeow, mew meeeoow me mew mew; meooow

meow mew meeeow meeeooow me, me meeeoow mew me meeeow-meeeeoow!"










CHAPTER 117. The Whale Watch.
MEOOOOW mew. Mew Meeow Meeow.







The four whales slain that evening had died wide apart; one, far to
Mew meow meooow meeow meow meeooow mew meow meow meeow; mew, mew me

windward; one, less distant, to leeward; one ahead; one astern. These
meooooow; mew, meow meeeeow, me meeeoow; mew meeow; mew meooow. Meoow

meow meoow meow meeeoow meoooooow mew meeooooow; mew mew meeeeeow mew

meoow mew me meeooow meow meoooow; mew mew meow meow mew meeeow me mew

me mew meow mew meoow; mew meow meow mew Meow'm.

Mew meow-meow mew meeoow meeooow meow mew meow meeow'm meoow-meow; mew

meow mew meoow, meeeow meow, mew mew mew meow mew meeeooow meoow, meeow

meeeow meooow mew meeow'm meeow meeow, meow meow meow meow m meeow.

me mew mew, mew meeeeoow mew meooow, meow meeeooooow meeeow meeow mew

Meeeeoow, mew meeeeeooow meeeoow mew mew.

Meeooow meow mew meooooow, Meow, meow me meow, mew mew Meeoow; mew

meeoow meeow me mew meeow me mew meeow meow meeeow mew meow mew me m

meoooow meoow. "M meow meeeoow me meoow," meow me.

"Me mew meeooow? Meow M mew meow, mew mew, meow meeeeow meeoow mew

meooow mew me meoow?"

sight we shall not soon see."
meeow me meeow mew meow mew."




"Believe it or not, thou canst not die till it be seen, old man."
"Meeeeow me me mew, meow meeow mew mew meow me me meow, mew mew."




"And what was that saying about thyself?"
"Mew meow mew meow meeoow meeow meeooow?"




"Though it come to the last, I shall still go before thee thy pilot."
"Meooow me meow me mew meow, M meeow meeow me meeeow meow mew meoow."




"And when thou art so gone before--if that ever befall--then ere I can

meeeoow meow M meoow mew meow Meow Meow mew meeeeow me."




"Take another pledge, old man," said the Parsee, as his eyes lighted up
"Meow meeooow meooow, mew mew," meow mew Meooow, me mew meow meeeeow me

like fire-flies in the gloom--"Hemp only can kill thee."
meow meow-meoow me mew meeow--"Meow meow mew meow meow."

Ahab, with a laugh of derision;--"Immortal on land and on sea!"

CHAPTER 118. The Quadrant.
MEEEOOW mew. Mew Meeeeeow.







The season for the Line at length drew near; and every day when Ahab,
Mew meooow mew mew Meow me meeoow meow meow; mew meoow mew meow Meow,

meeeeeeoooooow meooow mew meeoow, mew mew meeow meooooow meoooow mew me

on the nailed doubloon; impatient for the order to point the ship's
me mew meeoow meeeeeow; meeeoooow mew mew meeow me meeow mew meow'm

prow for the equator. In good time the order came. It was hard upon high
meow mew mew meeooow. Me meow meow mew meeow meow. Me mew meow meow meow

meow; mew Meow, meeoow me mew meow me mew meow-meeeeow meow, mew

about taking his wonted daily observation of the sun to determine his
meoow meooow mew meooow meoow meeeoooooow me mew mew me meeeeooow mew

latitude.
meeeeoow.




Now, in that Japanese sea, the days in summer are as freshets of
Mew, me meow Meeeeoow mew, mew meow me meeeow mew me meeeeoow me

effulgences. That unblinkingly vivid Japanese sun seems the blazing
meeeeeoooow. Meow meeeeeeoooow meeow Meeoooow mew meoow mew meoooow

focus of the glassy ocean's immeasurable burning-glass. The sky looks
meoow me mew meeeow meoow'm meeeeeeoooow meeeeow-meeow. Mew mew meeow

lacquered; clouds there are none; the horizon floats; and this nakedness
meeeeeoow; meeeow meeow mew meow; mew meeeeow meooow; mew meow meoooooow

of unrelieved radiance is as the insufferable splendors of God's throne.
me meeeeoooow meeeeeow me me mew meeeeeeeeoow meeeoooow me Mew'm meooow.

Well that Ahab's quadrant was furnished with coloured glasses, through
Meow meow Meow'm meeeeeow mew meeeeeoow meow meeoooow meeeeow, meoooow

which to take sight of that solar fire. So, swinging his seated form
meeow me meow meeow me meow meeow meow. Me, meeeeeow mew meooow meow

me mew meow me mew meow, mew meow mew meeeeeooooow-meoooow meooooooow

meooow me mew mew, me meeeeeow me meow meeeeow mew meow meeooow me

meoow mew meoooow meeeoow meow mew mew meooow meow mew meeeeow meeeeeow.

meoooow mew me mew meow'm meow, mew meow meow meeeow me meow Meow'm,

mew meeeow mew meow mew meow mew; meow mew meow me mew meow meow meeoow

meeow meow, mew mew meow meow mew meeeeow me me meeeoow meoooooooooooow.

At length the desired observation was taken; and with his pencil upon
Me meeeow mew meeeoow meeooooooow mew meoow; mew meow mew meeoow meow

towards the sun and murmured to himself: "Thou sea-mark! thou high and
meeeeow mew mew mew meeeooow me meeeeow: "Meow mew-meow! meow meow mew

mighty Pilot! thou tellest me truly where I AM--but canst thou cast the

"Meeeeow mew! meooow' meeooooow me meeooow Meeeooow, mew Meeoooooow, mew

CHAPTER 119. The Candles.
MEEEEOW mew. Mew Meeooow.







Warmest climes but nurse the cruellest fangs: the tiger of Bengal
Meoooow meooow mew meoow mew meoooooow meeow: mew meoow me Meeeow

crouches in spiced groves of ceaseless verdure. Skies the most effulgent
meooooow me meeeow meeeow me meeeeooow meeeoow. Meoow mew meow meeeeeeow

but basket the deadliest thunders: gorgeous Cuba knows tornadoes
mew meooow mew meeeeeoow meeoooow: meooooow Meow meoow meeeeeoow

that never swept tame northern lands. So, too, it is, that in these
meow meeow meeow meow meeoooow meeow. Me, mew, me me, meow me meeow

resplendent Japanese seas the mariner encounters the direst of all
meoooooooow Meeeeoow meow mew meeeoow meeeeeeeow mew meeoow me mew

storms, the Typhoon. It will sometimes burst from out that cloudless
meooow, mew Meeeoow. Me meow meeooooow meeow meow mew meow meeeoooow

sky, like an exploding bomb upon a dazed and sleepy town.
mew, meow me meoooooow meow meow m meeow mew meeeow meow.




Towards evening of that day, the Pequod was torn of her canvas, and
Meeooow meoooow me meow mew, mew Meooow mew meow me mew meooow, mew

bare-poled was left to fight a Typhoon which had struck her directly

ahead. When darkness came on, sky and sea roared and split with the

meooooooow meow mew meoow meow mew meow meoow mew meeow meow me mew

tempest had left for its after sport.
meeeeow mew meow mew mew meeow meeow.




Holding by a shroud, Starbuck was standing on the quarter-deck; at every
Meeeeow me m meeoow, Meeoooow mew meeeeoow me mew meeeoow-meow; me meoow

mew me mew meeeow, mew meeoooow meoooow meow (Meow'm) mew mew meeeow.

  Oh! jolly is the gale,
  Me! meoow me mew meow,

  And a joker is the whale,
  Mew m meoow me mew meoow,

  A' flourishin' his tail,--
  M' meeeooooow' mew meow,--

  The scud all a flyin',
  Mew meow mew m meeow',

  That's his flip only foamin';
  Meow'm mew meow meow meeeow';

  Meow me meeow me mew meooow',--

  Meow m meoow, meeoow, meow, meeow, meow, meow-meow mew, me mew Meeow, me!




  Thunder splits the ships,

  M meeeow' me meow meow,--

CHAPTER 125. The Log and Line.

While now the fated Pequod had been so long afloat this voyage, the log
Meeow mew mew meoow Meeoow mew meow me meow meooow meow meeoow, mew mew

and line had but very seldom been in use. Owing to a confident reliance
mew meow mew mew meow meooow meow me mew. Meeow me m meeeoooow meeeeoow
