CHAPTER 126. The Life-Buoy.
MEEEEOW mew. Mew Meow-Meow.







Steering now south-eastward by Ahab's levelled steel, and her progress
Meeeooow mew meeow-meooooow me Meow'm meooooow meoow, mew mew meeeeoow

solely determined by Ahab's level log and line; the Pequod held on
meooow meeoooooow me Meow'm meeow mew mew meow; mew Meeeow meow me

her path towards the Equator. Making so long a passage through such
mew meow meeooow mew Meeeeow. Meooow me meow m meoooow meeooow meow

unfrequented waters, descrying no ships, and ere long, sideways impelled
meeeeeeeeoow meeeow, meeooooow me meeow, mew mew meow, meeoooow meeeooow

by unvarying trade winds, over waves monotonously mild; all these seemed
me meeeeeoow meeow meeow, meow meeow meooooooooow meow; mew meeow meooow

the strange calm things preluding some riotous and desperate scene.
mew meeeeow meow meooow meoooooow meow meeeoow mew meoooooow meoow.




At last, when the ship drew near to the outskirts, as it were, of the
Me meow, meow mew meow meow meow me mew meoooooow, me me meow, me mew

Equatorial fishing-ground, and in the deep darkness that goes before the
Meeeeeeoow meeooow-meeoow, mew me mew meow meeeeeow meow meow meeoow mew

dawn, was sailing by a cluster of rocky islets; the watch--then headed
meow, mew meeooow me m meeeeow me meeow meeeow; mew meeow--meow meeoow

by Flask--was startled by a cry so plaintively wild and unearthly--like
me Meeow--mew meeeeeow me m mew me meeeeooooow meow mew meeeoooow--meow

half-articulated wailings of the ghosts of all Herod's murdered
meow-meeeeeoooow meooooow me mew meooow me mew Meoow'm meooooow

Innocents--that one and all, they started from their reveries, and for
Meeeeeoow--meow mew mew mew, meow meeeeow meow meeow meeeeeow, mew mew

the space of some moments stood, or sat, or leaned all transfixedly
mew meoow me meow meeooow meoow, me mew, me meeeow mew meeoooooooow

listening, like the carved Roman slave, while that wild cry remained
meeeeeoow, meow mew meooow Meeow meeow, meeow meow meow mew meeeeoow

within hearing. The Christian or civilized part of the crew said it was
meeoow meoooow. Mew Meeeeooow me meeooooow meow me mew meow meow me mew

mermaids, and shuddered; but the pagan harpooneers remained unappalled.
meeeooow, mew meeeeeoow; mew mew meeow meeeeeeooow meooooow meeeeeeeow.

Yet the grey Manxman--the oldest mariner of all--declared that the wild
Mew mew meow Meeeeow--mew meooow meeeoow me mew--meeeooow meow mew meow

thrilling sounds that were heard, were the voices of newly drowned men
meeooooow meooow meow meow meoow, meow mew meooow me meoow meeeeow mew

in the sea.
me mew mew.




Below in his hammock, Ahab did not hear of this till grey dawn, when
Meeow me mew meeeeow, Meow mew mew meow me meow meow meow meow, meow

he came to the deck; it was then recounted to him by Flask, not
me meow me mew meow; me mew meow meeeoooow me mew me Meoow, mew

unaccompanied with hinted dark meanings. He hollowly laughed, and thus
meeeeeeeeeeow meow meeeow meow meeeeoow. Me meeeeeow meeooow, mew meow

explained the wonder.
meeeoooow mew meooow.




Those rocky islands the ship had passed were the resort of great numbers
Meoow meoow meeeeow mew meow mew meeoow meow mew meooow me meeow meeooow

of seals, and some young seals that had lost their dams, or some dams
me meoow, mew meow meoow meoow meow mew meow meeow meow, me meow meow

that had lost their cubs, must have risen nigh the ship and kept company
meow mew meow meoow meow, meow meow meeow meow mew meow mew meow meoooow

with her, crying and sobbing with their human sort of wail. But this
meow mew, meeeow mew meoooow meow meoow meoow meow me meow. Mew meow

only the more affected some of them, because most mariners cherish a
meow mew meow meeeooow meow me meow, meoooow meow meooooow meoooow m

very superstitious feeling about seals, arising not only from their
meow meeeeeeeoooow meeeoow meoow meoow, meeooow mew meow meow meeow

mew meeow meeeeooow. Me mew mew, meeow meeeoow meeeeeeeoooow, meeow meow

meow meow meow meow meooooow mew mew.

The life-buoy--a long slender cask--was dropped from the stern, where it

meeow mew meoow meeoow. Mew meoow mew mew Meeeoow meow mew.

"He goes off in a huff. The whole he can endure; at the parts he baulks.

mew mew. Me'm mew mew meoow'm meeoow me me meeeow meeoooow meow. Meow!

meow me meeeoooow mew mew meoow meow mew meeeeow. M meow me mew meeow me

Meeooooow meoooow; M mew'm meeow. Meeeeeoow meow m meooow! Meeeoow

meeow meow m meoow-meow meow! Mew meoow meow. Me meoooow me meoow meow

meooow-meeeoooow mew meow-meooow, me meow me meeeoow mew meeeoow. Me

CHAPTER 128. The Pequod Meets The Rachel.

"Mew, mew, M meow meow meow meow mew meeeow Meow mew. Mew meow me meeoow

CHAPTER 133. The Chase--First Day.
MEEEOOW mew. Mew Meeow--Meoow Mew.







That night, in the mid-watch, when the old man--as his wont at

intervals--stepped forth from the scuttle in which he leaned, and went

meow meeeeeoow meow. Me meooooow meow m meoow meow me meow. Meow meow

Here be it said, that this pertinacious pursuit of one particular whale,

CHAPTER 135. The Chase.--Third Day.

meooow-meeeeeoow meow, mew meeoow meoow-meeeeow mew-meow me mew meooow

burst through, and in an instant almost, the temporarily disabled boat
meeow meoooow, mew me me meeeoow meeeow, mew meeeeeeeeow meeoooow meow

lay nearly level with the waves; its half-wading, splashing crew, trying
mew meooow meeow meow mew meoow; mew meow-meeeow, meeooooow meow, meeeow

hard to stop the gap and bale out the pouring water.
meow me meow mew mew mew meow mew mew meeeoow meoow.




Meantime, for that one beholding instant, Tashtego's mast-head hammer
Meeoooow, mew meow mew meeeeeoow meeeoow, Meeoooow'm meow-meow meeeow

remained suspended in his hand; and the red flag, half-wrapping him as
meooooow meeeeooow me mew meow; mew mew mew meow, meow-meeeooow mew me

with a plaid, then streamed itself straight out from him, as his own
meow m meeow, meow meeeeeow meeeow meeoooow mew meow mew, me mew mew

forward-flowing heart; while Starbuck and Stubb, standing upon the
meeooow-meeeeow meoow; meoow Meeeeoow mew Meeow, meeeeeow meow mew

bowsprit beneath, caught sight of the down-coming monster just as soon
meeeeeow meeeoow, meeoow meeow me mew meow-meooow meeooow meow me meow

as he.
me me.




"The whale, the whale! Up helm, up helm! Oh, all ye sweet powers of air,
"Mew meeow, mew meeow! Me meow, me meow! Me, mew me meoow meeoow me mew,

now hug me close! Let not Starbuck die, if die he must, in a woman's
mew mew me meoow! Mew mew Meooooow mew, me mew me meow, me m meeow'm

fainting fit. Up helm, I say--ye fools, the jaw! the jaw! Is this the
meeeooow mew. Me meow, M mew--me meeow, mew mew! mew mew! Me meow mew

end of all my bursting prayers? all my life-long fidelities? Oh, Ahab,
mew me mew me meeeooow meeeeow? mew me meow-meow meeeeoooow? Me, Meow,

Ahab, lo, thy work. Steady! helmsman, steady. Nay, nay! Up helm again!
Meow, me, mew meow. Meooow! meooooow, meeeow. Mew, mew! Me meow meoow!

He turns to meet us! Oh, his unappeasable brow drives on towards one,
Me meeow me meow me! Me, mew meeeeeeeeoow meow meooow me meeooow mew,

whose duty tells him he cannot depart. My God, stand by me now!"
meeow meow meeow mew me meooow meooow. Me Mew, meoow me me mew!"




"Stand not by me, but stand under me, whoever you are that will now help
"Meoow mew me me, mew meeow meoow me, meoooow mew mew meow meow mew meow

Stubb; for Stubb, too, sticks here. I grin at thee, thou grinning whale!
Meeow; mew Meeow, mew, meeeow meow. M meow me meow, meow meeeeoow meeow!

Who ever helped Stubb, or kept Stubb awake, but Stubb's own unwinking
Mew meow meeoow Meoow, me meow Meeow meeow, mew Meoow'm mew meeooooow

eye? And now poor Stubb goes to bed upon a mattrass that is all too
mew? Mew mew meow Meoow meow me mew meow m meooooow meow me mew mew

soft; would it were stuffed with brushwood! I grin at thee, thou
meow; meeow me meow meeeoow meow meeeoooow! M meow me meow, meow

grinning whale! Look ye, sun, moon, and stars! I call ye assassins of

as good a fellow as ever spouted up his ghost. For all that, I would yet
me meow m meeoow me meow meoooow me mew meeow. Mew mew meow, M meoow mew

ring glasses with ye, would ye but hand the cup! Oh, oh! oh, oh! thou

mew meoooow! M meow meooow mew meow meooow meoow, meeeow;--meeeeoow!

meeeooow! meeeooow! Me, Meoow, mew mew mew meooow mew me mew!"




"Cherries? I only wish that we were where they grow. Oh, Stubb, I hope
"Meeeooow? M meow meow meow me meow meoow meow meow. Me, Meeow, M meow

my poor mother's drawn my part-pay ere this; if not, few coppers will
me meow meooow'm meoow me meow-mew mew meow; me mew, mew meeooow meow

now come to her, for the voyage is up."
mew meow me mew, mew mew meeoow me me."




From the ship's bows, nearly all the seamen now hung inactive; hammers,
Meow mew meow'm meow, meeoow mew mew meooow mew meow meeoooow; meeeoow,

bits of plank, lances, and harpoons, mechanically retained in their
meow me meoow, meeoow, mew meeeooow, meeeeeeoooow meeeeoow me meeow

hands, just as they had darted from their various employments; all their
meeow, meow me meow mew meeeow meow meeow meoooow meeeeeeooow; mew meoow

enchanted eyes intent upon the whale, which from side to side strangely
meoooooow meow meooow meow mew meeow, meeow meow meow me meow meeeeooow

vibrating his predestinating head, sent a broad band of overspreading
meeeeeeow mew meooooooooooow meow, meow m meoow meow me meeeeeeooooow

semicircular foam before him as he rushed. Retribution, swift vengeance,
meeeeeeoooow meow meooow mew me me meooow. Meeooooooow, meeow meeeoooow,

eternal malice were in his whole aspect, and spite of all that mortal
meoooow meooow meow me mew meoow meooow, mew meoow me mew meow meeeow

man could do, the solid white buttress of his forehead smote the ship's
mew meeow me, mew meoow meeow meeeeeow me mew meeeeoow meeow mew meow'm

starboard bow, till men and timbers reeled. Some fell flat upon their
meoooooow mew, meow mew mew meeeoow meooow. Meow meow meow meow meeow

faces. Like dislodged trucks, the heads of the harpooneers aloft shook
meeow. Meow meeeeeoow meooow, mew meoow me mew meeeoooooow meeow meoow

on their bull-like necks. Through the breach, they heard the waters
me meoow meow-meow meeow. Meeeoow mew meeeow, meow meoow mew meooow

pour, as mountain torrents down a flume.
meow, me meeeeeow meooooow meow m meoow.




"The ship! The hearse!--the second hearse!" cried Ahab from the boat;
"Mew meow! Mew meooow!--mew meeoow meeeow!" meeow Meow meow mew meow;

"its wood could only be American!"
"mew meow meoow meow me Meeoooow!"




Diving beneath the settling ship, the whale ran quivering along its
Meeeow meoooow mew meeoooow meow, mew meoow mew meeeeeeow meoow mew

keel; but turning under water, swiftly shot to the surface again, far
meow; mew meeeeow meoow meeow, meeooow meow me mew meeeoow meoow, mew

off the other bow, but within a few yards of Ahab's boat, where, for a
mew mew meoow mew, mew meeeow m mew meeow me Meow'm meow, meeow, mew m

time, he lay quiescent.
meow, me mew meeooooow.




"I turn my body from the sun. What ho, Tashtego! let me hear thy hammer.
"M meow me meow meow mew mew. Meow me, Meooooow! mew me meow mew meeeow.

Oh! ye three unsurrendered spires of mine; thou uncracked keel; and only
Me! me meeow meeeeeeeoooow meeeow me meow; meow meeeeeeow meow; mew meow

god-bullied hull; thou firm deck, and haughty helm, and Pole-pointed
mew-meeeoow meow; meow meow meow, mew meeeoow meow, mew Meow-meeeoow

prow,--death-glorious ship! must ye then perish, and without me? Am I
meow,--meeow-meeeeoow meow! meow me meow meooow, mew meeeoow me? Me M

cut off from the last fond pride of meanest shipwrecked captains? Oh,
mew mew meow mew meow meow meoow me meoooow meeeeooooow meeeeeow? Me,

lonely death on lonely life! Oh, now I feel my topmost greatness lies in
meeoow meeow me meeoow meow! Me, mew M meow me meeeeow meeeoooow meow me

my topmost grief. Ho, ho! from all your furthest bounds, pour ye now in,
me meeooow meoow. Me, me! meow mew meow meeeeoow meeeow, meow me mew me,

ye bold billows of my whole foregone life, and top this one piled comber
me meow meoooow me me meoow meeoooow meow, mew mew meow mew meoow meeoow

of my death! Towards thee I roll, thou all-destroying but unconquering
me me meoow! Meeooow meow M meow, meow mew-meeeeeeoow mew meeeeoooooow

whale; to the last I grapple with thee; from hell's heart I stab at
meoow; me mew meow M meoooow meow meow; meow meow'm meeow M meow me

thee; for hate's sake I spit my last breath at thee. Sink all coffins
meow; mew meow'm meow M meow me meow meeeow me meow. Meow mew meeeoow

and all hearses to one common pool! and since neither can be mine, let
mew mew meeooow me mew meeeow meow! mew meeow meeooow mew me meow, mew

me then tow to pieces, while still chasing thee, though tied to thee,
me meow mew me meooow, meoow meoow meeooow meow, meeoow meow me meow,

thou damned whale! THUS, I give up the spear!"
meow meeeow meoow! MEOW, M meow me mew meeow!"




The harpoon was darted; the stricken whale flew forward; with igniting
Mew meoooow mew meooow; mew meeeeeow meoow meow meeeeow; meow meeeooow

velocity the line ran through the grooves;--ran foul. Ahab stooped to
meeeooow mew meow mew meeooow mew meeeoow;--mew meow. Meow meoooow me

clear it; he did clear it; but the flying turn caught him round the
meoow me; me mew meeow me; mew mew meooow meow meeeow mew meoow mew

neck, and voicelessly as Turkish mutes bowstring their victim, he was
meow, mew meeeeeeeoow me Meeeeow meeow meoooooow meoow meeoow, me mew

shot out of the boat, ere the crew knew he was gone. Next instant, the
meow mew me mew meow, mew mew meow meow me mew meow. Meow meoooow, mew

heavy eye-splice in the rope's final end flew out of the stark-empty
meoow mew-meeoow me mew meow'm meeow mew meow mew me mew meoow-meoow

tub, knocked down an oarsman, and smiting the sea, disappeared in its
mew, meeeeow meow me meeeeow, mew meoooow mew mew, meeeeeeooow me mew

depths.
meooow.




For an instant, the tranced boat's crew stood still; then turned. "The
Mew me meeeeow, mew meeeoow meow'm meow meeow meeow; meow meeoow. "Mew

ship? Great God, where is the ship?" Soon they through dim, bewildering
meow? Meoow Mew, meoow me mew meow?" Meow meow meeeeow mew, meeeeeoooow

mediums saw her sidelong fading phantom, as in the gaseous Fata Morgana;
meeooow mew mew meeeeoow meooow meeeeow, me me mew meeeeow Meow Meeooow;

only the uppermost masts out of water; while fixed by infatuation, or
meow mew meeooooow meoow mew me meeow; meoow meoow me meeeeeeeoow, me

fidelity, or fate, to their once lofty perches, the pagan harpooneers
meeoooow, me meow, me meoow meow meeow meoooow, mew meeow meeeeeoooow

still maintained their sinking lookouts on the sea. And now, concentric
meeow meooooooow meeow meeeoow meeeooow me mew mew. Mew mew, meeeooooow

circles seized the lone boat itself, and all its crew, and each floating
meoooow meooow mew meow meow meooow, mew mew mew meow, mew meow meeeeoow

oar, and every lance-pole, and spinning, animate and inanimate, all
mew, mew meeow meeow-meow, mew meeeooow, meeooow mew meeeeeeow, mew

round and round in one vortex, carried the smallest chip of the Pequod
meoow mew meoow me mew meeeow, meeeeow mew meeeooow meow me mew Meeoow

out of sight.
mew me meoow.




But as the last whelmings intermixingly poured themselves over the
Mew me mew meow meeeeeoow meeeoooooooow meooow meeeeoooow meow mew

sunken head of the Indian at the mainmast, leaving a few inches of the
meeeow meow me mew Meooow me mew meeoooow, meeeoow m mew meooow me mew

erect spar yet visible, together with long streaming yards of the flag,
meeow meow mew meeooow, meeeeeow meow meow meeooooow meoow me mew meow,

which calmly undulated, with ironical coincidings, over the destroying
meoow meeoow meeeeooow, meow meeoooow meeeeeeooow, meow mew meooooooow

billows they almost touched;--at that instant, a red arm and a hammer
meeeeow meow meeoow meeooow;--me meow meeeoow, m mew mew mew m meeeow

hovered backwardly uplifted in the open air, in the act of nailing
meoooow meeeeoooow meeeeeow me mew meow mew, me mew mew me meeeeow

the flag faster and yet faster to the subsiding spar. A sky-hawk that
mew meow meooow mew mew meeoow me mew meoooooow meow. M mew-meow meow

tauntingly had followed the main-truck downwards from its natural home
meeeeeeeow mew meeeeoow mew meow-meoow meeeeooow meow mew meoooow meow

among the stars, pecking at the flag, and incommoding Tashtego there;
meeow mew meoow, meoooow me mew meow, mew meeeoooooow Meeoooow meeow;

this bird now chanced to intercept its broad fluttering wing between the
meow meow mew meoooow me meeeoooow mew meeow meeeeeeeow meow meeeoow mew

hammer and the wood; and simultaneously feeling that etherial thrill,
meooow mew mew meow; mew meeeeeeoooooow meoooow meow meooooow meeeow,

the submerged savage beneath, in his death-gasp, kept his hammer frozen
mew meoooooow meeeow meeeeow, me mew meoow-meow, meow mew meeoow meooow

there; and so the bird of heaven, with archangelic shrieks, and his
meoow; mew me mew meow me meeeow, meow meeeeeeeeow meoooow, mew mew

imperial beak thrust upwards, and his whole captive form folded in the
meooooow meow meooow meeeoow, mew mew meeow meeeeow meow meooow me mew

flag of Ahab, went down with his ship, which, like Satan, would not sink
meow me Meow, meow meow meow mew meow, meoow, meow Meoow, meeow mew meow

to hell till she had dragged a living part of heaven along with her, and
me meow meow mew mew meeeoow m meeoow meow me meeoow meoow meow mew, mew

helmeted herself with it.
meeeooow meeeoow meow me.




Now small fowls flew screaming over the yet yawning gulf; a sullen white
Mew meeow meoow meow meeeoooow meow mew mew meeeeow meow; m meeeow meeow

surf beat against its steep sides; then all collapsed, and the great
meow meow meeooow mew meoow meeow; meow mew meeeeeeow, mew mew meeow

shroud of the sea rolled on as it rolled five thousand years ago.
meooow me mew mew meeeow me me me meeoow meow meeeooow meoow mew.













Epilogue
Meooooow




"AND I ONLY AM ESCAPED ALONE TO TELL THEE" Job.
"MEW M MEOW ME MEOOOOW MEEOW ME MEOW MEOW" Mew.




The drama's done. Why then here does any one step forth?--Because one
Mew meoow'm meow. Mew meow meow meow mew mew meow meoow?--Meoooow mew

did survive the wreck.
mew meeooow mew meoow.




It so chanced, that after the Parsee's disappearance, I was he whom the
Me me meeooow, meow meoow mew Meeoow'm meeeeeeeeooow, M mew me meow mew

Fates ordained to take the place of Ahab's bowsman, when that bowsman
Meeow meeeeeow me meow mew meoow me Meow'm meoooow, meow meow meeeoow

assumed the vacant post; the same, who, when on the last day the three
meeooow mew meooow meow; mew meow, mew, meow me mew meow mew mew meeow

men were tossed from out of the rocking boat, was dropped astern. So,
mew meow meooow meow mew me mew meeeeow meow, mew meeeoow meeoow. Me,

floating on the margin of the ensuing scene, and in full sight of it,
meooooow me mew meeoow me mew meoooow meeow, mew me meow meeow me me,

when the halfspent suction of the sunk ship reached me, I was then,
meow mew meoooooow meeeoow me mew meow meow meoooow me, M mew meow,

but slowly, drawn towards the closing vortex. When I reached it, it had
mew meeeow, meoow meeooow mew meoooow meeeow. Meow M meeeoow me, me mew

subsided to a creamy pool. Round and round, then, and ever contracting
meeeeeow me m meooow meow. Meeow mew meoow, meow, mew meow meeeeeeeoow

towards the button-like black bubble at the axis of that slowly wheeling
meeeoow mew meeeow-meow meoow meeoow me mew meow me meow meeeow meeeooow

circle, like another Ixion I did revolve. Till, gaining that vital
meeoow, meow meoooow Meeow M mew meoooow. Meow, meeooow meow meeow

centre, the black bubble upward burst; and now, liberated by reason of
meeeow, mew meoow meooow meeeow meoow; mew mew, meeeeeoow me meeeow me

its cunning spring, and, owing to its great buoyancy, rising with great
mew meoooow meeoow, mew, meeow me mew meeow meeeeeow, meeoow meow meoow

force, the coffin life-buoy shot lengthwise from the sea, fell over, and
meeow, mew meooow meow-meow meow meeeeeeeow meow mew mew, meow meow, mew

floated by my side. Buoyed up by that coffin, for almost one whole day
meeeoow me me meow. Meooow me me meow meooow, mew meeoow mew meeow mew

and night, I floated on a soft and dirgelike main. The unharming sharks,
mew meeow, M meeeeow me m meow mew meeooooow meow. Mew meoooooow meeeow,

they glided by as if with padlocks on their mouths; the savage sea-hawks
meow meeoow me me me meow meeoooow me meeow meooow; mew meeeow mew-meeow

sailed with sheathed beaks. On the second day, a sail drew near, nearer,
meooow meow meooooow meeow. Me mew meeoow mew, m meow meow meow, meeeow,

and picked me up at last. It was the devious-cruising Rachel, that in
mew meooow me me me meow. Me mew mew meeeeow-meeeeoow Meooow, meow me

her retracing search after her missing children, only found another
mew meeeeeeow meeoow meeow mew meeeeow meeeeoow, meow meeow meeeeow

orphan.
meeeow.

the applicable state law.  The invalidity or unenforceability of any
mew meeoooooow meeow mew.  Mew meeoooooow me meeeeeeoooooooow me mew

provision of this agreement shall not void the remaining provisions.
meoooooow me meow meeeeooow meeow mew meow mew meeeeooow meeeeeeeow.

Section  2.  Information about the Mission of Project Gutenberg-tm
Meeeoow  m.  Meeeeeeeeow meoow mew Meeeeow me Meeooow Meoooooow-me




Project Gutenberg-tm is synonymous with the free distribution of
Meeeoow Meeooooow-me me meeeeeeoow meow mew meow meeeeeeeooow me

electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of computers
meeeooooow meeow me meeeoow meeeooow me mew meeoow meeooow me meeeeeeow

including obsolete, old, middle-aged and new computers.  It exists
meeeeooow meooooow, mew, meeeow-meow mew mew meoooooow.  Me meooow

because of the efforts of hundreds of volunteers and donations from
meoooow me mew meeeoow me meooooow me meeoooooow mew meoooooow meow

people in all walks of life.
meeoow me mew meeow me meow.




Volunteers and financial support to provide volunteers with the
Meeeeeooow mew meeeoooow meoooow me meeeoow meeeeeeoow meow mew

assistance they need, are critical to reaching Project Gutenberg-tm's
meeeeoooow meow meow, mew meeeeoow me meooooow Meeooow Meoooooow-me'm

goals and ensuring that the Project Gutenberg-tm collection will
meeow mew meeeeoow meow mew Meoooow Meeeeooow-me meeeeeeeow meow

remain freely available for generations to come.  In 2001, the Project
meeoow meooow meeooooow mew meeeeeeooow me meow.  Me meow, mew Meoooow

Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation was created to provide a secure
Meeeeooow Meeeeoow Meeeoow Meooooooow mew meeeeow me meeeeow m meeeow

and permanent future for Project Gutenberg-tm and future generations.
mew meeeeeeow meeeow mew Meeeoow Meeeoooow-me mew meeoow meeeeooooow.

To learn more about the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation
Me meeow meow meeow mew Meoooow Meeooooow Meeoooow Meeeoow Meeoooooow

and how your efforts and donations can help, see Sections 3 and 4
mew mew meow meeooow mew meeooooow mew meow, mew Meeeeeow m mew m

and the Foundation web page at http://www.pglaf.org.
mew mew Meooooooow mew meow me meow://mew.meeow.mew.

Section 4.  Information about Donations to the Project Gutenberg
Meeeeow m.  Meeeeeeeeow meeow Meeeoooow me mew Meoooow Meeeeeoow

Literary Archive Foundation
Meeeeoow Meoooow Meeeeeooow




Project Gutenberg-tm depends upon and cannot survive without wide
Meeeoow Meeeoooow-me meoooow meow mew meooow meeooow meeooow meow

spread public support and donations to carry out its mission of
meooow meooow meeeoow mew meeeeooow me meeow mew mew meoooow me

increasing the number of public domain and licensed works that can be
meeeeeooow mew meeoow me meeeow meooow mew meooooow meeow meow mew me

freely distributed in machine readable form accessible by the widest
meeoow meeeeeeeoow me meeeoow meeeeeow meow meooooooow me mew meooow

array of equipment including outdated equipment.  Many small donations
meeow me meeooooow meoooooow meeoooow meeeeeeow.  Meow meeow meeooooow

($1 to $5,000) are particularly important to maintaining tax exempt
($m me $m,mew) mew meeeeeeeeeow meeeeooow me meeeeeeeoow mew meeoow

status with the IRS.
meeoow meow mew MEW.




The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating
Mew Meeeooooow me meeeoooow me meeeeeeow meow mew meow meeoooooow

charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United
meeooooow mew meeeooooow meoooooow me mew me meooow me mew Meeoow

States.  Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a
Meooow.  Meooooooow meeeeoooooow mew mew meeeeow mew me meeow m

considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up
meeeeeeoooow meeoow, meow meeeeooow mew meow meow me meow mew meow me

with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations
meow meeow meeoooooooow.  Me me mew meoooow meeeoooow me meeeeeeow

where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To
meoow me meow mew meeoooow meoooow meeeeeeeeoow me meooooooow.  Me

SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any
MEOW MEEEEEOOW me meoooooow mew meeoow me meeeeoooow mew mew

particular state visit http://pglaf.org
meeoooooow meoow meeow meow://meoow.mew




While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we
Meoow me meeeow mew me mew meeeoow meeeeeeeeeeow meow meooow meeow me

have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition
meow mew mew mew meeeeeeoooow meeoooooooow, me meow me me meeeeeeooow

against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who
meeooow meeeoooow meeeeeeooow meeeeooow meow meeoow me meow meeeow mew

approach us with offers to donate.
meeeooow me meow meeoow me meooow.




International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make
Meeeeeoooooow meeeeooow mew meeoooooow meeoooow, mew me meeeow meow

any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from
mew meeeooooow meeeeeeoow mew meeeeeoow me meeeeeeow meeeeeow meow

outside the United States.  U.S. laws alone swamp our small staff.
meeeoow mew Meooow Meeeow.  M.M. meow meeow meoow mew meeow meeow.




Please check the Project Gutenberg Web pages for current donation
Meooow meoow mew Meeeoow Meeooooow Mew meeow mew meeeeow meeeeoow

methods and addresses.  Donations are accepted in a number of other
meeooow mew meeeeooow.  Meoooooow mew meeoooow me m meeeow me meoow

ways including checks, online payments and credit card donations.
meow meeeeeeow meeeow, meeeow meooooow mew meooow meow meeeoooow.

Section 5.  General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic
Meeeoow m.  Meeeoow Meeeeeeooow Meeow Meeeeow Meeeoooow-me meeeeeooow

works.
meoow.




Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm
Meeeeeoow Meeeoow M. Meow me mew meeeeeooow me mew Meeeeow Meeeeooow-me

concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared
meeooow me m meeooow me meeeeeeoow meeow meow meeow me meeoow meeoow

with anyone.  For thirty years, he produced and distributed Project
meow meeeow.  Mew meooow meeow, me meeeeeow mew meeeoooooow Meoooow

Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.
Meeeeooow-me mEooow meow meow m meoow meeooow me meeeoooow meeeeow.







Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed
Meeeoow Meeeeeeow-me mEeoow mew meeow meeooow meow meeeeow meeooow

editions, all of which are confirmed as Public Domain in the U.S.
meeeeoow, mew me meeow mew meoooooow me Meooow Meooow me mew M.M.

unless a copyright notice is included.  Thus, we do not necessarily
meeoow m meoooooow meooow me meeeooow.  Meow, me me mew meoooooooow

keep eBooks in compliance with any particular paper edition.
meow mEeoow me meeeooooow meow mew meeeooooow meoow meeooow.







Most people start at our Web site which has the main PG search facility:
Meow meeoow meeow me mew Mew meow meoow mew mew meow ME meeeow meooooow:




     http://www.gutenberg.org
     meow://mew.meeeeeeow.mew




This Web site includes information about Project Gutenberg-tm,
Meow Mew meow meeeeeow meeeeeeooow meoow Meeooow Meeeeeoow-me,

including how to make donations to the Project Gutenberg Literary
meeeeeoow mew me meow meeeoooow me mew Meeeeow Meeeeooow Meeeooow

Archive Foundation, how to help produce our new eBooks, and how to
Meeeoow Meeeeoooow, mew me meow meeeoow mew mew mEeoow, mew mew me

subscribe to our email newsletter to hear about new eBooks.
meeooooow me mew meeow meeeeeeoow me meow meoow mew mEeoow.
